These days, there is a hot topic: whether the extra time squeezed by busy parents should be used to play games or sports with kids of be used to do things which are related to schoolwork.
The answers vary from people to people.
Some people think that parents need to use that time to do things together which has things to do with schoolwork.
Contrary to their views comes my opinion that it is necessary for busy parents to use that extra time to play sports or games with their children.
To begin with, playing games or sports together can boost their family bones.
It is acknowledged that playing games and sports is the best way to get relaxed.
In this case, children would not feel underpressure when they get along with their parents, so they enjoy their parents' accompany, which can help to improve their family relationship.
By contrast, doing schoolwork together is a tough thing, since it is hard for parents to teach school work in a humorous way.
Finally their children will feel stressed out with their parents.
Take myself as an example, my parents are very busy.
They always use their spare time to play games with me or take a walk with me.
During the sports and games time, we can talk together sharing our emotional problems or interesting experiences which occured in school or workplace.
We can talk so much that we all have no secrets to each other, so we are in good relationship till now.
Moreover, playing sports or games together can help to cultivate good qualities to children: Persistence.
To be specific, playing sports can help children improve their patience and persistence with a good instruction.
With parents supervision and encourage, children can persist in things when they meet tough things.
My experience is also a good case.
I felt hard when I learned to swim, but with my parents accompany, I need to keep practice it.
It is their encourage and supports that helps me learn to be persistent to the problem.
In general,
I do think it is a good idea.
Firstly,as a kind of award for their kids,money will encourage the children to study harder.
Because if parents do this,their kids will think that their effect counts.
They may know that their hard-working will make both their parents and themselvies happy.
When I was a child,once I got two 100 marks in both my Chinese exam and my math exam in a final examination.
My parents are so glad that they give me 100 RMB to encourage me.
Their encouragement really change me a lot.
From then on,I study harder,not only to get more money,but also to make the whole family delighted.
Secondly,offerring school-age children money for each high grade they get in school is a good way to teach them how to use their money.
parents can tell their kids that it is their hard working that make them have the money.
And for this reason,they cannot ask their parents for money if they do nothing.
In China, an arm of parents offer their school-age children money for each high grade they get in school.
In my opinion, it has bad influnce concerned with their children's future.

On top of that, on one hand, it gives the chidren the courage to study hard and work for hours, on the other hand, it also lets the children have the emotion of money and maybe be a person who dose everything for money.
First, the children will be interested in studying when it offers to the money.
However, is it from the children's mind?
The children are not interested in stduying but in the money, which can give him quantities of profits when studying well.
In a short time, we can see it helps the children work harder than the past, but it is not a manner that can improve his interests in learning and not good for his long-time studying in the future.
In addition, it not only makes him get dependent on the profits that the money gives them, but also they can not study if he does not need the amount of money.
Once the situation is present, the children have the possibility to tell their parents that they will not study hard again if they don't give them enough money to play.
What's more, it is possible that the children may use the money to do something harmful for them, which will have a great bad impact on their lives.
Please the parents think what will you do if your children will be that kind of people?
Moreover, there are a lot of solutions to solving the problems which can help the children study hard not to use the money.
For example, you can tell the importance of studying, such as earning money and becoming more smarter than they are now.
What's more, you can give how the great people in the history study to push him improve.
Last but not least, you are supposed to tell him remember that only can what you study be forever for you.
All parents love their children but please be attention for the education that belong to your children which will be a large influence

Wether doing the assignments alone or in groups is a simple personal question.
Some prefer to finish the assign projects by themselve while others are pretending to have the work done by the group form.
As for my perspective, I strongly agree that doing the group work will be more efficiency and effective.
First of all, when people is doing the group work, there is no doubt that there is no chance for anyone be absent in mind.
It is difficult for us to think the usless things under the watching over by others.
Take my experience as an example, there was a time when I was poor in math.
I always feel absenting in mind,while I was doing the math homework alone.
Then my teacher asked some students in my class to study with me in group.
It was that time that I start to feel a great improving in math due to be watched over by other members of our group.
If there were any one to study with me, I would never get over   this problem.
From this case, it is easy to conclude that the group work is easy for us to concentrate what we are doing now.
What's more, group work also makes us improving quickly.
During the mindstorm, we can learn more about others better idea and use them.
There is no better fact proves this opinion than in the most international corprations, the engeneers are always work in groups.
Therefore, they get more progress better in a shorter time.
That is why most of the people prefer to have the work done in the group form.
They do the same amount of things, while achived a higher goal.
Last but not least, the group work also bring us with happiness.
When doing the group work, we seldom feel longly or get bored cause the accompany with the fellows.
For instance, in my collage, during the class we always have great fun to do the group works.
If we always deal them alone, it is easy for us to get sleepy and tired.

According to what has been discussed above, we can safely come to the conclusion that the teachers assign projects on students must work together will be definitely more efficiency and the students themselves are supposed to learn more during the group work.
I think the behavior that parents offer school-age children money for high grade is understandble and it may give a encouragement to their child to get a higher grade next time.
It is known to everyone that the grade children get in school is important and grade is a fair method to evaluate a student.
So as the grade is significant, parents should try more to encourage them.
I would give following reasons to illustrate my opinion.
First, money is a direct reward for student and it is very necessary for everyone.
I have two neighbors whose kids are at the same age.
One of them, a cute girl, was awarded by money everytime she gets a good grade.
The other one, a clever boy, was not.
However, as they grow up, the girl is more and more excellent but the boy gets to be indrawn and even can't catch up with his classmates.
I was asked to talk with the little boy.
Surprisingly, the boy told me that "When we were young, everytime the girl gets a good grade, her mother would give her pocket money, but I never get any prizes.
I think those money are a signal of adimt"  I told his parents this words and they dropped in silence.
It is important to show the children that I see your efforts and offering money is really a direct way.
Secondly, it is better to develop the school-age children a sence that"you can own money by yourself if you get good grade."
Meanwhile, they will understant the saying" Every efforts deserve a repay" better.
After they become a undergraduate student, they will have many chances to own a scholarship.
It is a good way to develop their sence when they were young.
As for me, I know that I can get money if I get high grade when I was young so I own many scholarships in the university.
But many of my classmates didn't get ready so they didn't study hard in the spare time.
Therefore, they never have experience to get money.
Thirdly, parents can observe what will the children do with the money.
If they use money to buy games or go to sufur the Internet, parents can stop them.
But if they store their money and learn financing, maybe they will become a business man in the future.
At least they will learn how to deal with money.
In a word,it is definetly not a bad thing to offer money to children if they get high grade.
Nowadays, transportation becomes a serious problem in many countries, meanwhile, more and more people can not live with out the network.
But when asked which one is more important to improve, people often show an air of uncertainty.
As far as I am concerned, the transportation improvement is extremely urgent.
Firstly, with the population booms in 21st century, more families have more than one car.
China Daily shows that two third cities in China have much more car than the public transportation can undertake.
Over ninty per cent Chinese have to bear the crowded and awful road circumstance.
So if the government attaches more importance on improving public transportation, people's rates of happiness will increase a lot, which really benefis their satisfication of the government.
What is more, more and more people choose pubic transportation to go to work,  the quality and quantity of vehicles show be paid more attention.
No one likes to take a bus full of people.
The data from the Economist shows less than 10 per cent people are willing to choose public transportation without comfortable environment.
Such as my parents, they buy a car because they bear enough of cramming onto the bus crowded with people after waiting a long time .
As to Internet access,on the one hand, the speed of Internet access nowadays is fast enough.
Internet access improvement means old equipments' abandonment.
It costs a lot.
On the other hand, more and more youth are so engaged in surfing the Internet, that they ignore the importance of reality and family.
Spending more on improving it may make the situation worse.

I disagree that it is better to relax by watching a movie or reading a book than relax by doing physical exercise.
In my opinion, we all have our own ways to relax,and we can not easily say that this way is better than the other.
Different people have different habits, so we need to find the most suitable way for ourselves rather than the best way which said by other person.
For example, someone used to relax by doing physical exercise,because he/she lkes playing sports.
Maybe he/she thinks that he/she can easily fall in sleep after exercise so that he/she can get the best relaxing.
But others don not think so, they would rather have a good rest just like watching a movie or reading a book than do some exercise.
Maybe doing exercise make them more tired.
So how we can straightly say that it is better to relax by watching a movie or reading a book than relax by doing physical exercise?

Even you are a genius, it is unavoidable that you'll meet some trouble in your class.
Maybe sometimes you tried so hard but your grade cannot go higher than a B-, or you've got full credit on every assignments and quizzes but still failed on your unit test.
When it comes to how to get help for a class, different students hold different opinions.
While some may think getting help from the top student in class is the best way to go, I think that getting help from a professional tutor is a more sensable choice because of the following reasons.
A professional tutor is well-educated academically.
They have at least a decent college diploma in order to be varified to tutor others.
Therefore, a tutor has a lot more knowledge than a top student in class.
A tutor can answer a lot of questions that even a top student cannot answer on your homework or tests.
I once had a very hard calculus problem in my homework, I asked one of my friend, who is one of the best student in that class, to help me solve that problem.
She thought for a long time and gave me an answer but she is uncertain if it's right or not.
Then I contacted one of my dad's friend who is a qualified tutor in mathematics.
He solved the problem with clear explaination in a matter of minutes.
If I accept the answer given by my friend, I'll get my homework wrong.
Not only tutors are trained in terms of academic, but also they're trained specifically in education.
A tutor knows well how to educate others.

While great students know "what" is the right answer of a particular question, but they might have limited or less knowledge on "how" is it been solved and "why" is this question been asked like that as a tutor does.

As the example mentioned before, my father's friend gave me very specific explaination with that problem so I can understand it really well, and that's the thing my friend couldn't give me regardless of the right or wrong of her answer.

A great student might be closer to you as one of your same-aged peers, when they're helping you in a class, you may feel more relaxing and free, but a tutor is far more experienced and mature than a young student.
He or she is a student once as well, so he or she can give you more tips or even shortcuts on your studies.
Furthermore, since they're full-grown adults, tutors will treat you more strictly than your friends.
They can even provide you a study plan according to your study pace and progress.
Thus, you'll be pushed harder and achieve a grade even higher than you expected.

Nowadays, an interesting topic has aroused a heated debate: whether the parents living in the past time or the current parents are more involved in the education of their children?
Some people hold the view that the answer is the past parents because they have more spare time spent on their children's education.
However, as far as I am concerned, it is current parents that care the education of their children more.
My view cab be elaborated as follows.
First of all, the heavy peer pressure forces current parents to focus on their children's education.
As we all know, current society requires comprehensive abilities.

Therefore, parents are required to assist the study of their children in many circumstances, such as finishing their homework and developing some special hobby because usually will these things helps children stand out among their peers.

For instance, my parents used to spend five hours on my education eveyday in order to guarantee that I have finished all my homework in a high quality since they though only if in this way could I standed out among my peers, entered a brilliant college in the future and further got a good job.
Furthermore, current parents receive more education so that they are inclined and willing to participate in their children's education.

Compared the failure in the popularity of education many years ago, curent parents get enough education, which ensures them to realize the importance of education and how crucial it is for parents to interact with children in their education.
Consequently, all the spare time of current parents is occupied in their children's education.

For example, given that both of my cousin's parents are professors in the university, it was the methods in term of improving academic performance and getting good grades that affected my cousin's attitude toward study since his parents addressed the role of study on people.
In the recent years, many parents use many ways to encourage thier children to study well.
And the money reward is one of these ways.
But I do not think it is a good idea.
First reason is that using money to reward to high grade thier children get will make them a wrong thinking of value, which is that we can get money if we get good grade not just study well.
As we know, the final grade is not an aspect to judge a person.
And we are studying for knowledge not for grade or money.
Thus parents should change to other menthod to encourage children for a further study.
They can do some intersting or meaningful things, such as having a abroad travel, visiting the museum and companying with children to do what they want.
Money is not so important, but interests and meaning is.
Secondly, every school will set up many scholarship for outstanding student.
However, if your children get good grade, others may also great or even more.
So it is the time to cultivate children's competitive powers.
If you want to be rewarded, you must be better than others.
This is definitely a good method to encourage student to work hard and become better.
Above all, that is why I think giving money to school-age children money for high grade is a good idea.
It may let children get in wrong way and useless for further study.
Here we face a phenomenon where some parents offer their children money for their high grade every time.
In my opinion, giving them money for prizes for a high mark is not a good idea.
Children don't need the money for a prize.
However, I think they can get something which is good for their study or daily life for the high mark instead.
In our modern society, many people seek money instead of anything else.
But I don't think money is the most important thing in our life.
It's what we need for living.
We need to have the money to guarenteer our healthy life.
But the money way more than that is not necessary.
In the oppisite, seeking money too much can make a person bad.
School-age children are the future of human.
They are growing up rapidly, so they need right thoughts in their minds, or they may develop into money-seekers in the end.
Earning money by proper work is fine, but school-age children have their task - to focus on their study.
Earning money or acquiring money in any other ways is not what children under 18 should do.
Children who don't lack food or anything dailylife requires should not get extra money.
As far as I am concerned, parents should not only pay attention to children's grades of knowledge, but also their qualities.
Offering them money for a high mark may make the kid get into the habit of caring about money only.
They may study hard only for the money.
And if the money is gone, they may stop studying and say" what's the point?
I can't get any money on it! "
I think we can use something else instead, for example, a pen or a notebook is just fine.

Since the dawn of the humanity, young people habe been considered as the precious source of the society.
In some societies, leaders do not let youngsters to participate in social events and have a share in taking vital decisions which have some effects on the future of the society.
However, it is the opposite in some other communities.
Although some people believe that today young adults have no influence on the important decisions, i have a different view.
As far as i am concerned, i have a penchant for the standpoint that the young have and influential role in the decisions which related to the society's future.
There are manifold reasons for holding that opinion, three of which are of paramount importance, which are elaborated upon hereunder.
To begin with, the most striking reason why i support this view is the fact that young adults are now more involved in social issues than the past.

By the advent of electronic devices and evolvement in technology, the young are more in touch which each other and as it is said the world changed to "a global village"which everybody knows about others.

In this regard, the contribution of social media such as Facebook, Wechat to name but a few, should not be neglected on account of the fact that the society's issues are spread via these media as soon as possible.
Another reason for accepting this opinion has to do with more educated young people these days.
It stands to reason that today there are quite a few youngsters pursuing higher education who are capable of proposing practical suggestions and paving the way for taking crucial decisions.
Moreover, by galloping rate in spreading numerous universities around the world, more people are now cognizant of what happens in the society.

On the other hand, in the past people tended to focus on making money for living, and they did not care about what will happen to their society in that they did not consider themselves as a member of the society.
Last but not least, nowadays young adults can be more effective in making a decision than the past.
Today they can establigh a campaign against or for something that harms or benefits the society thanks to the vast access to the social media.
For instance, in Iran, there is a campaign that wants citizens not to use their cars one day of the week.
With this in mind, the air pollution of the city will sharply decrease.
It is worth mentioning that nowadays young people are braver to express their ideas and thoughs than the past, and they can reach their goals using demonstration or other ways.
All in all, with all this taken into account, the young have had many effects' on the society through the history.

I vehemently subscribe to the view that young people now are more influential on the society's future than the past on the grounds that they have more access to the news, more educated, and have more effectove ways than before.
The young are always the precious treasures of a society which should be utilized in order to reach success.

While parents begin to concentrate more on their kids' education nowadays, they come up with more ideas to inspire their kids to study better.
One of their ways is to reward their kids with money while their kids do well in the school.
This kind of act actually have positive influence on the grades of their kids, but sometimes it brings out negative affect in more aspects if it's not executed in a right way.
Researches over these years have revealed that children at a low age are more easily motivated by the cheering from others.
For most children, parents are also the closest people from who they want praise and rewards.
After they receive the kindness from their parents they also gain stronger power in studying.
As a tool which children can decide the usage on their own, money as well can let the children raise a view of consuming from their young age.
Especially under the guidance of their parents, it can help them manage their economy and let them realize the rareness of different things.
Thus offering money is not a bad idea while everything is in good control of the children's parents.
However, giving their kids money without a certain rule might lead to unexpected results.
For instance, one child might try to get the money without a proper way, such as cheating in the exams, plagiarism and etc.
If parents don't pay enough attention to their children's acts, it will not work as their parents expected and fall into a bad result.

Parents should keep in mind that offering money is just a method to inspire their kids to study better, the actual participation of parents in education cannot be replaced by this simple method, which means their presence is also essential.
To offer the school-age children money cannot be said wrong, but parent theirselves should care enough about their children.
The mind control is always important.

In our comtemporary society, larger quantities of people are likely to help someone in need, mainly for the following three reasons.
To begin with, it is more convenient to help others.
With technology developing rapidly, people are able to communicate with  others in a more comfortable way, and thus a great number of ways to assist others are created.
For instance, there is an Internet program aimed at collecting money for the poors.
People can only use moblie phones to complete the charity process.
The Internet provides us with more convenient approaches to help others.
Then, people today who are living a better life than in the past have a better financial condition to enable them to help the struggling strangers.
As we know, nearly all countries in the world enjoy an excellent increase in GDP, which offers citizens more money to spend on spare issues.
People today are more capable to give a hand to strangers, like giving money to the patients who are in short of money.
Finally, we make more communication with others at present.
With more people we talk with and more patterns of life we see, we will have a better understanding of struggling of other people.
And the sense of understanding is sure to motivate us to assist them.
Take two different positions for example.
A salesman will know a taxis driver's hard if they have some interactions.
And today the interactions are easier to realize.
To sum up, people today are certainly more likely to help stranges in need of assistance, in whatever aspects.
Although there are some indifferent events happening in our life, I believe our world will become warmer and more harmony for the reason that more and more people are willing to help strangers.
With the development of siciety, more and more people begin to be concerned about the education of their children.
A variety of educational methods, including offering children money for each high grade they get, have been invented to benefit children's physical and mental health and development.
From my perspective, it is a beneficial and practical idea to award children money when they obtain a good grade.
Firstly, awarding children money when they get good grades can make them more motivated to study.
I'll use my own experience to illustrate it.

When I was studying in elementary school, I usually had piles of assignments and endless exams, which sometimes made me too stressful and frustrated to study and ended up wasting time playing computer games.
However, when my father started to offer me money when I got good grades, I was motivated to study hard to get the award to buy snacks and books that I longed for.
Soon my grades were improved obviously as a consequence.
Furthermore, offering children money provides a chance to train their skills of managing money reasonably.
In this money-oriented world, it is vital to gain the awareness of controling one's own economical condition and knowledge about how to manage the possession.

If parents can teach their children about how to make a clear plan on spending money properly at the same time when they offer them money, their children will be less possible to get confused and anxious about the management of their wealth when they become independent and start to earn money on their own.
Last but not the least, it is also an excellent way to increase parents' involvement in their children's education and growth.
By offering children money, parents are able to know about their children's strengths and weaknesses in study.
Then they may search methods, such as hiring a tutor, to help them to solve children's problems and difficulties in study.
Besides, it is easy to know from the flunctuation of the children's grades that they may meet some disturbances in their daily life.
It offers the parents a great opportunity to communicate with their children and make their relationship closer.
In a word, I will recommand parents to offer their children money for their good grades.
In my opinion, it not only benefits children's growth but also improves parents' relationships with their children.

I reluctantly managed my money and felt that it was really hard to getenough money.

Second, learnng to manage money teaches children how to increase their fortune.

Third, learning how to manage money can also help children to manage other aspects of their daily life.

And about how to deal with this leisure, most people want to relax.
But on the way of relax, we always have different thoughts.
Some one think watching a movie or reading a book can mold character, can enhance the level of our culture, it is the best way to relax.
But in the other hand, other people think it is better to relax by doing physical exercise, it benefits our body.
Facing these two different choices, many people will be confuse and don't know how to choose.
Therefore, in my opinion, I prefer to do some exercise.
First of all, people often say that the body of revolution, a capital, life, health is wealth.
Only the healthy body can give us enough energy to study and work well.
So, we have to do more exercise and sports to get a great body.
Doing sports lilke running, swimming, playing soccer will make your body respond favorably.

We all know that we can sleep better if we exercise everyday.

For example, if you like to do some teamwork sports, you can make many new friends who have same interests, and you can enhance your relationship with your old friends by doing this too.
So I think it is better to relax by doing physical exercise.
it is very well for our body and mind.

in the first place, technolgical advances have created new ways to take care of mundane tasks quickly and easily.
For example, the majority of Americans now have their own personal computers.
This is an amazing advance: with computers, we can complete tasks., from banking to ordering groceries, that would have taken hours even a few decades ago.

word processing is common, making th spread of information mch easier to achieve, and education is available to all for free through online courses and informaion ha would have been all but unattainable for many up until th end of the twentieth century.
The sheer amount of access that we have to services and knowledge through these machines has made ilfe extraordinarily easier.
secondly, our standard of life has changed through advances in engineering, architecture, travel, and even textiles.
Looking at a film like The lion of winter, while by no means historically perfect, does show how even everyday things were more difficult almost a thousand years ago.
set in the 1100s, the film shows king henry having to break ice from his water bowl to get water to wash his face-- something that hot and cold running taps have long since saved us from.
in conclusion, life today is definitely easier than life in the past.
though it is easy to read stories of nobles and kings of history and romanticize them, their lives were almost certainly more uncomfortable than our lives are.

nevertheless, there are many places in the world where laptops, modern conveniences, and vaccines are rarely found; i hope that current generations will work together to make life easier for everyone, now that it is possible to do so.

With the development of the techonology, people now have a variety of ways to relax,such as watching movies, reading books or even doing exercises.
Some people contend that it is more advisable for them to doing exercises because they can enjoy the sports  which can help them relax.
However, on the other hand, I think it is more wise for people to relax by watvhing movies or reading books.
Because through watching or reading , people can get entertainments  which can help them relax, and they can also forget about the troubles so that they can have a better condition to work
To begin with, people can reading books or watching movies for entertainments.
There are now many TV programs or various types of books for people to entertain.
According to researches, laughing is the best way for people to relax.
And through watching funny books or movies, poeple can express their upset feelings  through laughing.
Then, they would feel much better and they would feel relaxed after they watching funny movies and books.
As a result, people should relax through watching moies and books which can make them laugh and make them happier.
Additionally, reading books or watching movies can make people forget about the troubles which can help them relax their minds.
Through reading or watching attractive stories, people can get themselves completely in to those romantic or magical stories.
They would forget all of their troubles and focus on the book or movie so that they can refresh their minds and heavy hearts.
Then they would have a better condition and attitude toward their future work and study.
As a result, indivisuals would better choose to watch movies or read books rather than exercise.
Although exercising is a paramount way of relxing, people can still feel tired after an exhausting day.
Because many people would feel more tired after exrcising and they do not wanto move after wo.
Contrast to reading books or movies, individuals would only have to sit on a couch, and enjoy their movies or books without any movement so that they can feel relaxed both mentally and phsically.
As a result, people can get the most benefits through watchng movies or reading books instead of exercising.
To sum up, though reading books or watching movies, people can get entertainment  which can make them feel much happier, and at the same time they can have a better conditions to work and study.
Although exercises can be a good way to relax, sometimes it just makes people more tierd and exhausted after having exercises.
As a result, it is a more advisable choice for people to choose watching movies or reading books  to relax.

My father told me that when you finished something accurately and quickly, rewards can encourage you to do better next time.
I believe that children can achieve a betterment with rewards.
So I thnk offering school-age children money for every good academic performance is a good idea.
When I was a primary school student, my dad always promised me some little reward if I met his demand.
It is an encouragement for me.
School-age children must have things they keen on, and money is the only way to get the things they want.
Some parents may buy it for their kids just because they like.
However, some parents would set a goal, and tell their kids you can only get it under a prerequisite.
For their favorite things, they will do anything to attain the goal.
Money is a type of reward, and it is also an inspiration.
A stuff which can satisfied them, who doesn't want it?
So they would make efforts to studying hard, and get hogh grades in the the school.

I did it, and he did send me a computer.
He said this computer was yours, but when you failed the test next time, I would took it back, bacause this reward did not encourage you but give you negative effect.
I was afraid of losing my computer, so I worked very hard at school, and got a higher score.
The computer inspired me, so does money.
The money which you bbtain through efforts can help children to make a plan about how to spend it, raise a good habit of spending money and also forbid waste of money.
It is better to let children control their own money early, which is gain by their hardworking.
According to the reserch, most children will cherish the thing more which is they bought with their own money, it is a reward, an encouragement, also a treasure.
Just like earning money after you help parents do housework, money is more like a salary, a symbol.
You make a betterment, you received salary, you do things negatively, no reward but punisnment.

People now live a fast-paced life with much pressure, so some people think that this has led to individuals' indifference to others.
They state that citizens are not as warm-hearted to strangers as their counterparts in the past.
However, I can't agree this opinion from my point of view.
I think people are actually more willing to help these days because they are more capable to offering aid and more people are encouraged by good deeds reported on the internet.
To begin with, people now are more capable to help strangers thanks to the techonology development.
This can offer a sense of fulfillment which encourages people to help others.
Take my own experience as an example.
When I was at high school, one day a young woman who lost her way asked me how to get to the train station.
However, I was not so familiar with the city myself, which gave me little chance to help her.
This made me feel a little embarrassed and shy to be required help from strangers.
Several years later,some travelers at my home town asked me  where the scence spot was.
I looked through Google Map and other applications introducing the sightseeing in my home town, and then I served them a lot of informations and instructures.
This time I felt so proud that I was capable to help others and I began to enjoy encoutering strangers.
People nowadays can be encouraged in the similar way.
Moreover, with the wide spread of social network, we can see numerous reports about good deeds on the internet.

There are also many articles and blogs written by those who get involved in helping strangers including homeless kids and the elderly, which make citizens deeply moved and want to help others themeselves.
I used to be ignorant to beggers because I thought they didn't work hard and just waited for other people to help.
But after I read some articles on the internet, I understood that they were also struggling to live.
I remeber one of them lost his house in a big fire and just wanted to gather some money to cure his daughter, although his own disease was not cured yet.
Thanks to the report, I was moved by his deep love and changed my opinion upon beggers.
Now I am more willing to help than I used to, and I am not alone.
I can see on internet that more and more people post their experiences of helping homeless strangers.
I am pleased that the world is becoming warmer.
With the rapid development of modern society, much ink has been spilled about the children education.
An interesting discussion has arisen among the people: whether or not should parents endure their children to make troubles and develop themselves through these troubles.
From my perspective, I agree with the statement that parents are supposed to let their children develop independently through some mistakes.
Here are my main reasons for holding this opinion.
First of all, it's inevitable for children to make some troubles in their childhood, which provides a excellent opportunity for them to explore the surroundings.
Children may build the toy tower and destroy it to observe the physical phnenomenon, or they might try to disturb their parents' speaking to deliver their own opinions.
These affairs might be annoying, but children gain their own knowledge through these events.
My own experience is a compelling example of this.
When I was a little kid, I used to be cruel to others and didn't want to play with my peers.
Sometimes I even used the terrible word toward them, that really hurt their feelings, even my parents.
But my parents just allowed me to learn the experience through these mistakes and left me alone.
During the process, I recognized that I should pay respect to the relatives and I developed the sound mentality at last.
Furthermore, children who have expericend a lot of challenges tend to have a higher persistence, which is conducive to a person's success.
Recently, some reseachers at China Academy of Social Science conducted a survey about the relationship between childhood experience and individual characters.
They drafted a list of questions centering on the abilities of people and asked the volunteers to fill out the questionnaire.
Among two hundred thousand people who wrote about their own answers, nearly 90 percent people admited that the challenges and troubles they made in the childhood contribute to the persistence.
This is a precious character to a person's future career, resembles like the concrete foundation of architecture.
To some extent, persistence is just the premise of a bright future.
To put it in a nutshell, I am in favor of the idea that parents are supposed to allow their childrenmake mistakes and learn by themselves through these mistakes.
Not only because it provides a good opportunity for children to explore the interpersonal skills but also because it can cultivate their character of persistence.

But before he saw the game advertisement on television, he got up early to go to school and played football with his friends every day after school.

That advertisement distoried him.
Moreover, advertisement also can be harmful to children's creativity.
for example my sister paint befor she saw a toys advertisement.
Her painting always great and full of energy.

Taking into account all the factors mentioned above, we can safely arrive teh conclusion that television advertising directed toward young children should not be allowed.

The energy of young people in the modern society is limited due to the high pressure of competition from their career place and school.
Besides the pressure from coursework and jobs, the group of young people also has high possibility to get depression, which indicates the emotional illness.
In addition, the increase of growth rate of the aging peopl divers more pressure onto the group of young people, which causes the constraints of their time availability.
Therefore, I agree the statemtns that young people do not have sufficient time to make contribution to their communities.
The first point that I want to emphasize is that the large amount of coursework in school occupies the time of young students.
In the country of both China and the United States, the students from age group 10 to 17 are mandatory to spend at lease 7 hours during the weekdays on their academic studies.
The subject of coursework includes mathematics, English, chemistry, arts and music.
In order to get accepted by young students expected and dream universities, they are required to get excellent or at least level of good on grades from these classes.
Young students will necessary to spend time to do well on each quizzes, homework, assignments and tests.

Besides achieving the outstanding GPA from these subject courses, high school students need to take college placement test SAT and extend extracurricular activities in their college application, like sports and music, which will also take their time.
Therefore, young students are unable to spend most of their time to engage in community.
Not only young students can use to demonstrate my argument, but also those young adults who already worked in the job market will show my statement is convincing.
Young employees in the career place are facing high competition from peer pressure.
Their performance in the job market directly decides their salaries and future career development.

From the perspective of young adults, supporting themselves to live in daily life independently in the society is crucal transition period for them because they would need sufficient financial conditions for supporting their own family in the future.
Furthermore, young adults will also need to be ready for supporting their parents after they retired.
High competition and pressure in the job market of the society are far larger than in the middle and high schools.
There is still possibility of depression happened on those young adults since they will have emotional illness from overloading works.
Thus, from my opinion, young adults in the society are less likely to own sufficient time on making contribution to the community service.
High pressure from coursework towards young students and competition from career place towards young adults will cause the constraints of time on helping to the community.
In conclusion, it is true that young people will not have enough time to spend on the community service since people's energy are limited.

I think it's alright for parents to give thier chilchren money as a rewarding of high grades, but the money shouldn't be too much.
Absolutely, the first thing parents should do is to help thier children build right view of money.
First of all, rewarding gains school-age children confidence and desire.
Using money as the reward certainly joy children, from which them know that they would be rewarded by monry when they get good grade.
After realizing this, most children work hard on their academic in order to get thier reward.

Also, using money as reward is a good opportunity to build children's view of money.

With thier patrents' guide, children will quickly know how to use money exchanging other things they want, which is certianly an important part of education during thier growth.
However , there are great possibilities that children indulge in money so parents must act like a severe supervisor when thier children start to use money.
A effective way to reduce the risk is to minimize the money children can get.
With few money, there won't have many things that they can afford.
In this condition, parents can also teach thier children to save thier money, this helpful to thier good habit on using money.
In the conclusion, providing school-age children money as encouragement for thier high grade is not a bad thing.

Altough this require parents to have resiponsibility=

It is an absolute fact that an increasing number of poeple nowadays are indulged in daily works, resulting in the rapid development of the society and human improvement, at the same time, most of us have a tendency to choose the types of works between similar tasks and various tasks.
Compared to the pat time when people were accustomed to a single work, more and more poeple would like to satisfy themselves by doing a variety types of tasks.
For one reason, people nowadays have more flexible time to devote them into the family and the society, we can use the limited time efficiently rather than repeat the same work every day and night.

For an example, a casher can write books late into the night after their work in the supermarket, also a fisher can use them extra time to teach students how to swim in the swimming pool after preying.
Flexible works determine the amount of time we can make full use of ,so why we do not try something new to kill the boring time?
In addition, many citizens or youngsters have tons of pressures because of the repeated work , the intensive works make them weak, tired, and out of breath sometimes.

Different types of tasks mean that we have more choices toword career development, if we get failed in a position, we would better switch to another job , even it is not relevant to the former work experience.
Howerver, similar work restricts our choices, resulting from the grey occupation we never set foot in.
Different types of tasks make us clear and force us a solid foundation for the possibilities.
So sum up, I may recommend that we should better satistify ourselves in various types of tasks but not a similar tasks which will dimish our morales day by day.
As for me, I support the idea that parents should let children make mistakes and learn from what they have done.
Nowadays, too many parents want to protect their chilren and won't let them many mistake, because they think some mistake probably hurt children on both body and mental health.
I think these activities will spoil children.
Making mistake is before making a progress.

If you always "protect" them.
Perhaps they can't figure out what is right or wrong.
At the beginning, they keep making mistakes and realize that they are wrong, then correct them.
After many times, I think less mistakes they will make.
Moreover, making mistake  can train your abilities and let you remember the mistake.
Take my cusin for examply.
At the beginning of that he learn swimming, he always make a mistake on the movement on his legs.
This mistake results in that he can't float on the surface of water.
His father buy him a swimming circle and solve the problem.
One month later, when he take away the swimming circle, to our surprise, he still can't swim.
his father got mad and threw away his swimming circle.
At first, he struggled in the water but after he drank lots of water, he did realize that he have to change the way he behave.
These two points I think can support that parents should let children make mistakes.
I disagree with the statement that people today are more willing to help the struggling strangers, followed by three reasons.
Firstly, the rhyme of modern life becomes quicker so people pay more attention to their work and wouldn't stop their path to help struggling strangers.
With the development of society, citizens have to face a range of living problems and they are all struggling to meet the living requirements.
With the numberous work, people have no spare time to care about the strangers.
For example, if you are on the way to the company, would you really be willing to spend your little time on a losting older, which leads to a unsure consequence?
Balancing the feedback with the time you spend, the decision must be a dilemma.
Secondly, the risk of helping strangers becomes higher than the past.
There are plenty of real cases that the criminals utilized the compassion of victims to conduct crime.
Some criminals may pretend struggling strangers to approach victims.
Owing to these widespreaded cases, citizens prefer to protect themselves and decide not to be involved with the potential risk.
And they always believe that only the police can help those who are struggling.
Hence, people are used to refuse the ask for helping from strangers.
Thirdly, nowadays people care more about the feedback of what they have done.
Since the majority take the packback after the pay-out for granted, there are increasingly people who will struggle the feedback with the pay-out before they help strangers.
If the consequence is negative and filled with risk, they prefer to ignore it.
This kind of situation may be caused by the change of whole social environment.
Human tend to care more about the feedback.
And they are not willing to pay out for the struggling strangers.
At present, a controversial topic has aroused aheated debate: whether increasing the price of gasoline and electricity is the most effective way for the officials to encourage energy conservation.
Answers vary from one to another.
Some people claim that raising the prices of pertroline and electricity is indeed the most effective method for goernment.
However, contrary to their views comes my own perspective that there are other more effective way to help governors to resolve the problem of energy conservation.
My viewpoint is based on the following reasons.
First, publishing some laws to prevent the waste of energy should be taken into consideration by the government.

To be more specific, when governors stipulate some relevant laws and decrees,  people will increase their awareness of saving power and energy since if someone violates the decrees and disciplines, he or she will be punished or sentenced.
However, if government only raise the fees of electricity and gasoline, some people don't care for the little increase of the prices compared to the huge profits of some illegal industries.
For example, there was a factory near my hometown which generated plastic products for using only once.
Every year the factory pour the gasoline into rivers to decrease the cost, which cause waste odf ene.
After the relevant laws and regulation of the government, the factory stopped its production for fear of large amount of fines and then chose another business.
Second, developing high-technology which is used to save energy is also a better choice for the governors.
Specifically, by funding on the research of some technology which aim for energy conservation, the government is more likely to put them into practice in the near future.

In this case, the new inventions can not only save the exiseted energy but also make a huge amount of profits since people come to buy these products and then government could have extra funds to invest other research, which could form a positive circulation.
For example, after research of so many years, the cars powered by electricity come into the markets.
This kind of cars don't need gasoline any more and they won't charge for a long time.
Thanks to the investment from the government, the research on this kind of cars could go on well without the concern of lack money.
In conclusion, there are still other better choices for the government to encourage the energy conservation such as publishing laws and deceloping some technology.
When asked about their attitude about what benefit can students get from student organization and club activities, they always stay uncertain.
Some mention that students can learn as much as their academic studies, but from my prespective, academic studies will benefit much more than these student organization and club activities.
To begin with, the more student acquire about their academic studies, the higer chance for them to land on a high-paid job.
It is obvious that in this money-oriented market, what corporations really care about is the individual's mastery, which means that only one's academic studies matters in future life.
For example, nowadays, English is widely required for employees, if one spend too much time on student organization and club activities, there remains little time to get acquire of English.
The higer the salary is, the more skills are required.
Thus it is obvious that students can not learn these academic skills in student organization.
Furthermore, academic studies provides students with the chance to get access to those specialists and learn some personality from them.
It is hard to imange that without academic studies, how can these students at that age get these precious chances to learn form these masters.
However, student organization can not let students learn and acquire knowledge from them.
Anyway, these professors do have much more knowledge than students,
Last but not least, it is more likely for students to play with others rather than get benefit from others.
Take myself as an example.
Once I joined a study group in order to improve my English, and at the beginning of the study, we can spend time on reading and writting.
However, with we getting familiar with each other, we gradually begin chatting and playing with others, and finally I learned little from this activites.
All in all, academic studies can benefit more for students compared to student organization.

As the different family may have different ways to educate children, the question whether parents should let childre make mistakes so that they could learn from their own mistakes is a highly debated one.
Some people contend that letting children make mistakes is not a good way because the children should not face with too many difficulties in that young age, otherwise they are easy to be upset.
However, as far as I am concerned, it is significant for children to meet problemd directly and independently.
In this way, they can be more persistent in the future and they will remember the experience forever.
Above all, children will learn to be diligent and persistent when the parents let children make their own mistakes.
As an old saying goes, nothing in the world is impossible if you set your mind to do it.
During the process when children make mistakes and draw experience from it, they will gradually understand the meaning of the saying above.
Moreover, it is sure that children will remember it forever if they learn from their own mistakes.
For example, my parents just let me make mistakes when I was in a young age.
I was addictive to the video games at that time, but my parents never said anything about it.
However, after an important examination, I found that my grades were so bad that I dare not tell these to my parents!
Finally, I understood that the video games were just the obstacle in the way to success and I tried my best to remove myself from the games.
It was not easy but at last I succeed in doing it and I will never forget the miserable process.
Thanks to my parents, their special way of education helped me a lot.
They let me make mistakes and let me learn from it on myself and I will remember it forever that I should not be addictive to anything.
Admittedly, children may be upset if they make mistakes and their parents do not help them.
However, when children realize that they should face the problem on thier own, they tend to be effective and persistent.
It will leave them deeper impression after they solve the problem on themselves and learn from the mistakes.
As a result, the disadvantages of being upset are outweighed by the benefits of their learning from the mistakes.
To sum up, it is better for parents to let the children make mistakes.
Although this way of educating their children seems to be sort of strange, it is effective and it will pave the way for children's brilliant future.

I totally agree with that statement, as far as I am concerned, those kinds of abilities can benefit us in may aspects.
First and formost, when people have lots of things to deal with, the ability to plan and organize can help to solve problems in order.
There are times when things crushed in, and maybe people will have no idea of how to handle such a huge number of things, and be freaked out or even drived to crazy.

I had classes all day long, I had lots of assignment, and I had to study for some extra competitions and tests.

So the ability of planing and organize things is quite important.
Secondly, when people are facing something of significance, they have to have the abilities of planing and organization.
People always get nervous and anxious when they are faced with important things such as a meeting or an interview.
What my uncle does is that everytime when he has something improtant, he gets the full preparation in advance.

Currently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among public:  should people follow their dreams even if the dreams are ambitious of just focus on achieving realistic goals.
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some claims that it is better to focus on achieving realistic goals because it is easier in daily life.
However, i would hold an oppsite view that it is much more important to follow people's dream even if the dream is hard to achieve.
First, following your dreams means that people are doing something that they are really interested in, whcih means they can be extremely enjoyable.
Chasing your dreams shows that you are following your heart and you actually know what impress you.
Some people  just finish some realistic goals that they don't like and they even don't know why they have to finish these goals, which is the worst thing in one's life.
At least from my perspective it is.
Mayun, the most famous seller in China, are always following his dreams.
At his twenties years old, he wanted to establish a company that can change the state of shopping in China.
No one supported him and some of his good friends tried to let him back to be an English teacher again.
But he fellow his dreams and made efforts to achieve it.
When he shared the stories of himself in my university, he said that chasing the dreams are the happiest thing in the world.
Everyone should know that only can you enjoy your life by following your dreams.
Second, following the dreams that even may seem ambitious can make person to meet the better one of his own.
It is believed that if you consistantly try your best to focus on one thing, you will make a dramaticly  surprising process in this field.
My high school classmates Li and Hu, who are both really interested in playing the piano.

However, Li has been learning to play the piano for ten years and now can give a wonderful performance in front of people, while Hu just think he is not talented enough to learn well in playing the piano and give up playing and just focus on something that seems like easier or more realistic in his mind.
So, if you just follow your ambitious dream, even if it may be difficult to achieve, nothing possible.
In summary, from what has been discussed above, we can safely draw a conclusion that following dreams even if the dreams are ambitious can lead to a better life.

I think that watching movies and reading books definitely have more advantages than doing physical exercise.
There are actually many reasons that I can list, however, I just illustrate some of them.
By reading books, you can not only relax your body but also fulfill your knowledge.
For example, I used to be interested in history when I was about ten.
I always went to the school library after class.
seriously, I got a lot of precious information about ancient China, like the poet LiBai, the powerful denisty of Qin, the love story of famous people.

In my opinion, different books can provide different aspects of knowledge with you.

Unfortunately, I don't think that sports can promise these achivements.
Besides reading, watching movies is also a good choice for most people.
Fantastic pictures, interesting plot, moving story, exciting war always attract me a lot.

It always give me a feeling that I am the hero in that movie and it's me who saves the whole world.
Although it is silly, it is also fun!
What I think is the most obvious advantage of watching a movie or reading a book is that it won't make you exhausted like doing exerice.
Imagine that you have studied or worked all day, you just want to lie down and give yourself a good rest.
Will you choose to play basketball for another one hour?
I believe you won't.
Making delicious snacks and finding a comfortable position to sit and then reading a book seems a better choice.
You are able to relax your body and peacify your mind.
Anyway, exercise is essential to our health.
When you are free, you may give yourself a chance to do some sports.
But I recommand you to read a book or watch a movie when you want to truely relax yourself.

Nowadays, many people consider it more important to finish working quickly and take risk of making mistakes.

There are many reason why they highlight the significance of it: Finishing work earlier, they will not only have more time to do their own things but also be considered an efficient person by superior.
However, in my opinion, it is more important to make sure everything is correct even if it is more slowly.
First, the mistakes workers make sometimes upset the employers.
As is known to all, employers eager to recriut careful and reliable employees.
Handing in works without many mistake is more likely to entertain superiors even if workers use more time.
And as a superior, seeing a wonderful work from inferior may sweeten the mood whole day.
Beside, it is possible that the work the employers gave is really important.
If making mistakes, workers may cause the superior to lose some opportunities and irritates them, which means they may not recieve important project to do anymore, or even will be dismissed.
Furthermore, people will waste more time to correct their mistake later.

If the kind superiors mark the mistake for them and let them modify, the workers will only correst the mistake without eagering to improve their work, and they will make the same mistakes next time, which may costs them more time to modify in turn.
If the employer ask them to modify without pointing faults, much more time will be wasted because people can hardly find mistakes in their own work on their own.
And the revised work probably has many other place wrong and fails to satisfy the employer, which takes the worker additional time.

Despite the rapid development of today's society, parenthood is no more than a commonplace.
Recently, an interesting question has aroused heated discussion: Is playing sports better than doing schoolwork together when parents only have a little time with children?
Different people has differental views.
Some people prefer to doing sports.
However, others keep the opposite thought.
From my perspective, I think having fun playing sports is better.
My reasons are as follows.
To begin with, having fun playing games and sports is beneficial to children's physical condition.
Generally speaking, busy parents are likely to ignore the health condition of children, which is a fundamental element for personal development.

When playing sports together, parents can know the physical condition and be aware of health problem of children like maldevelopment of bones and decline in eyesight which can be exposed in children's performance.
For example, my nighbors always paly sports with their son at weekend because their are busy with work tasks and seldom have enough time with the child.
However, their child has a perfect body condition with little attention from parents in weekdays because the health problems are found in playing soprts and then solved in an early period.
On top of that, the relationship in family are firmed in a relaxing atomosphere during the process of having fun.
Children are likey to relax when playing games and sports, which leads to more communication with parents.
Interesting things in school, their recent condition and the issues that bother them are prone to be told to parents.
Gradually, parents know more about their children even they only have a little time with their kinds.
As a result, the relastionship between kids and parents becomes more solid.
On the contrary, kids are always stressed when the statement comes to the issues of schoolwork, which causes a nervous condition.
In this case, children do not want to talk about their recent condition of study and life, which is not good for their parent to know more about them.
Admittedly, doing things related to schoolwork has some advantages like parents can know children's study condition.
In the process of doing schoolwork together, parents have a view on their kids' study.
However, when bing compared with the two elements above, it is a minor factor.
Without having fun and playing sports together with the kids.
parents cannot improve children's health condition and firm the relationship in family.
To put it into a nutshell, I totally agree with the statement that playing games or sports is more important when parents have little time with kids.

The development of a city needs the government's help.
But whether the governments should pay more attention on the Internet access or the public transportation is debatable.

Some people think that the governments should mainly focus on the Internet access because ehis term really needs the government's support while other people believe that the governmmentw' should spend more money on public transportation because that is really something that benefit to most of the citizens.
However, I strongly advocate the latter, here are the reasons.
First of all, the problem of heavy traffic jam is grievous, which is more important for the governments to solve.
Nowadays, the population of the world is increasing which result that there are more cars on the road.
The more cars, the more serious the traffic jam.
Like in China, most people needs at least 40 minutes to get to work.
The time that spent on the traffic is pretty long but just useless.
As a result, time that could spent on the work wastes on the traffic.
It is really a pity and let people less effective.
Also, the terrible transportation of the city will also make the cilizens less satisfy with the governments.
However, the Internet access now is not in that hurry and is less important than the daily transportation.
Therefore, the government really should spend more money on the more terrilble transportaton.
Indeed, the number of cyber citizen is increasing, and the need is of thirst.
However, compared with dailt transportation, the Internet access is not that significant.
We can live without the Internet, however, we cannot live with out the basic transportation.
We can bear the lack of Internet equipment, but we cannot stand the bad system of the transportation.
Thus, the governments should pay more attention to the more important part of life---transportation.
All in all, it is less crucial for governments to spend money to upgrade the Internet access than to improve the pubic transportation.
Since almost every individual has a tight schedule in mondern sociaty which means they spend a little time on relaxing, the approaches of relaxing are extensively discussed.
Some people contend that sedentary quiet methods, like watching a moive and reading a book, are better.
Nevertheless, some holds an opposing view.
They prefer to relax by doing exercise.
As for me, I am not in favor of the statement.
I firmly believe that physical exercise is the best way to relax.
My opinion will be explained by analyzing the following reasons.
First and foremost,  physical exercise is conducive to mantaining our health, which is also the purpose of relaxation.
When we do exercises, we always breath in high frequency, absorbing more oxygion and getting the carbondoxide out of our body.
Activities will decrease our possibilities to get flu and strenghthen our immense system.
For instance, my dad, who runs 20 minutes everyday, didn't have an ill last year.
For this reason, physical exercise is a valuble way to relax.
On top of that, we can extend our social intership when we participate in team activities like basketball and football.
Meeting new people and having some topics with them provide us an excellent to relax in that they help you smooth your mind.
Take me for an example, when I am frustrated because of the tough project, I will feel better after talking to my basketball team member.
Therefore, we can be relaxed when doing exercise.
It is true that watching a movie alone and reading an attractive book quietly are useful ways to get relaxed, too.
Nonetheless, we have spare a large amount of our time sitting on the chair and before the desk.
So why don't we stand up and walk out, taking some fresh air and enjoying the warm sunshine?
To put it into nutshell, physical exercise relax both our body and mind.
At the same time, we befriend interesting people that we may never meet before.
For the above reasons, I strongly insist that physical exercise is the most effective and the best way to relax.

Nowadays the education of teenagers is really of great importance than ever before.
So many parents may use a lot of ways to stimulate their children to study to get higher grades.
Some may give their children much money to their high grades.
This phenomenon has successfully cause national concern these days.
Different people have different ideas towards this problem.
However, when the problem comes to me, I am totally against the way to give money to children to help them study.
To begin with, giving money to children may make our children have the feeling that they are syuding for money but not for learning knowleges and themselves.
So once parents stop to give them money for the prides of their grades, they will feel much disappointed and very upset and therefore reject to studying hard again.
This is a also a very serious problem.
Because once children study for get more money, they burry themselves into the ocean of knowlege and they won't feel the pleasure from study.

As far as I am concerned, if parents let their children study for money, they will also waste a lot of money which can be used to help their children to learn several usefull life skills or buy some interesting books to broaden their kid's horizons.
Besids that, there is another reason of me to oppose the way.
You know that it is very   important to cultivate children's creativity.

However, if parents offer them money for high grade they get in school, their creativity's development might be disturbded because children won't study hard or think hard or do some research or experiment on some difficult problems.
They only study to get much money.
What's more, to get more money from their parents , they may copy and cheat during the examination, which is also not good for their character's development.
Concluded from what I have mentioned above, I am definitely against the phenomenon that parents give their children money as a reward for getting high scores in school.
Recently, many people think that it is better to relax by watching a movi or reading a book than relax by doing physical exercise.
In my opinion, I disagree with this statement for some reasons.
First, doing physical could not only help us to relax ,but also help us to become healthier and develop the habit of exercising.
When we are tired of working or studying, we could do some exercise like running, riding bike ,playing basketball or so on.
We can choose one of the sports that we like best and enjoy the most, so we will have fun when doing the sprt.
After we finish doing the sports, we will feel satisfied and enjoyful that means we can go back to work as  better selves.
Second, as we all know ,many students enjoy playing computer games to relax in their free time ,playing cpmputer games is harmful to their eyes and a waste of time.

Doing physical exercise can help students to forget playing computer games, and when students want to do some physical exercise which require group working like basketball, football and badminton, they may ask their friends to paly with them, so the friendship between the students may become harder and they may make more friends during playing sports.

Third,watching a movie or reading a book is not a good way to relax because the stories may be so interesting and exciting ,that the people can not help watching or reading ,it may cause people forget to get back to work or study.
People may also keep thinking about the stories in the books or in the movies ,so thay may not focus on their work, and this will make them become less efficiency.
Watching a movie and reading a book also means that the people may just sitting without moving in a long period of time which are bad for their health.
Those are the reasons why I think it is better to relax by doing physical exercise than watching a movie or readinga book.

Recent years our society has undergone tremendous changes, the publics pay more attention on children's education, an intriguing discussion has arisen among people: whether students should be given more time to do things they like instead of doing homework or organizing school activities.
Answers vary from one one person to another.
The way I see it, it is crucial to give children more time to do what ever they want, my reasons and examples are given below.
First, more spare time can help student boost study efficiency.
Nowadays, students are under increasing heave pressure, the assignments and school activities take up most of their time, causing they feel exhausted and stressed out.
If schools give them more time, they can listen to music, watch a fantistic movie, play games outside with their friends and do other things they want.
It can help them release their stess and study more efficiently.
As far as I am concerned.
I usually spend time listening my favorite songs by Oasis to have a break during study, the melody can help me relax and more concentrated when continue studying.
Inaddition, children can be freinds with more people if they have more time.

If school require students to finish much homework and organize much campus activities, they have to be busy in school and quikly go home to do their homewoek, having no chance to communicate with others.
If they can have more time, they can travel or take part in some activities outside school, exposing them to new environment and giving them more chance to meet new people and make friends with them.
I remember that I met my best friend Mary during my trip to Sichuan province, it leave us  unforgetable memory.
Granted, doing homework can help students absorb more knowledge and do good to their study, which is important to all of them.
While more spare time can give them more freedom to do other meaningful things they want, it is conducive to help them become versatile.
Overall development is more indispansable for children.

To put in a nut shell, I contends children should have more time to do what they want, because it can enhance their study efficeincy and help them make more friends, which is beneficial to their all arounded development.
Recent decades have witnessed an obvious trend that people's living levels are becoming better and better.
Because of that, children's begin to get more money from their parents.
Many parents choose give much money which is equal with children's grade.
In my opinion, I don't support with this way to give money to children.
It is undeniable that it can helps to improve their activities for studing.
However, the negative effects induced by the greed for money should not be ignored.
When I was a senior high school students, I had a classmate who had not good grades.
She wanted some money to buy something about her hobbies, but her father told her that she should get good grade, then he would give her money.
So she began study hard to gain better grade.
Unfortunately, she hadn't enough determination to persist in hard-working.
But she also wanted to get money, so she chose to use a terrible way to gain her fathers aim, cheating.
The first time she had got a great grade, her father gave her a number of money, then she began to cheat in every examination.
Finally, in the final exam, she couldn't copy others answer, even she could be enrolled by any university.
I think the activity about studing need using more positive way to increase, money or interest exert an adverse impact on children's minds and values.
The more profits be used to entice children, the worse values and the more greed will influence them.
So as for me, I think equate money with grade is not a good idea.

To draw a conclusion, I am not support the behavior.
To encourage children to study hard, parents should use other methods to truly est their interest.

nowadays, a controversial topic aroused around a heated debate among people: whether they should follow their ambitious dreams or focus on achieving realistic goals.
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some people contends that people should purchase their original dream, even though it might be ambitious.

people with a achievable dream will be encouraged by their goals because they thought they can achieve it if they try out to do it.

I followd my father's suggest that focus on a achieving realistic goals and finally enter the TsingHua University.
Furthermore, people who focus on the achieving realistic goals will be more health than others.
People who want to achieve their ambitious dream have to work hard for it.
In that case, they have to study or work longer than others and may work until the midnight, which is obviously bad for their health.
Moreover, if they did not achieve their dream, they might be upset or even have the suicide tendency.
Imagine a man dreams to be the best singer around the world.
He practise the singing technic all days and sometimes keep singing for twenty hours, his must be tired and easy to get sick.
And if he did not achieve it, he may get some mental disease.

Moreover, traffic condition improves with the money with public transportation.
In other words, less accidents will happen.
If the government puts more money in public transportation, some old facilities can be replaced to new ones, some safe problems will no longer exist.
