Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people:whether the time today's people spent to cooking or preparing food is more than the time people spent in twenty years.
Opinions vary from people to people.
Some claim that it is true that people are tend to spend much time cooking in th kitchen.
As for me, I wholeheartedly agree that the people living in twenty years before spend much time cooking than the people living today.
My points can be elaborated as followed.
First of all, people have no time cooking by themselves.
As we all know, nowadays, most people fight for their living by working very hard, and there are many competitions and tasks waiting for them every day.
So they can hardly spare time to enjoying a meal, how can they have time to cook and prepare the foods by themselves?
Take myself as a example.
I used to work in the Tencent company, and I always stayed up late into midnight because the task was too hard for me to finish before the due day.

Only on the weekend, I can stay at home and cook an easy dinner for myself, which just cost me about half and hour because I wanted to spent most of my resting time sleeping or watching some movies to relax myself.
In addition, there are many choices for people to select how can they have for a meal now.

As we all know, fast food restaurants have sprung up recent years and more and more people are fond of this delicious food because fast food is cheap and do not need to wait as the process of making it is very simple.
Unlike the traditional food which cost people plenty of time and money to cook it, various versions of food gets popular easily.
For example, my cousin is a cook, however, he never cooks at home because he is more likely to buy something to eat in the fast food restaurants which have lots of recipes for him to choose.
And he can even have different meals in one month in the same restaurant.

With the development of the society, people always feel extremely tired aftering finishing their whole-day work.
Thus, more and more people are looking for suitable ways to relax themselves.
The opinions on ways to relax vary from people to people.
Some people suggest that they should watch an funny movie or read the book they are interested in aftering working, while others prefer to do some outdoor exercise.
As far as I am concerned, I hold the opinion that it's better to relax by doing physical exercise than by watching a movie or reading a book.
Firstly, the serious fact is that more and more people feel pain in their shoulders because of a whold day working in front of the computer.
If people still sit on their chair to watch the movies or read books, it will not do good to thier health at all.
Only if doing some physical exercise can they cure the pain and gain a healthy body.
Secondly, exercise will help you keep fit and get rid of some fatty problems.
If you want to look good on the beach, doing some physical exercise must be your best choice.

Last but not least, if you don't want to do exercise yourself or be afraid that you can't consist on everyday sports plan, you can call for some colleuges to go with you, which may enclose your relationship and help you make more friends.
Nevertheless,many people may argue that they will feel more tired after doing sports.
However, this can't be the reason that you say no to all exercise.
If running for a mile makes you breathless and unbearable, you can also work for a mile.
The way that you exercise yourself is based on yourself, which means that you can choose the most suitable way for yourself.
In a short, doing some physical exercise can be the most suitable way after a whole-day work.
Hope that you can find the best sports to relax yourself.

In fact,is true that many parents give their children some money after they have got a high grade.
But I think using this way to encourage children isn't  good .
Their scool-age children maybe just too young,they don't know how to keep money or how to spend it.
And the money perhaps become a thing which they show-off to satisfy their vanity.
They will also compare wtih their firends:how much money did I get.
And in our real  life,we can see many news about this topic too.
Last week, I see a nes on TV,that a 12-year-old child spent 2000yuan on TAOBAO to purchase something for game.
And this money came from his last test.
He has got 100 on math;his father gave him 5000 to encourage him.
I was totally shock when I heard the news.
This phenomenon might happen in my scool life,but it wasn't so serious.
I've realized that is a very big problem now.
As I've mentioned before,the school -age children didn't know how to spend money at all,they just buy the things they want,they don't care about if it's expensive or useful.
And these money probably let them waste the money...
There are so many disadvantage.
On the other hand,encouraging children propriately is  important too.
But we should not give moneyto them.
Money can purchase many things but it has many negative effects too.
We can praise them or cook a good meal for them or take them to watch the movie which they like the most.
But I think we should avoid the prize physical.
In my opinon,offer their scool-age children for their high grade is a bad idea to encourage children.
But we shouldn't forget to encourage them.
We should let they konwï¼šthey are good,they do the best.
As parents attach more and more importance to a child's grade in school, they begin to think of as  ways as possible in order to encourge their child to perform better in the lessons.
One choice is to reward them by offering things that they want, such as books, toys, video games, etc.
As days move on, some parents start to set money as a reward for the high grade.
In my perspective, I am totally agree with this kind of encouragement.
The reasons are describled below.
Money is needed even by the school-age children, therefore it is encouraging for the children to get a good mark in the school.
They may use money to buy things that they really want instead of accepting the gifts offered by their parents.
This is a motivation of high grade in school.

When I was in the elementary, I was always hoping to own my football so that I could organize my friends to play together, and parents promised that they would offer me some money to buy a football or whatever I like, if I got a good mark on the coming math exam.
By that means, I worked very hard and eventually I was rewarded by the money.
To provide money for the high grade teaches children how to earn money by their own hands.
As children are not capable to do other works to gain money for their own use.
What could they do if they feel like not demanding from their parents for doing nothing.

Therefore, parents find a reason to give them the chance to show that even children have the ability to earn some money, by working hard and getting a high grade, this will increase a child's fulfillment, which is a helpful way to gain an independent character, as indicated by some developmental psychologists.

Although, to encourage the child by offering money may mislead their intention of study, it is actually a good way to make sure that they have acquire the basic knowledge for their further study and even contains a good impact on their career in the future.
As it is known to us all, that children prefer to play and study makes them upset.
And this fact results in a failure of the grade which may leads to a more profund negative impact on children, worse is that children are not able to notice that.

Parents, as a consequence, should not only persuade them to learn hard by talking but also they are obliged to offer some direct reward, just as some video games could provide them, money is a better choice.

With the remarkable progress of education, the tasks that the teachers assign are more and more multiple, so does the formation.
Nowadays plenty of teachers would like to assign groupwork projects since in this way students can benefit a lot, including improving the studying efficiency.
On the other hand, lots of people casts doubt on working together because there would be someone who rarely devote themselves into the task.
From my perspective, I agree with that students can learn more effentively by working with others mainly for the following reasons.
To begin with, students can learn different ideas from others towards the intact task.
Different people have different thoughts, some are deeper and some are shallower.
Students may see the same task from various aspects and get all kinds of ideas.

By exchanging their thoughts through the discussion, students can have better understanding towards the assignment and may see it as a whole, thus doing a better job within a comparatively short time.
Last time when we did our accounting homework within a group, we four girls had totally different ideas about how could technology affect the accountants, so we had a heated brainstorm.
We not only learnt a lot from each other, but also did a really good job in this assignment.
We were highly praised by the professor for the amazing ideas from different aspects.
On top of that, students can concentrate more when working together.
When cooperating with others, people can't help considering about their own impression on others, which can lead them to show their responsibility.
So they will totally devote themselves into the task and stay more focus.
Let's go back to the last example, we four girls paid high attention when doing the assignment.
We almost spent all the time looking for the information and discussing without anybody doing anything elss.
So we finished it within two days, although if we did on our own, it would take us much longer.

I don't agree with the statement that nowadays people are more willing to give a hand to strangers in need.
First and foremost people today are too hectic to pay attention to others around them.
It's even harder to feel sympathy for passerbys.
Take myslef as an example.
I have a great deal of schoolwork to be done so I usually walk quickly from home to class.
I sometimes see people looking around as if there were lost.
But I seldom approch them and offer help because I was so busy.
As life getting busier and swifter, people can hardly take care of their own things not to mention paying attention to strangers.
Secondly people today are not as benevolent as those in the past.

To illustrate when I walk on the street these days, fewer people are willing to give money to a poor beger, most of which would simply walk past them without even spare them a glimpse, let alone to be amicable enough to do them a favor.
While technology makes comunication easier, people are somehow getting more undetached.
It's a pathetic trend but there's not much we can do to change it.
Last but not least the social security system in present day is better than any time and it's simple to look for any information we might need on the internet.
So when being put in a tight spot we are getting more accustomed to help ourselves so we might think it the same for others.

Like when trying to get to a unfamiliar place I always look up for the map in my mobile phone, which makes me consider that other people can save the same problem by themselves thus they  don't actually need my help.
In this way I could become less and less willing to help a stranger finding his or her way on the street.
In summary, with the change of lifestyle and the feeling of indifference, I think people today are less generous to help a struggling stranger.

Can you imagine what things would like to be if our school-age children, a new and young generation in the future always fight for higher grades just because they can get some allowance from their parents after this?
Have you ever thought what kind of consequence would appear if children become slaves of money in such a young age just because their studying?
Both of the answers are definitely not really optimistic, simply becasue they are just children who are in the developing process.
Few things can be more terrible if they turn into a money-chasing people so early, this is really harmful to them.
It is obvious that the parents are not good at cultivating children if they just giving money to children if they socre high grade.
This kind of giving money to such a young generation would cause them to be accustomed to having a idea in mind that just good grades can bring money to us.

So even after these children growing up, they may still have this kind of thought, even though they have good grades, their attitudes to the life will have been changed, because they still hope to get money from their parents.
But have you ever thought what would happen to them if their parents are not exist any more?
Can they still receiving money from their old parents?
Obviously, they cannot, and this is why it is not a good idea to give money to childfen for each high grade.
And also another disadvantage in this kind of behavior is existing.

Not that every single child are genuine want to fight hard to score high grade to get money, some of them may choose to use other ways to receive higher grades, just like cheating in exams, lying to their parents that they have high grades and so forth.
This may cause them get worse habits, becasue these habits are not moral even not legal.
But as young children, they may don't know this, so it is easy for these children to step into wrong ways in their future lives.
Above this, giving money to children for each high grade are not reasonable.
As a consequence, there is no better way to encourage and praise children to admit their grades than to give money to them for each high grades.

When there are a varieaty of information list infront of you, you must not distinguish shem and just follow the public news sources.
Some people think that different news sources can completely show us the information.

In this society, more and more news sources make up the fake information in order to make profits.
To sum up, we can not get information from different news sources because that behaviour has not sence and waste time.
We can just follow the public news sources or check out the trues.

Then I changed my plan to work for a whole day to write the paper and finished it in only three days.
It is natural to conclude that If people can arrange their working time in a shorter time, they will have higher speed of working.

It's undeniable that relaxation is an indispensable part of our life.
Nevertheless, when it comes to the efficient relaxing method, our choices vary from person to person.
For instance, I prefer to watch a movie or read a book to relax rather than do physical exercise.
First of all, doing physical exercise will inevitablely consume energy, which will eventually make you even more exhausted.
As far as I am concerned, getting home with tired body and clothes immersed by sweat are never goning to become synoymous with effective relaxation.
By contrast, watching a movie or reading a book dose not require any physical movement.
Moreover, when watching a movie , you can find yourself a cozy comfortable position to save your body out of the bland work before.
There is no need for instensive physical action for your body to suffer any more.
Secondly, while doing physical execise make enhance your body strength, reading a book or watching a movie is capable of enriching your spiritual world.
It is conspicuously acknowledged that spiritual happiness and gratitude overwhelm a strong body.
During the progress, you might learn something about dealing with daily annoyance while laugh out loud at some really hilarious scenes.
In a more positive light, while your mind enjoyed a leisure time, your body will simultaneously restore its strength from the consumption before, preparing you for another session of work or study.
As has mentioned above, the method of relaxation may be diverse, therefore, one's personal preference is most likely to suit himself only.
Chances are that doing physical exercise like running for 2000 meters strength the man's body and in the mean time give him the sense of achievement of finishing a tough task.
Thus, it's even more significant for everyone not only to relax but also discover the precisely right way for himself to relax.
Many people think that working five days a week for shorter houes is more enjoyable than working only three days for long hours.
Because they think they can have enough time to finish their tasks, and these can make them relaxing.
But, I do not think so, personally speaking, although working for a long time, it can help us the ability of  focusing on doing something.
First, working three days a week for along hours, which means we can have enough time to rest and to reduce the pressure which are made of working time.
For example, my uncle is a worker, and he has many tasks need him to accomplish, but there are two options to him to choose.
Working only three days but long hours or working five days but for shourt hours.
At last, he chooses the first method unhesitatingly , because in his perspective, he can have four days to relax himslf, and if he can finish the task in a short , which can make him more efficient.
Second, many work need the workers to work interruptedly, becase the work is very specific.
To illusrate, the cop, who manage the traffic.
The cars on the road all time and they need some to administrat, so the cops play a essencial role in this process.
Therefore , the cop need to work for long hours but few days a week.
If they do not do this, they can not hand over very well.
And it will be very difficult to manage the traffic.
In conclusion, I think work for a long hours but few days a week will be more enjoyable.
It can make us more efficient and we can focus on doing something.
It's agood idea.

Issues related to choosing jobs have never failed attract people' s attention.

Recently, a heated debated topic arose in the public: whether people can benefit more by choosing jobs that are similar to their parents' jobs than choosing jobs that are very different from their parents.
Some people believe that it is better for children to choose jobs that are similar to their parents.
However, in the ultimate analysis, I contend that children can benefit more by choosing jobs that are quite diffrent from their parents' jobs.
To begin with, having jobs which are different from the jobs of the parents helps students  to develop themselves.
To be more specific, if children have very different jobs from those of their parents, it means that their parents are not familiar with their children' s jobs.
Thus, it is hard for the parents to provide help for their children.
So, when children encounter difficulties in their work such as failling to complete projects, being confusing about the information of the jobs and so on, they only can depend on themselves.
Thus, children can do their utmost and explore new knowledge on their own to solve the problems.
it is more likely for them to develop and have ability to find solutions of problems in the future.
On the contrary, if children have jobs that are similar to the jobs of their parents, it is more likely for their parents to offer them help when they are in trouble.
Therefore, it is more possible for the children to rely on their parents to give their help.
It is hard for them to make progress.
In the second place, children can study more knowledge if they own jobs which are different with their parents' jobs.
As  children can study lots of information in the field of jobs that they choose.
Also, they can be conducted different kind of information about the area of their parents' jobs.
Therefore, children can have more knowledge.
Take my sister as an example, she liked art very much so she chose to become an artist when she graduated, whereas her mother was an engineer and her father was a doctor.
She told me that she gained lots of more professional skills when she worked.
And her father told her some medical knowledge so that she could take care of herself and know when she sicked, what kinds of medicines she needed to eat.
Her mother also taught her knowledge about math and engineering, it helps my sister improved a lot.
So, she became knowledgable and she was more likely to become a well-rounded person.
To conclude, judging from all the reasons listed above, I stronger believe that it is more beneficial for children to choose jobs that are quite different from their parents.
For children, they can not only develop themselvs but also become more knowledgeable.

My cousin used to be a lazy child who really hated his school life, and my uncle was fed up with it but couldn't do anything to change  this situation.
I knew my cousin was a truly smart boy, and so eager to be independant from his parents.
The idea that offering him money for each grade he get in school came out.
I talked with my uncle and he said he would consider this approach.
After a long absence, when I see my uncle again, he doesn't show any bad mood when the topic goes to the children's school marks.
He is so happy to see my cousin to make such a big progress in the final exam.
But I still tell him that money is not the peak my cousin should reach.
And this approach can never be pernament.
If he wants my cousin to achieve more than this, he should tell him the differences between the money and dream.
In a word, money can be used as tool, but not a goal for child to reach.
In the modern world , there is no parents who do not want their children to have a great job ,a highly-esteem status and a grand amount of family weath in the future .
To accomplish these goals while the kids are still young ,parents need to render their kids to have better grades in the school.
However ,some parents  use their business way to stmulate kids ,binding money with their grades.
I cannot agree with this action.
Firstly ,indeed ,the money based stimuli will effctively refine kids' study impulse .
Kids have  very clear goals to pursue ,maybe something they want to buy .
In the light of this ,they will absolutely become active and positive in their study and even assiduous.
But what a kid will feel is only the appeal of money and materialism, not the calling of knowledge and want to explore deeper  into the thoery.
The will jeopardise his habits and make him have a stereotype which nothing in the world is more important than money .
What this will cause is dim and moneycentrism in his future.
Secondly,if the kids get higher marks in the test ,they ask even for more money ,whether those parents will offer them is a question .
In addition ,for those who do not have much budget to offer their kids money as long as they have  good results,parents will even induce economy problem within their family .
And as long as they cease to provide their kids with "scholarship",their kids will lose momentum to study immediately for there is nothing worth them to purse anymore.
Lastly,more money for kids is not neccassary  a good sign.
Many kids in the school age cannnot control themselves and buy many infeorior goods such as rubbish food .
If kids cannot control themselves well ,they may evevn fall into some problems such as somking or drinking due to they are rich.
A kids with amount of money is even not safe as if bad guys know that someone carry much money which their parents give them and rob them.
In a word ,parents offer their kids money is not a good idea at all due to future consideration ,study impluse and management problems .
Hope parents   elicit the implicit interets in their kids and al  of them can have great lives after grown up.
As the development of the society, more and more people began to question the traditional lifestyle.

Some people still advocate the traditional lifestyle--- work five days a week for short hours because it has through the test of time; other people argue that work only three days a weekfor long hours is more effective.
However, I strongly believe that the traditional lifestyle is better, here are the reasons.
Firstly, working for longer hours may increase health problems, and illness of course makes people painful and less enjoyable.
Working for long hours may mean sleep later and get up earlier which against our biology clock.
There is an old chinese saying: get up early and go to sleep early makes a man healthy.
The only thing this disorder lifestyle can do is to make us more tired, sleepy and less effective.
I am a very good example of this.
When I was going to finish my primary school, I decide to study harder.
I changed my bedtime and rising time.
I went to sleep later and got up earlier.
As a result to my new living habit, my grade decreased---I am too tired to focus my attention on the subject, the only thing I wanted to do was just sleeping.
And my immune system became to be more feeble.
The study is like that and the work is of the same principle.
And without a good healtth, you almost cannot do anything!
Anything you do is mysterable In conclusion, work five days a week for shorter time leads to a heathier life and makes people more effective.
Admittedly, working for longer hours can achieve longer recreation period.
But, we can also have a rest during summer and winter vovation!
All in all, it is less satisfy to have a job where you work only three days a week for long hours than to have a job wher
we work five days a week for shorter hours

In this highly competitive world, we always want to represent our ideas to others, then we have a way to spred them out loud: the advertisement.
When we mention the ad, people always realize one thing, that is the whether we could 100 percent to believe the advertisement products.
Nowadays, there is an increasing number of people holds that the function of ads products should not be trusted because they are always overly boasted and we cannot see what products really like.
But they are not always just boasting all the time, ads have their own advantages sometime.
Ads sometime have ingredient of boasting, which means that ads can make some goods seem much better than they really are.
For instance, there was a famous brand of mineral water, Nongfu Spring, which was the most popular water in China onece.

Their ad goes like some people annoucing that how safe and well water they have and a man drinking Nongfu Spring, then have a expression which looks like he is really enjoying this water, and he says 'Nongfu Spring is a little sweet'.
This maybe something new for people during years ago, this is because people have never seen that kind of ads before.
Then all the people wanted to try that water, but unfortunately, they cannot feel a little sweet at all.

And few years ago, there was a huge event came: the government inspect the quality of the water, it said that Nongfu Spring was not on the safe water's degree, and there were some harmful ingredients in it.
So this just conveys that ads could make products better than they really are, sometime can even judge bad to good.
Admittedly, ads could make products seems much better than the real thing, but we should know that all the people in the world have the same flavor.
It is about our ways of thinking, perspective, and sense of one thing.

We cannot say whether one product bad or great, all of us have our own feelings, just like cars, watches, even some neck chains, we cannot blame ads just because we don't like them, this is just our own opinion to one object, not the ads' problem.

Education is a hot topic up until now because education is very important in one's life, especially for young children who are in their golden age.
As for the attention of parents, do they are more involved in their children's education than were parents in the past?
From my perspective, I will say yes.
Because they think education more important than before and they have more time to care their children's study.
First, people take education more importantly than did they in the past.
The knowledge and skills are very important for a current person.
They rely on what they learned to earn their lives and get established in society.
Take  my young sister for an example, my mother treats her strictly in her study.
My sister must get up early in the morning to have a reading and do her homework before playing.
My mother care my sister's every exam performance.
When in summer break, my sister has to attend so many interest classes, like piano class, painting class and so on.
However, when I was young, my mother did not care my study at all because She thought I can also have a good life without knowledge.
Besides, parents have more time to put on children's study.
With the development of the society, people's life become better and better.
They begin to enjoy their lives not only care for their bread.
The parents have more time to take care of their children's study.
For instance, my uncle never cared my niece's study in the past when she was young.
Nowadays, with getting a high score in a final exam, some children will be rewarded some money wich enable them determine how to use.
Imagine the circumstance that two kids both get the asset but one of them is just 6 years old and the other will be an adult soon after, what would you think of their behavior?
Obviously, this problem should be treated distinctively under different situations.
Firstly, the rewarded money enable mature kid to foster their asset management facility.
However, the kid need to learn how to spend money on things that benefit themselves.
Despite the fact that children always lack of self-control right now, with their age growing, how to manage their money has been more and more crucial for them.
In contrast, this skill is not rapidly necessary for young people who could be rewarded by a specific thing like a pair of shoes instead of money.

Scondly, the kids who is mature enough would understand what the rewarded money means, and they will be stimulated to study harder even than before, which would not happend on the young kid because of their simple thinking.
It is more possible for young kids to regard the asset as a signal that the money can be used unlimited rather than a award, which may be dangerous for their growth in the future.
Thirdly, the asset permit mature kids to enhance their horizon by using on their hobby, but the young kid would not do that although they also have their own hobby.

Nowadays,more and more people choose money as encouragement for their children.
This phenomenon has rised a debate about is it a good idea to do it?
Different people may have different attitude towards it.
According to my opnion,it is a good idea to use money as reward for children got good grades.
First,giving money as a reward will makes children feel the love of the family.
how to reward a children with good grades is a big problem for a lot of families.
But if you give money as reward which is similiar to the scholarship in university, the problem will completely solved.
The children will feel the love of his family and will not feel upset for no rewards.
For example,my sister just got her scholarship in her university last semester.
In order to encourage her, her parents have thought about a lot of ideas.
But finally,they choose to reaward her with the money which is the most useful things for her.

And it can prove my opinion.

For example,one of my roommate has this kind of tradition when he was young,he definitely motivated by this and got good grades when he was young.
But this also lead to some bad habits which makes him become a mean person.

But if we can make good way to do the reward,I believe that it still ha m We can see from the discussion above that offering money to the children as reward may not be a completely perfect things but it has more good benefits that the bad influences.
So I would like to say that the idea to reward money to school-aged children is not a bad idea.

As far as I am concerned, I agree the measure the parents take to motivate their school-age children getting higher grade.
Offering their children money has two advantages from my oppion.
First of all, it is efficient for child to motivate themsevles to get higher grades.
As for me, I have been praised by the measure and because of that present I was more and more interested in study.
I still remember that day in which I got an A in an exam.
Back home, I told my mother the scole as usual.
To my surprise, my mother gave me 10 yuan as present!
Although it was only the 10 yuan, it had a different meaning in my mind and was valuable for me because it means I was be recognized by others.
Therefore, I was harder than before and recently became an undergraduate in my ideal university.
Second, offering money as a pressent is a simple way for parents to praise their children.
If not using money, some parents will buy other gifts for their children which may be not liked by their children and make themselves and their children unhappy.
Take my friend's experience as an example.
My friend is really good at math and her grades are A every time.
Her parents will buy her a nice gift.
However, I sometimes would see her unhappy.

on an opportunity I asked why she is not happy even if she had an A, and she told me that her parents always did not know what she really want and often bought something she dislikes or boring for her.
However, she had never enough money to buy something she likes.
Thus, I think for some parents offering money is a good way satisfying both parents'need and children's need.

As a word, I agree the measure that suggest some parents offer their children money for their high mark, which can motivate their children to get higher marks and be a good way to meet the children's need.
It is a really excellent idea.
I'm afraid that I don't agree with the parents' behaviours.
Here's my reason.
First of all, school-age children may usually have such a doubt "why should I learn this boring things and it seems they will never be used in my life again".
By giving them money as a reward, these parents give them an answer:" learning these things is for a high grade".
The harm that gives the children such an thought is not clear, but it will gradually begin to work.
It will make the children think that "knowledge is not important itself, what truely matters is a high mark" .
In other words, what the children think highly of is not knowledge but a high mark that can be exchaged into money.

So it will not be surprising that some children may cheat during exams because in their opinion of value, only the mark and the result is important, none of the other things, such as knowlegde, honestness or means of getting a good mark can be the same.
Sadly, such a child may loss passion in the process.

He may no longer cherish the hard working process with his schoolmates, what is actually the most meaning memory of our school life, he may no longer seem the fruit of hard working as a treasure, instead he may think it just a waste of time because it isn't that efficent.
I can still remember when I was young, my mom treated me with the same way as the parents do.
It works in some perspective that my grades increase at a high speed, however that make me a different kid as before.
I thought grades are everything.

I may laugh at my classmates who work hard but fail to do well in his remarks, and I only wanted to become friends with those who have good grades even if they were not kind persons and loved to trick on others.
Points may be important, but it is important because it is a witness of our hard working.
However, if the parents do so, points become the only important thing, low points by hard working means nothing, high points without hard working can still be a reason of awards and cheers.
I think it is deadly harmful to a child's growth.

With the advent of new technologies in this era of industry and machines, cars have become a major means for transportation in our life.
Cars offer a wide variety of services and enhance our lifestyle.
The question in here is that whether cars would be as much popular as it is today in twenty years.
I agree with statement that cars will be less used in the future are my justifications.
To begin with, new technologies will make people less likely to drive cars for transportation.
With modern public transportation systems available almost anywhere, individuals would rather using a punlic transportation because of several important reasons.
They are not only less expensive, but also more convenient.
For instance, if one tends to travel with bus, he or she has to pay a samll amount of money for the ticket, which the cost is shared by all the people using the bus.
Moreover, oublic transportation is more facile.
Considering metro system, it is fast and effecient and could give you access to all sections of the city.
In contrast, using car is expensive and frustrating, due to high traffic congestion in current large and populated cities.
What is more, internet and social communicational systems provides us with a number of ways to contact others.
Let us take a typical example to shed light to this point.
Using internet, managers held tele-conferences or use video calls to do their bussiness.
Furthermore, relatives and friends could keep more contact using social networks rather thantravelling a long distance using cars to visit each other.
Besides the aforementioned reason, environmental issues lead to less car utilization.
Everyone is aware of the common worldwide problems such as air pollution, global warmin, depletion of oil and gas reservories and loss of animal habitats.
The more the cars are used and fuel is burned, the more air pollution and its concomitant hazards would be.
Hence, due to bothe the people's awareness of the imminent dangers and governmental legislation and fiscal, fewer cars will be used in twenty years.
What is more,  energy crisis is another prominent reason leading to less use of cars.
Scientists forecast that the world oil and gas reservoirs will be depleted in less than a century if we keep up this high rate of oil production and fuel usage.
As a rule, these examples clearly illustrate the previously mentioned fact.
All in all, among the prominent reasons in support of the topic.
I think that technologies and environmental problems are the major reasons.
I substantiate the fact that there will be fewer cars in use than there today.

In recent decades, as high grades standing for a conscience learning attitude and an advancement in academics, great significance has been attached to the marks that school-age children get in school.
Consequently, many parents have developed a money-rewarding method to encourage their children to gain achievement in academic performances.
From my perspective, this is not a good method, because it migh cause many side effects such as bad spending habits, focusing on monetary things rather than academic issues and so on.
First of all, money is always related to materialism and academic is something spritual.
An equal can never be drawn between two different categories.
Encouraging the children by rewarding money for hign mark might probably led to the wrong opinion.
Children might think that everything in academics is money-related because this is the only motivation for them to be better involved in learing.

The wrong pattern will inevitably cause failure because the real reaserchers and scientists are those who have a intense interest in the fields that they are working on and money won't bring the authentic interest in learning.
Nevertheless, the money-rewarding pattern for school age children might cause wrong spending habits.
Children in that age are too naive and they have no idea how to deal with the money they have been awarded.
As we all know, children are not sensible and they purchase any thing they want if it is affordable.
Under this circumstances, many wrong choices will be made.
If things continue in this way, they will have a hard time changing this troublesome habit when they grow up.
This is absolutely what we don't want to see in the future.
To, summarize, the money-rewarding pattern does more harm than good, consequently it is totally avoidable, there are many other ways to encourage the children to learn better.

Do you remember the last time you percitipate in some volunteer activities hosted by your mommunity?
Nowadays it's common scene that many young people are not willing to spend time helping their communities, which I don't regard as a positive phenomenon.
From my perspective, I maintain the lack of time and desire to take part in these activities can account for this situation.
Firstly, young people are busy and are deficient in spare time.
Faced with increasingly intense competition, people's spare time is being compressed constantly, especially young people.
Under these circumstances, the youth have a preference for things which can be of  benefit to their future.
Futhermore, being fully awared of this intense competition, their parents perhaps don't want their children to waste time on things which aren't beneficial.
For example, my uncle's son are required to take part in both piano lesson and painting lesson during the summar holiday.
Consequently, my little niece has to get up early praticing piano in the morning and draw several paintings in the afternoon.
This is the situation that everyone could be confronted with.
So the youth don't have enouth time to devote to the community activities.
Moreover, the desire of the young people to help with the community is decreasing.
With the recreation choices increasing, young people can get a lot of fun when they play computer games or wath TV.
When you compare the profit you obtain from take part in study program or help the community, you can figure out whiich activities attract those young people more.
In this demanding society, it is getting harder and harder to get a good job.

And whenever asked about whether it's better for children to choose jobs that are similar to their parents jobs than jobs that are not related to their parents' jobs, parents always exhibit an air of uncertainty.
However, I wholeheartedly agree that it is better to choose similar jobs.
First, children can make less mistakes if they take similar jobs to parents' jobs.
Parents may have been in the field for many years, so there are a lot of things that they can tell their children.
And every person will make mistakes, so parents must have made mistakes.
In this way, they will tell their children what to do and what not to do in order to avoid the same mistakes that they have made before.
Moreover, parents are experienced, so they can tell their children how to do their job better.
In this way children will know more about the job and make less mistakes.
Then, children can get relationships with important people easier.
Parents must know a lot of people who are also working in their field, because they have spent maybe a couple of years to establish good relationships with those people.
So if children take similar jobs, their parents can just introduce their children to those people.
And children won't have to spend a long and tough time try to get close to those people.
And maybe some people their parents know can help their jobs a lot.
Last but not the least, take simimlar jobs can be good to the whole family.
Some parents may have devoted their whole life to their own companies, so it can be better if their children can take over the companies.
Nowadays, many parents have a successful company, which runs very well.
There are not only material things but also spirits, efforts and memories in the company.
In this way, it can be a pity that the company will just shut down.
So, if the children can take the same or similar jobs to their parents', the company will not have to shut down.
And maybe the company can be ran from generation to generation.
Every one in the family will be happy about this.

Due to the busy work, more and more parents have to be faced with the problem that they do not have a lot of time to spend with their children.
Some parents choose to use the limited time to have fun playing games or sports with their children.
Others hold the opinion that it is best to use that time doing things together that are related to schoolwork.
As far as I'm concerned, the first one is a better choice.

First of all, playing games with children is a great way to enhance relationship, because of the busy work, parents have a little time to spend with their children, children seldom meet their parents.
So the distance in heart between parents and children might become very long.
Playing game like basketball or football can effectively slove such a problem.
These kind of team sports can make children feel that they are closely related to parents and enhance their relationship.
Take myself as an instance.
because of his work, I couldn't see my father for several months.
I felt that I became unfamiliar with my father.
But in a basketball game, I fight with my father and beat our enemy .
I felt that my father is closely related to me, he will always stand by myside and help me face the challenge.
Our relationship become close again.

On the contray, doing things that related to schoolwork might make children feel that their parents only conceren their grade, and things related to schoolwork mostly don't like basketball or soceer, give participants a feeling of sticking together and fighting together.
Secondly,  most of children don't like schoolwork.
If they are forced to do schoolwork with parents, they may dislike or hate their parents.
On the contray, games are something that most children like.
if their parants invite them to play, they are likely to be happy and have a good feeling with their parents.
Schoolwork is important, however, building a good memory with your children is far more important than it.
Supposed you are  parents, what kind of children do you want to see, filled with memory that play happily with you, or filled with memory that sorrowly do something that he disklike with you?
So we can easily draw a conclusion that have fun playing games with children is a better choice.

Firstly, exercise can help me to be more health.

The things you worry about always spark in your mind.
Owing to this, reading or watching may have limited positive affect on your worry.
The last but not the least, physical exercise have more advantages for having new friends.

Thus, it can be easy for you to meet someone who are doing the same sports.
You can imagine that youcan talk with your friends when you are jogging, playing basketball or playing volleyball.
Also, there is a servey shows that one can be less depressed when he or she is accompanied by others.
In a word, I think doing physicla exercise is more benificial than wathcing movie or reading books, as the sports can be more effective to decrease our stress.
About the arguement that parents should give there school-age children extra money for a high score or not, I think parents should not give there children this kind of pocket money.
I have three main reasons for holding that.
Above all, students have to know that they study for themselves not for their parents.
As we all known, student is a kind of charactor that regard learning as their own business, so a reward student is probably incorrect according to that.
Students are unable to judge correct and incorrect, if their parents give them extra salary for studing they may think that they study for their parents.
Even worse, they may connect the score to the money but not the judgement of their study.
One of my friend, however, live in a family that parents think child need to be awarded.
At all time she make a great answer, she is rewarded.

After about two years, when her parents think that it is time to develop her ability of learning on her own, she really make a decrease in every exams just because she think that if the parents do not give money, study is useless.
This is a strong evidence of the nagative influence on childs.
Secondly, this increase the bad study habit or even cheating.
We all knows that burn midnight oil is not correct for the school-age students because it may damage their physical and mental health.
But driven by the money, we can easily imagine what students will do.

According to a research maded by a educational university, over half of the high school student stay up late for studing to get a great score which means that if most of the students can get money from a high score, the situation will become worse.
I've heard that, answer of an important exam in high school grade twelve is worth about fifty CNY, and parents' reward of that kind of exam probably as high as two hundred CNY.
In this case, it is clear that some of students may try that kind of dishonest activity just because economic benifits.
After all, there is one day that students become adults, if they the parents are rewarded in their childhood, the bad influence will continue.
No one but all parents want to give their child a well enviroment, and when they are finding ways to do that, they may think that a economic reward is useful.
So their child will suffer from the same things again.
I have seen an article in an magazine said that there is a child who had an overlove parents, reward his students so much at every time the student have a good score.
The students, however, have a lot of money to spend, is addicted to drags just because he have lot of money to spend and parents may care nothing but his score.
It is an unfortunate story just cause by family.

To be honest, these three reason provide a strong evidence for not to give school-age children money for high grade, which activity may cause serious problem then parents can imagine at the time they give.

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: whether teachers should be paid at least as much as doctors, lawyers or business leaders are paid.
Some people claim that the teachers should not be paid at least as much as doctor, lawyers or business leaders are paid.
However I would stand on their opposite side and I believe teachers should be paid at least as much as doctors.
And my reasons can be seen as follows:
First of all, teachers is as important as other jobs, even teacher is more important than other jobs, so they should be paid for more.
As we all know, children is the world's further.
And the teacher is the leader for children to lead them grown.
If children leave with teacher, children would not get enough knowledge and experience to grown.
So teachers is more important than other jobs, they should be paid more.
For example, let's image a world without teacher, none teach the children any experience to live and any kowledge to work.
I believe that the world must will extinct, because they do not have new force to maintain the transform of the world.
What's more, teachers is a respacted job, so they should ger more rewards.
All of us have many teachers, and they accompany our grown.
I believe everyone must have an pressured teacher.
They must give us a big influence in our life.
So they should be respected and get more rewards.
For example, I still remember my first physics teacher, she is so beautiful, and she usually encourage me, because I usually answer the question in the class.
Finally I love physics, and I always have a good grades on physics.
So I thank for my physics teacher.
In a nutshell,  teachers is as important as other jobs, and  teachers is a respacted job.
So I think teacher should be paid more rewards than other jobs, such as doctors, lawyers and business leaders.

Nowadays, parensts pay increasing attention to their children's education.
in order to encourage their children's study motivation, it is not uncommon that many parents give money to their kids when they get high grads in school.
In my view, I do not think it is an effective and resonable way ,which may lead to adverse effect.
Since school-age children is not old enough to shape an entire value, giving money directly as reward may lead them to wrong value.
it is important to leat children aware that the reason to get high score is to become wiser and more competent in order to gain an edge in this society.
If children be rewarded with money every time they get high score, they may develop into thinking that their purpose to study hard is to get money only.
Without holding in mind to improve themselves, they may cheat in exam in order to get high scores instead of studying really hard.
Therefore, giving money as rewad for children's high score may enable the children to form a wrong value of studying.
As far as i am concerned, there are many other ways can be used to reward schoool-age children when they recieve high scores in school.
For example, parents can buy their children some interesting science or atrs books each time they get high mark.
It is known to all that children are always eager to meet new and interesting things in their life, so they will be wiling to read some books that they have not been touched before.
In the same time, they can learn more from books and their minds will be opened, horisen broadened.
This is beficial for them a they may be more interested in study and learn on their own .
All in all, giving money directly to children is not a good way to encourage them which can lead them to wrong road.
It is benificial to offer them books which can in turn inspire their minds.

With remarkable development of technology, more and more ways of entertainment arise, among which the most popular ones have to include television and movies, especially for young people.
Therefore, there is an interesting debate about whether these two ways of entertainment have more negative effects than positive ones on young people.
From my perspective, I would say they have more positive effects.
First and foremost, movies and television enrich young people's social lives.
It is often the first choice for teenage and youth to hang out and go to see a movie with their best friends at leisure.
This is not only a way of relaxing and refreshing, but also a great chance to share their mind with their peers.
All of this experiences is essential for one's growth and leave them lots of memories simultaneously.
For example, I prefer to see a movie with my roomates after exams.
Every time we would talk about a variety of things on the topic of the movie, sometimes even beyond it.
It is during this period that we get to know each other better.
And our relationship grows.
This is part of my social lives.
Besides, they can also enrich young people's imagination.
Teenagers are full of imagination and fatacies, which can exactly met by movies and TV series.
Those creative plots as well as incedible scenes are so impressive that they would easily get access to the cultivation of imagination.
And as is widely acknowledged, imagination is what partly made of our developed society and prosperous civilization today.
When I was a little boy, those super heroes and fantastic power in marvel's movies appeal to me.
And I was eager to figure out how can they do that.
I guess that is why I become a physics student today-- to explore the unknown power with imagination.
It is these movies that provide me with such motivation and ability.
Admittedly, movies and TV would spread some inappropriate words or ideas.
But as a sort of media, that is unavoidable.
And I believe that young people would have the ability to tell from positive things and negative things, from integrity to crime if they receive right education.
To put it in a nutshell, movies and television do have more positive effects on teenage and youth.
I believe that what people need to is to encourage them grow
Nowadays, due to the development of society, the issue of how poeple can stay healthy has increasingly become a controversial topic.
Some believe that the old should do more exercise, while others believe that the young should do it more.
Although I have some doubts, I tend to agree with the latter, and I will aticulate my view below.
First, it is the young who don't like sports more.
Currently, with the spreading of mobilephones, increasing youngsters are willing to play it all day rather than go out with their friends.
And it is more convenient for them to make freinds on the internet.
Besides, all of daliy goods can be bought online, so there is no use to go out for walking.
On the contrary, the old are more willing to hang out owing to the difficulty of technology for them.
The only one entertainment for them is go out with their family or friends.
In addition, the young people always stay up too late, which is harmful to their health.
Now it is very common to see that the young individuals will go to bed at midnight due to the mass of work or excessive entertainment.
And next day they also have to get up early to go to school or work, which contributes to their badly lack of sleep.
Therefore, massive the young are unhealthy because of the above.
On the other hand, the old always keep a healthy schedule everyday.
They will get up early to walk or dance in the park.
And after mealtime, they will hang out as well and fall asleep early, which lots of young persons cannot do it.
As a whole, although the pld people seems so weak that they need to do some sports to stay healthy, actually recent young people require more exercise than the old.

If you are a mother, will you allow your children to watch TV, which will have some advertisement toward them?
And do you think those advertisement is harmful or healthy?
From my perspective, children are too young to heed what's the real content of the advertisement and what they will get are always somthing meaningful and funny.
Thus, I really dissagree with the statement and they should be permitted rather than prohibited.
Because of the high imitation ability of young children, new words spoken by the people in the advertisement can really help chidren extend their knowledge.
The best instance to illustrate this is my mother, who give birth to my sister 4 years ago.
Surprinsingly, my sister can always speak some words which are extremely difficult for a girl aged only 4 and she actually can not understand the actually meaning what of she speaks.

Once fortunately, when I watch TV with her and find that the words she learns about are all from the TV advertisement, which means she dose not care about the real information in the advertisement because it is so difficult for her to undersand and she can simulate the pronounciation from the speaker to enlarge her vocabulary.

That is to say, televison advertising directed toward children seems like that children will be affected by the untrue information in the advertisement and may even be attracted by the toys to ask buy one, but actually they are too young to notice those commercial information and can gain helpful thing, including new words, new gesture, mew movement, and so on.

Television advertising will always contain some energetic dancing movement, melodic music, colorful scenery and etc and thus those things can really inspir young children to make them have positive mood, which is the most essential thing for young children.
Take myself as a example to explain my perspetive.

Nowadays,more and more families are getting wealthy,and there is more and more parents offer money for their children when they get high grade in school,maybe they want to encourage their children to study hard,and show how they care about their children,but in my opinion,I don't think its a good way.
First,children may complain and don't want to work hard anymore if their parents don't offer their money when they get high grades.

Lily is one of my classmates,she uesd to get money reawrds when she got a high grade,but one day her parents think maybe she shouldn't be reawrded any time she get a high grade,they only reawrd her once in a year,but Lily didn't agree with them,so she began complaining and she don't work hard to resist her parents,at last,her parents had to offer her money,and her grade had gone down for a long time.
So we can see that when student get used to their reawrds,they may complain about that.
Moreover,it's a way to tell their children that they are working for money instead of working for knowledge.
At first,child will work hard to get more money,but they will lose the purpose that why they study.

Jack's parents offer him money when he get a good grade,he used to work hard to get it ,but one day he find that he can also get it even he don't work hard,he can  do it well by staying up to study before the exam,it's a good way to get good grade and gain money,but he can't acknowlegde anything,even if he can answer the question,it's a short time memory,he will forget it soon once he pass his exam.
Money rewarding may make child forget what they study for.

In my opinion,offering money can stimulate the children's interest in study,but it can't last a long time,once their parents don't give them money,they may receed o lot,besides,it can guide a wrong way to the children that they may became greedy in money but not in knowledge.
So I don't think it is a good idea.
People always are willing to hold a celebrities when there are millstone in their life.
Some people claim that this opinion of celebrities are supposed to put more value for younger people than the older people.
Nevertheless, I am in tune with the point that this kind of opinions are more important for the older people.
In the first place, the celebrities are able to encourage more older people to challenge themselves even they are in an old age.
It is a generally accepted fact that almost common sports activeties such as basketball, soccor, and the tennis are more mastery for the younger people.
Gradually, owing to the fact that increasing number of celebrities for the younger people, the status of older people in these activities are undermined.
This phenomenon lead older people feel dismay for themselves and gradually quit these stages.
Therefore, the celebrities are more important in this situation for the older people because these celebrities can enable older man confidente for themselve.
Thus, older man can equip the ability to improve their ability and challenge themselves.

thus,they may think of some other way in order to get the point.
They may cheat in class,or do something else bad.
It's not good for them.

It'll change their thoughts about the world.
Such is parents nature that they hope their children are good at study and get high grades in every test.
In order to encourage children to do well in the exams, some parents will give them money as a reward for high grades.
Though this behavior may be effective to some extent, I hold the belief that doing good in study and exams is students' duty, and the money as rewarded is not essensial and may sometimes harmful.
To begin with, if one is emerged in study and possesses a good attitude, then his grades wil be high naturally without the money offered.
A great number top students that I make acquaintance with, they are all hard working and got high marks in almost every subject during the final.
However, few of them gor money from their parents as a prize.
Thus, it can be inferred that one gets high mark because he place study at an important position, and it is himslef that make him get high marks not the rewarded money.
Secondly, providing children with money for good grades can sometimes be a potential factor leading to unsteady family relationship.
Take my cousin as an example, he was rewarded 20 yuan if he got one subject with grade 100 in the grade 3 finals.

Then, when he got another 100 in the grade 4 final, he argued that he should be rewarded 30 yuan, for the subjest is much more difficult than that of grade 3, but his parents disagreeded and there was a fierce conflict in the end.
Last but not least, giving children money for hig marks can make them misunderstand the reason of studying.
Such behavior may lead them to the pointview that if I study hard, then I will get money doing nothing.
Wheras such things do not happen in the society.
So when they got another high mark but no money was given, they will question their parents.
And if they realize that no money for high grades, they may pay little attention to study.
In conclusion, offering children money for high grades is a behavior with good begining, that parents wish their children to study hard in order to do well in the exams.
But rewarding money isnot a good solution, there are several ways to achieve the goal, such as developing the children's interest in study, raise their curiosity and so on.
From my perspective, parents should choose a more correct way to emc
The children are our future and our country's future, and how to give our kids a bright future is the task of both families and societies.
It's always been a controversial topic about how to teach the youngest properly.
Because we all have different parenting styles.
however, I think parents definitely should let the children make and learn from their own mistakes.
and I will illustrate that by stating the following reason.

First of all, kids will not born with the concept what is right what is wrong, and the environment that they spend their time through childhood is the factor that defines who they are, like their habits, their personalities, and their skills.
So kids learn from their surroundings.
For example, I saw a documentary about a boy that lives in Ukraine.
That kid is neglected by the irresponsible parents.
Before he was funded by the police, he lives with the dogs, that is a terrifying story.
But what interesting is that the kids 4years old kid actually start behaving like a dog, and he survived because the dog provides the shelter for the kid.
As a consequence, he behaves more like a dog.
Lucky, the kid was funded by the polices, how adopted by foster parents.
And as this story shows the kid learn from their surroundings.
And second, youngster make mistakes, and as human, we all make mistakes no matter who we are.
It's ridiculous not to allow the kids to make mistakes.
To illustrate that, a very famous congressman, he donates money to a lot of hospitals, and start a program that eventually helped a lot of homeless people.
No one would know he was behind bars when he was younger.
Like most of the other problem teenagers, he drinks alcohol, and abuse drugs, and even distribute it.
but those are not important, the most important is that he learned his lesson, and he turns out to find.
most of the people, even so-called success people makes mistake, there is no point don't let kids make mistakes.
But sometimes, make mistake is not a good thing, it may destroy your future if the congressman didn't learn from his mistake, how to know what he will be today.
there is a reason teacher, parents and even the justice system exists, they give hope to other people, to guide they learn from their mistakes, and that is the most important thing.
To wrap up, parent absolutely should allow kids to make and learn from their mistakes, we all are human, we make mistakes, and the most important thing is we learn from them.
That process makes us a better person.

Recently, the number of wild animals are decreasing.
Some people considers that it is essential for government to take action to protect them.
I also agree with this statement.
Firstly , there are relatively substantial percent of animals are endangered when human is destroying animals habitats gradually.
Therefore, it is neccessary for government to reduce the destroying and give endangered animals an appropriate and desirable place to live in.
For example, a large number of parots are declined due to overindustralization.
The industry and farmers require wood so that they cut down trees in the forest.
Therefore, the forest become smaller and smaller beacuse of the demand  of raw materials.
Then parots find that there is no habitat for them to live in so they will be disappeared.
Secondly, the extinction of some particular sepcies of animals will affect the scientific research.
In the report of TIMES ,   in the vicinity of 80 percent of  biological research are depend on some rare wildlifes .
Those special lifes can not only provide scientific values ,  but also can be exhibitted in lots of museums.
Due to the serious evironmental requirement, those animals can not fit in the social urban environment,  the extiction of them is a great lost for academic value.
The last and most significant part is that  some not mining place stores a numerous kinds of natural resources.
It was a pity if those resources are buried within the urban development .
In various of research states that there are about 90 percent of natural resouces that have not been discoverd which sopphiscate the importance of prevent those wilderness areas from destruction.
A large amount of coals, rare chemicals and rare metal are stored in the crust and lithosphere  .
It 's hard to unearthe them .
But it will be easy to dig them within the develop of insdustry skills.
In conclusion , I take the view that it is significant for government to protect the wild animals and the habitats of them.

Thus students need mre reward for getting high marks, and giving them money is a good choice.
First,having extra money tospend after performing well in exam will make students have  more passion on study.
Take my own experience as an example.
Last summer, my parents made a regulatin that if I get an â€œAâ€ in the real analysis final exam, they will give me a fifty dollars asmy pocket money.
Imagining that with fifty dollars I can hang out every where and buy whatever I like.
So,I review what  Ihave learnt everyday after class,and often study late till night.
Consequentially,I got full mark in the final test.
Second,by doing so parents can teach students that they can only gain rewards after hard work.
In one's childhood , he or she my often hear that his or her parents said "no pain ,no gain",but one cannot understand it better by being rewarded after hard work.
when my brother was young, his parents often buy him a little gifts after he got a good mark.
and later on he realized that it is because he had paid many effort in study that he gained the prizes.

School-age children haven't a very good ability of make a dicision,but we can give school-age children 10 dollars a week,so they can control them to ues money,but not use it in something useless.

From time to time, people are facing with various difficulties that they have to overcome.
The young generations nowadays are required to cultivate various abilities to be more competitive in modern society.
Lately, an interesting discussion arises concerning whether it is essential for young people to have the ability to plan and organize or not.
In my opinion, I believe that the young generation should have the planning and organizing abilities.
First of all, the ability to plan and organize could lay a solid foundation for the young generation's future.
After getting a position in a company, there is no doubt that the young people have to deal with huge amouts of works.
If they could divide various problems and give the first priority to the most important problem, they are able to accomplish their work more efficiently.
Thus, they could be more competitive than the other people who don't own such a ability in their company.
As a result of this, we should value the ability of planning and organizing.
Second, the young generation could make full use of their time by mastering this ability.
Compared to the adults, the young people's time is relatively free today.
Therefore, in order to use their time efficiently, it is necessary for them to cultivate this ability.

Having known what the young generations should do from Monday to Friday by making a good schedule, they could know their tasks clearly and get themselves relaxed, thus making them accomplishing their study more efficiently.
In this way, this ability is significant for the young generations in modern society.
Third, a good sense of planning and organzing could boost the development of leadership.
A good leader needs the characteristics of planning and organizing skills.
They have to orginze the group well in order to accomplish an important project or just encourage members to work efficiently.
With the well organization, the group member could know what they are doing and what they should do in the next step.
And a well-prepared plan merely helps group to avoid the emergency.
Thus, it can enhance the ability of leadership.
In a nutshell, I hold the opinion that it is essential to own the ability to plan and organize.
It is not only because the young people can make full use of their time and lay a good foundation for their future, but also because it could cultivate the characteristics of leadership.
Mistakes are always unavoiable, especially for young kids.
When confronting with the question whether parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their mistakes, different people has different ideas.
From my perspective, it is parents' responsibility to tolerate childen's mistke and lead them to learn from it.
And my reasons are listed below.
Firstly, making mistakes is a good way to learn.
Young kids are always naugty and sometimes too young to get the hang of some sophisticated knowledge or lessons.
However, obviously it is easy for them to make mistakes.
So leading them to learn from their own mistkes will teach them to provoke on their behavior and help them calm down to think about what is right and what is wrong.
When I was young, I had difficulty in finishing my schoolwork in time.
My parents forced me to summarize reasons for unability to finish my assignment such as playing for too long or not being familiar with the knowledge.
And gradually, I could finish my work on time.
Had my parents pushed me to finish my work, I might hated my assignment and never done it ever.
From my example, we knew that letting kids learn from their own mistakes will better their ability of learing from their mistakes.
Secondly, granting children's mistake will relieve their pressure on making mistakes.
Parents should not only help kid with their academic perfromance but also help them with their life lesson.
As is wide acknowledged that making mistakes is human nature and we shouldn't afraid of making mistakes from which we can learn and make progress.
If parents scold their kids for their wrongdoings evertime, kids would be less confident of himself.
My friend used to be frightened at speaking publically, and with my help he foud that the reason lied in the behavior of his parents.
Everytime he made mistakes, his parents would show their disappointment towards him and thus he was inclinend to keep his mouth shut in public.
It is of great importance that parents should tolerate their kids' mistake since they should teach their kids the right attitude against wrongdoings.
Of course, letting kids make mistakes doesn't mean that parents just see their kids make mistakes and do nothing more.
Youngsters need high-quality education too build up their views about the whole universe and the value.
Therefore, parents should encourage kids to look back and reflect on their wrongdoings rather than spoil them by granting all their mistakes or saying nothing about their mistakes.
As an old saying goes,'Failure is the mother of success'.
Kids should be tolerated to make mistaked and adopt a positive attitude towards their mistakes.
Also, youngsters should be encouraged to learn from his or her mistakes by his or her own, for they can learn quicker and better.
It is difficult for a parent to just sit back and allow their child to make  a mistake.
Many parents go out of their own way to protect their children from everything that are not fitted to them.
However, at some point part of being a good parent is letting go and watching them move through the unfamiliar reigon and make mistakes.
No matter how much they want to help their children , they need to have the freerdom to make mistakes and to learn from them.
Erros  and mistake in the trials could be the greatest lessons.
Children experience the things that they are not turning well for them.
These experiences will leave a lasting impression on childeren abd they will learn to mmake good choices and avoid making the same mistake in the furture.
When I was in my middle school, one dy i forgot to bring my course work and i needed it it in order to hand in after the class.
So I made a phone call to my mother and ask her to bring my homework to school but  my mother said that bringing homewerk to school is your own responsibility.

I got the  criticize from the teacher but Iearned a lesson form that and since then I always wrote down the important things I need to do in the following stpes on a notebook and put it my schollbag in case I forget.
What's more , perhaps the best way to develop the children's creativity  is to ask them to stop being afraid of making  mistakes.
What  mistakes do is offer us the opptunity to explore beyond where we thought we were gong with-- the introduce  that rare element of the chance into our work.
The people  In conclusion , if we want our children to develop a sense of respionsibility, make good choices and become more ddaring and creative, we have to let go and allow them to makwe mistakes.
After all, parents cannot protect their kids forever; eventually vchildren need to learn to live their own live.

Besides, not in companies, but in schools, there are still leaders, such as monitors in a class, and even in our home, there still leaders who make the final decision.
Leaders seem to be common but plays an important role, so what kind of person is potential to be a leader and are their characters naturally born?
As far as I am concerned, the leadship is not instinct but can be  learned.
My belief will be supported by the follow reasons.
Firstly, human beings are not born with good qualities which are potential for us to be leader.
To the contrary, we learned everything from our environment,such as our parents, teachers and even strangers.
For we know nothing when we are born except crying, our characters are molded in family, school and society.
For example, we all know nothing when we are first come to the world, but later we become different person and play different role in the society.
Secondly, the powering of learning is quite strong that we can not ignore.
