Although some people believes that leadship is naturally born, they have wisdom, bravery,and good ability to organize from their instinct, other people will have no chance to become a leader from learning, In my opinion, I firmly believe that we can learn to be a leader, because the good qualities for a leadship can be learned, what we need to do is to push ourselves and take action.
To sum up, from my examples, I strongly think people can learn to be a leader, for we are born equal, we make progress through learning ,and also learning can play a pivotal role in our life.
In the wake of technology's development, workers, nowadays, have many different types of takes to deal with at workplace.
Some people claims that they like to do similar tasks for a long time, others aruges that doing different types of tasks won't get bored.
From my perspective, it is better to face with different types of tasks during the workday.
My reasons and details are listed following.
To start with, dealing with various assignments don't make people bored easily.
The similar tasks are desiccated as you repeat the same routin again and agian.
A salient example can be seen in study.
when I prepared for TOFEL, I had to study English all day long, even sometimes I worked with reading all day.
It really drived me crazy, and I felt exausted.
Compared to similar tasks, different types of tasks make a great difference.
For instance, I can studied English in the morning and learnt biology afternoon.
Therefore, I can switch my mind in different subjects, and still fouce on study.
Another relevant reason used to support my opinion is that different types of tasks can make sure employees stay competitive.
Unlike the similar tasks, the same process won't bring about new problems, an the workers can get any progerss.
A variety of jobs means that you have to proficient in differet areas, which requres workers contribute more energy to their jobs.
The workers have to face with different problmes.
As a result they will take up more challenges, and stay competive in business.
Take into account all the factors above, we can safely draw the conclusion.
Diffrent types fo tasks bring about more challenges and enable workers to keep competitive.
Nowadays many people like famous entertainers and athletes.

On the other hand, if famous entertainers and athletes have more privacy, they fans will have more time to do more important things.

As for me, I do think it is wise to give kids money because of high marks that they get in school.
There are three main reasons involved.

In the first place, there is no denying that giving the kids money as reward for excellent academic performances is a good way of showing recogonition to them, which will get them informed that their parents are proud of what they have done.
Take me as an example, my parent used to give me money every time I did good in an exam.
That meaned a lot to me because I can to know that my parents cared me and they were happy to see what I achieved.
I also considered it as a form of communication bewteen my parents and me.
In addition to that, under no circumstances can we underestimate the importance of motivation too much.
And it is universally acknowledged that the reward like money perfectly plays the role of a motivator and will enable kids to strive for good grades in exams.
You know sometimes kids will get tired of parents' countless speeches about the importance of study and that is the reason why we need to promise some reward to stimulate them.
And this can even create a positve circle.
Suppose that a kid gets some money for the good grade in one exam, and it is very likely that the kid will try harder  in order to keep the good grade so that more money can be achieved.
So kids might fulfill their potentials if the circle develope.
Last but not least, It can also build up the concept that you will be amply rewarded only if you work hard and stand out.
This is of vital importance in their following life.
Just like the saying goes 'You reap what you sow'.
By giving kids money for good mark, they can easily come to the conclusion that they will be rewarded because they behave well.
And they will aspire to behave well to get rewarded.
So as what have been illustrated above, I absolutely believe that it is beneficial for parents to give kids money as reaward for their good grades.

As far as I am concerned, remaining happy and optimistic is more important.

To begin with, remaining happy and optimistic can give people constantly motivation to succeed.

Then I had the motivation to improve myself and tried to run for the monitor next year.
Finally, I became the new monitor.
If I cannot ramain any happy and optimistic, I would not try it again and then I would never be a monitor.
To be followed, remaining happy and optimistic when people fail can easily help people get out of the troubles.
To illustrate, when people failed, what they need to do is to find the way getting out of the trouble.
If they remained happy and optimistic, they will be positive and start to think how to get them out of the troubles.
However, if they cannot remain happy and optimistic, they will be negative and stop thinking anything.
Thus they might always in troubles and they cannot be successful.
For instance, when I failed, I always thought something happy and tried my best to find the way out of the troubl
Make Mistakes And Learn From It
In my opinion, I agree with that parents should allow the children to do what they want enen if they may make miatakes and let them learn from it by themselves.
First, parents can't protect the children for a hole life.
They will deal with someting like familays, study, jobs by themselves in time.
So the earlier they make mistakes, the better they can associate with the society.
Secondly, if the children make mistakes, they can remember it for a long time.
While if the parents just let them to do the things as what they were told, they can't remember anything envn they are correct.
Thirdlty, if they learn from the mistake and really understand it, the can deal with the samiliar things by their own.
Finally, as a teenager, we are born to win.
Grasping the chance and doing what we want is not only our choice, but our duty.
To be a standard society number, we are suppose to improve our ability and face the difficute.
For example, I further my study far away from my home for a long time.
My parents just concern about me without helping me, hoping I can deal with the difficute whether they are beside me.
Fortunately, just due to the mistakes I ever made and the experience I get from it, I become a man, not a child anymore.
On the other hand, if the child were protected by the parents, by the schools, by the goverment, they can't associated with the society.
Even they may become shy and don't would like to make friends with others.
As a result, they can't become the future of the country, but the one should be taken care of.
So, as I suggest, the advantages outweigh the disadvantage.
To improve our ability and to take on the duty of the future, parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
Only by dealing with the mistakes and learning from it, can they grow.
Nowadays,many peple are facing the heavy stress,so it is importing for them to relax.
This leads to a question:which way should them choose in order to relax themselvs.

Some people believes that watching tv or reading a book is a better way than doing  physical exercises, while other believe that dong sports or other outdoor activities is better than watching tv programs or rading a book.
From my perspective, I belives that doing physical exercises is a more efficient way of relaxing ourselves.
One of the most important reason is that while we are taking physical exercises , we release our stress we gained from studyng or something else.

Although it may make us feel tired after doing the exercises ,it is more helpful than watching tv or reading books because when we are under big pressure , we may not have the mood to watch tv or read book, sometimes it can be worse if we read book or watch tv.

Another reason why  doing physical exercisesis a better way is that while we are releasing our stress , our bodies are also exercising themselves,we will be healthier and will be well perpared for the futher study.
When we choose watching tv or reading books, maybe it can helps to change our bad mood,but we can easily be addicted to it and will forget about the time.
We may spen a lot of time reading books or watching tv,it is harmful to our eyes.
As we all know , eyes are the windows of mind,it is very important for not only our studies, but also our lives.
In addition, doing physical exercises may lead us tobe more outgoing ,while we exercise our bodies, we also exercise our characterstic.
We may meet people who are also interested in the same thing.
While doing the things, you can share whether your sadness or happiness with them,and you will reduce the stree .
You will be less stressful than before.
All in all , it is my understanding that doing physical canleading to a much more efficient way to relax ourselvesthrough a big pressure or a sad things.
I think more peope should take physical exercises.
According to the nowadays lifestyle, I support that it is better to relax by wathing a movie or reading a few books compared to do physical exercise.
Lots of people have to work from almost eight in the morning till six in the afternoon.
This phenomenone makes me doubt whether they really have spare energy to do physical exercise.
Firstly, I doubt that people have spare energy to do physicial exercise after they finsh the whole day working tasks.
Although physical exercise is a good way to keep fit and healthy, it needs lots of energy and persistance to hold on like everyday.
I don't view this kind of activity as a relax.
It actually a burden for plenty of people.
In the meanwhile, watching a movie or reading a book is a lot more relax than exercise.
It should be a great picture if you will image that sitting in a chair outside the yards with a cup of a hot tea and hold your ipad or an acutal book.
Secondly, I think a movie or a book will contain a lot more knowledge and can help me to absorb something that I can not learn from my own experience which is the exercise can not offer me.
For instance, I love the movie the Independant Day which described a war between alien species and human beings.
It taught me that I should always have hope with everything especially when I face a difficulty or a challenge.
Watching a movie and reading a book are not only help me relax myself but also drive me to think more dimensionly.
All in all, I admitted that physical exercise is good for all of us but it should be the better way to relax when it comes to watching a movie or reading a book.
On the one hand, people do not have enough time and energy to stick on the physicial exercise.
On the other hand, watching a movie or reading a book can bring us more experience to live better and relax us both from physics aspect and mental aspect.

In the future, all of us may enter the class and join numbers of meetings and class disscussions.
Commonly, the teacher would not always agree with our own views at class, they may cast doubt on our opinions.
I believe the right thing to do at that time is to wait until the class or the meeting is over and communicate with the person directly about the problem.
The reasons are as followed.
To start with, it might be thought as an interruption when you correct your personal mistake at class.
Specifically, it's disrecpectful to the teacher and other students who are still concentrating to the class.
You can't just stand out and talk about your misunderstanding when the class is running, it might interfere with the teacher's teaching strategy and affect the whole class's studying efficiency.
Waiting until the last minute to talk with the teacher privately is a wiser choice since it won't cause conflict with the whole class and everyone could still get a satisfactory result.
Moreover, connecting with the person after everything has been done could show one's positive attitude.

Think if you just talk to the teacher directlyat class without reconsiderate what the best answer is or do nothing, the teacher might feel disappointed and won't appreciate you because of your discouraging attitude.
But on the other hand if you contack with the teacher after school, the teacher would praise you for your willing to study and that might come up with the best result .
Finally, getting along with the teacher could help you learn more from the teacher and improve on your performance.
When talking with the teacher primately without being interrupted, you can even learn extra knowledge form the teacher to broaden your aspect and get better grades in the campus.
For instance, the teacher might tell you some key points about how to get higher marks at test or share some effective strategies of taking notes with you.
He wouldn't mention these things at class, but he could tell you these in this simple conversation.
These stategies would be extremely useful to get a better performance in your future syudy.
In conclusion, the benifits of connecting with the teachr after school are not interrupting the class, talk efficiently and get extra help

Currently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: would people spend less time cooking and preparing foods in twenty years than they do today.
Opinions vary from person to person.
Some claim that people would defintely spend less time cooking and preparing food and pay more attention to their work.
However, i would hold an oppsite view that it is much more possible for people to focus on their cooking and food.
My point can be elaborated as follows.
First, in the next twenty years, people will pay much more attention on their own health, which is influenced by what they eat in their daily life.
The research has showed that the development of food science in the future is providing people healthier and more delicious food.
In next twenty, there will be more people realizing the importance of food to their health.
They would like to spend more time for cooking their own healthy food by themselves from the deep heart.
My major is food science and technology and i know that the ways to cook play an extremely important role to  make food healthy.
You spend 50mintute heating an egg will lead the egg white transform to a different formation, which may be harmful for huamn's body.
However, if you just heat it at a proper time, you can make sure that the egg white proteins can be health and absorbed easily by human.

Second, the technology is developing at a dramatic speed, which may contributes less job for people to do, as a result, people would have more free time to cook for themselves and spend time on preparing food.

Many people have believed that in some fields that human will be replaced by robots and people could have more free time on their own, which means they have to do something by their own instead of using robots to help them.
My grandfather has retired for a long time and he is always boring in the daily life.
In this suitation, he starts to learn how to cook meal for his grandson, my little cousin.
This example shows that people really have to do something by their own instead of others so that they feel comfortable and normally, cooking food is a nice choice.
In summary, from what has been discussed above, we can safely draw a conclusion that spending more time cooking and preparing foods in twenty years could be a reality.
The reward for students' score has been highly debatable.

Nowadays cooking has been a concern for many people and it causes a topic that whether people will spend less time cooking and preparing foods in twenty years than they do today.

This debate divides people into different camps with opposite opinions, and some people would like to hold th opinion that people will spend less time cooking in twenty years than they do today, however, I consider people will cook more in twenty years, and there are some reasons and exmaples that can illustrate my opinions.
First and foremost, in twenty years, people will begin to care more about their health.

To be more specific, people will focus on their health more as the technique and the society develop for twenty years,  so people begin not to trust the food outside and begin to choose the food and cook the food by themselves.
In opposition, people nowadays have very few time to focus on their health and all they think is making money, so they will not spend their time on cooking food.

For example, twenty years later, there are more and more people caring about their health and willing to spend time and energy on that, so everyday after work, they will go to a supermarket and buy some organic food and vegetables, then cook on their own to eat healthily in order to improve their health.
In the second place, people will have more time free in twenty years which allows them to cook food.

This is because as the technique continue to develop in twenty years, people will enjoy more high-technique quipments such as auto-driving, and this can not only help people improe their life quality, but also allow them to have more time for resting, so they can just have more time for cooking and preparing food themselves.

In opposition, nowadays people still have to a lot of things on their own such as driving or supervising a factory which requires them to be quite busy and have no time for them to relax or do something they enjoy, so they won't have much cahnces to cook on their own.
Granted, it may be reasonable and attractive that some people claim that people will spend less time cooking and preparing food in twenty years than they do today.
People today have more healthier food sources so people will prefer cooking themselves since the environment day has less pollutions than the environment in twenty years.

However, this can not hold water, since after twenty years, people will begin to care about the environmnet even more since the people are getting a better education in twenty years, so the food sources will be even healthier that can attract more people to cook on their own.
So I am still convinced by my standpoint that people will spend more time cooking in twenty years than they do today.

It has become more common for parents to give their school-age children for each high grade they get in school, which means that the kids recieve more money when they get higher marks on the exam.
It does not sound like a good idea becasue it brings several negative impacts during children's education devlopment.
First off, this method may result in devlopments of bad habits for children.
When one knows that higher marks on the exam means more money, he or she will definitely try every way to get a better mark even if the mark does not show his or her true progress.
For example, the kid may copy others' answers or find other methods to cheat in order to achieve higher grades.
In this case, it is certainly wrong for parents to award them becasue the money-incentive system will gradually impact their children's studying habits in negative ways.
A lot of bad studying habits such as cheating may be self-taught by kids themselves just becasue they want the money reward too much.
Another point worth mentioning is that money-incentive methods on students' grades can result negative impacts in building their value systems.
When kids are taught that they can purchase things they want only if they get good grades in school, they may lose interset on other areas.
Schools only offer a few mantory courses that children need to take, but they may gradually become weak in some other subjects such as architecture or geology.
It also limits childrens' imagination abilities, because they are too invovled with the "must" courses they have little time to pursue their real interests in life.
Last but not least, this method will enventually become ineffective for children.
The reason why parents are willing to give their shool-age children money every time they achive high grades is becasue they want to see their progresses on subjects learned in school.
However, this method will not be useful for very long time, as children are getting more and more used to this moeny-incentive system.
Even though kids can get some extra money when they get high grades, they may become less and less interested in this system.
The system itself can not assure a long-term effect for school-age children, which contradicts the purpose of parents' doing so.
Based on the reasons above, offering school-age children money for each high grade they get in school is not a wise idea for their parents.

Recently, an interesting topic has aroused a heated debate among pubilc: whether to communicate in person or through emails when colleagues or classmates do a project together.
The answers vary from person to person.
Some people proposes that sening e-mail is a better way.
However, I believe that talking to others face to face is a better choice.
To begin with, communicating in person is conducive to expressing their ideas or options exactly.
As we know, in a communication, we always understand other people not only from the sentance they say but also associating with other facial expression and body language.
In this case, we are less likely to interprete others by mistakes, which also improve the efficiency of the conversation and the projects.
In contrast, if we only talk to each other by email, facing the words on the computer screen, we are hard to guess the emotion of others.
For example, last year I took participate in a competition about how to save energy with my classmates.
At first we just send e-mail to exchange idea of this project.
A few days later, we still did not decide what we wanted to do because of  misunderstanding other idea.
An then we decided to have a talk face to face in a coffee house and on that day we made a consues.
Therefore, talking in person is an efficient way to communicate.
Furthermore, talking to each other is helpful to complish the project.
This is because, in the science field, most of projects need to design and do experiments to illustrate a concept.
Only when the group members gather in the lab and discusse the process of the experiment they can finish the project and attain a good result.
gathering in the lab also guarrentte the safty of members in case of something dangerous happened.
On the contrary, it's hard to imagnie that dong experiment by one person and talk about the process via email.
For example, in the former project, we needed to use high velocity item in the lab to illustrate our idea.
Our members always went to the lab to discuss from day to night.
In this way, we could finish our project and win the competition.
To sum up, It is advisable to communicate in person when we do project bec
What makes a job more satisfying?
A job requires multiful tasks or only one type of similar task  on a workday ?
I prefer to choose to do many different types of taks during the workday.
It is boring to do similar tasks all day long, which is like the repeat of one task.
It might be fresh to do this work on the initial few days .
But people tend to lose interst and enthusiasm in such a repeative work in the long run.
They will hardly find joy or fullfillment in a job.
What may be worse is that they cannot stay in such a positon for a long time.
Some people have claimed that they quit their job because their boss ask them to do the similar work all day long.
On one hand, people could be more creative when they deal with a variety of tasks.
It is a good symbol of their capability .
They can be more active when doing many different types of tasks.
Because when we do many different types of task, our brain works fast.
It is believed that our brain is like a machine, it will rust if it doest work.
And the faster our brain woks, the more creative we will be.
Thus, we will be more happy with our achievement, which makes us more satisfied.
On the other hand, doing different types of job is a efficient way to improve one's abilities in career.
People are good at coping with different tasks are more likely to get a jon in the employment market.
So people are more satisfied if they can have more chance to deal with different types of work.
It is better for their future career development.
Although some people may argue that practising one task could make perfect.
So people might be happier to do one similar task all day long to sharpen their skills.
But it is a job, not a interest.
It is hardly to make people to be satisfied with a repeat work for a long time.
All in all, it is more satisfying to do different types of work rather than a similar type of work all day long.
Recently, there is a heated discussion regarding whether wild animals and wilderness areas need to be significant peotected by government.
Attitides towards this issue may vary from individuals to individuals.
There is a common conception that it is unnecessary to provide wild animals and wildness areas.
However, from my perspective, I agree with the statement it is improtant to provide our nature areas.
My view will be explained by analyzing the following reasons.
One reason why I think the government should pay a highly attention to protect wild animals and wildness areas is that these can help people to sustain development.
As we all known, there are many food chains in the nature, such as goosts eat grass and the wolves eat the goosts and so on.
People are just one of the members of those food chains.
Any members of the food chains lost will effect the people's development.
As a result, people will face to be extincted.
Take pandas for example, they are facing to be extincted nowadys.
It is because human's population glowing fast that the habitats of pandas had been replaced by the shopping malls and streests, pandas also lost the sources of food supplements.
If people continue to destory the wilderness areas, they will face the same problems as pandas in the future.
Other relevant reason used to support my opinion is that protecting wild animals and wilderness areas by government enables children to receive better educations.
Nowadys, students can just learn animals from the picures and the books.
They will forget easilly because they can not touch the animals or get the wildness areas to see by themselves.
Take my nephew foe example.
When she was in elementary school, she was interesting in the wild animals but she can not learn more from the teachers because the animals was extincted.
Admittedly, the government can put some attaintions to develop the economy.
However, the wild animals and wilderness areas are more closer to people.
And they are the fundemantary source to people.
If people can not protect those, the nature will attact us, like earthquake and sandstorm.
To sum up, it is important for gavernment to protect wild environment.
Having a glimpse at today's society,people attach more and more importance to mutual helping.
As an old saying denotes,helping others is equal to help yourself.

Some people contends that people today are more willing to help stangers who are in trouble than the previous people,while others hold the opposite opinion,arguing that people are becoming more and more indifferent nowadays.
As far as I am concerned,the current people are definitely no less willing to help the struggling strangers than before.
First of all,most teenagers have received the instruction to help the surrounding people since their primary school or even kindergarten.
Family menbers also serves as the earliest spiritual teacher,telling us to be as helpful and kind-hearted as possiple from an early age.
All these spiritual education prepare the students to be a helpful person.
Needless to say,the education in today's society is much more developed that that of the old times.
Consequently,there is no denying that teenagers today possess more awareness to give their hand to people in need.
For instance,When one of our schoolmates get ill and stay in the hospital,many of us are hoping to look after the student and help him lift a cloudy mood,even we are totally strangers.
Furthermore,the society and media also contribute to leading people to become more willing to help strangers.
To illustrate,some televison programs are aims at broadcasting news or events about mutual helping.
For example,a news broadcast recently showed that a millionaire just donate a bunch of money to the village in porverty to help improve their living conditions and education facilities.
Watching this news,all the audiences show great presage to this millinaire and many of them are destined to be inspired by him and take him as a example.
However,exceptions should not be rashly omitted.
There did exsists some people that are holding an offish attitude when other people meet some problems.

According to an event broadcast a few years ago,a little girl was crashed by a car and lied in the ground for a whole afternoon,crowds of people just walked by and watched her lying in the blood,but no one stoped to help her or took her to the hospital.
Finally,the little girl died because of the loss of blood.
Without a doubt,the tragedy couldn't have happend if someone has been willing to help her and do her a favor.
As a result,it is true that people today possess the awareness of helping strangers who are meeting some difficulties,nevertheless,exceptions do exsits among all current people.
Evidently,it is too absolute to conclude that people today are more willing to help struggling strangers.
Objective comparisons are supposed to be conducted.
All in all,it is imperitive for the entire society to join in the effort to inspire those people who are lack of a sense of mutual helping,only in this way can they eliminate hazard metioned above.
In this way,we can finally attain a more harmonious society.
Which one can be more usefull, a well-developed Internet access or a well-developed public tranportation?

As for me, believe that the public transportation is more important than the Internet acess because a well-developed public transportation net will benefits people in ways like bring them the convenience or improve the environment.
Thus, I disagree with the statement in the question.
Firstly, the public transportation will bring people a lot of convenience in their daily life.

The public transportation will help people to go from one place to another easily because they do not need to drive their own car or help them save a lots of time on the way if the people do not have their own locomobiles.

Like the bus  can reach many places , taxis ,cna go anywhere you want without having you to drive, subways can also reach many place and even avoid the traffic and all these conviences are what Internet cannot bring us.
Therefore, it is more important to develop the tranportation net.
Furthermore, the public transportation usually can help people to save a lot of money because most of them are very cheap and can save the money for you to buy locomobiles which is very expensive.
However, the Internet always cost that mucha and a hight speed Internet usually cost more, and the money people saved can use in other places.

For example, my uncle live in a place where has a well developed net of transportations so he can go to work by public transportation like buses and subways to where he is working even his work place is very far from where is is living,and that saved him a lots of money because he do not need to buy locomobiles like cars.
Later on he used the money that he saved bought a big and nice house for himselves.

One the other hand, if he lives in a place where do not have a good public transportation system but a good Internet ysytem, he might have a different result because then he needs to pay for the high speed Internet and then  he need to pay both the charge for the Internet and he needs to buys his own locomobile.
Comparing the benefits that a good public transportation system has to the benefits a good Internet system has, I will suggest the government to improve their public transportation.

So in order to buy some toys he liked, he didn't watch TV in the home instead, he studying very hard.
Certainly, he got good grades by his strive, and got money from his parents.
After he got the money, he have never abuse the money, which gave him a good habit.
All in all, giving students money when they get high grade is benifit for both parents and children.
this is because it can inspire children to study hard and can learn how to manage money.

Recently, a topic which is closely related to improvement of tourism has aroused a heated debate: should government improve the safety by increase the employment of police and improve the appearance by reconstructing the old buildings and streets to attract tourists.
In my opinion, I definitely support that government should do these.
To begin with, high level of safety and good appearance can bring tourists pleasant mood in traveling.
It is obvious that people go travel for relaxation, which helps them get rid of daily stress and refresh to their jobs.
If a place that is not safe or not in a good look, people will feel unpleased.
They will not go there twice because the place leaves a bad impression on them.

From my point of view,it's a good idea that parents could offer their school-aged children money for each high grade they get in school.
The reasons are as follows.

Firstly,offered the money for their high grade,the students will be stimulated to study harder and continually pursue higher grades,which is both of vital benefit for their academic performance and self-improvment.

Take me for instant,if I have the capacity to "earn" extra money by myself especially gain it on account of my strength on study,I will be encouraged to be concentrated more on the school classes and try to be a all-round student,which undoubtedly will assist me a lot on my daily study and shape me to be a dedicated as well as self-arrangement student.

What's more,by setting such kind of goal that I am supposed to seize all possible opportunities to promote myself,to enrich my study experience,to foster my abilities on academic study as well as become a master in my life,I will gain the willpower to overcome all the adversities during my study peocess,to better my capacities,and thus fulfill my personel value,which is be of essential significance for me.
Last but not the least,by arranging the money I got from my outstanding school work,it can also provide me a chance to master the money.

What's more,it is a kind of chance for me to learn to manage my financial resouces and motivate me to find and invest my financial resources,since I have become a college student,and it's time to face the potential difficulities during the time I turly come to the society as a specific individual.

Meanwhile,one thing I want to emphasis is that no pay, no gain, I gain the money because I have paid much attention on my study and shouldered the obligation as a qulified student,thus it's equal for me to gain some payments.

To sum up,as far as i am concerned,it is a practical practice for parents to offer their school-aged children money for each high grade they get in school,given all the profound and rewarding reasons all above.

When speaking of the sence of satisfaction during working, some people believe that doning different types of tasks can make wrkers be more satisfied, while others support that do similar task all day long can make works happy.
In my view, woekers will be more satisfied when they have different types of job to do during workdays.
Firstly, having many different types of tasks can help workers to drive away the boredness of similar tasks.
If one does similar actions all day long, he will get exhausted and tired.
Take my fiend as an example, when he got his intern job in a big company, his supervisor gave him just one task to do.
That is to type meeting documents into the computer.
During his three month internship, just sat infront of the computer screen, typing all the work hours, and felt like a robot.
In this way, he was not happy at that time and even did not want to  go to work every day.
After that, believe people can not do just one task during work time.
By contrasty doing various work can help to make work time more interesting and less boring.
That is why I think workers will be more satisfied when they have different types of job to do during workdays.
Secondly, doing diversity kinds of work can help workers to handle things more easily.
That is to say, by coping with varying tasks, workers will be more capable at work.
In this way, they will be stronger than they used to be and be more satisfied with what they are.
I remember my sister who is a manager now in  a big company.

Even though she is busy with lots of different types of works, such as joining a meeting about the recent fashion trendm giving a motive lecture to her company members, visiting the factory of her company, she tells me that she likes her job and enjoys it very much.
For one reason, she is thankful that her different tasks make her better understand her career calue and give her chances to umprove her ability to deal difficulties.
I will not forget how confident my sister is agter she gets promoted as the manager of her department .
Thus I think works will be more satisfied when they have different types of job to do during work days.
Even though doing similar tasks can make people be the expert in the working field, working on different types of tasks can offer oppportunities to explore more widely in the specific working area.
In this way ,there will be more chance for prople to feel satisfied.
To sum up, workers are more satisfied when they have many different ttpes of task during the workdays cause they can feel less boring and gain practical.

The parents will know their kids less and less and it turns to a raw relationship between the children and the parents.
All in all, I totally don't agree this kind of behaviour.
Whether the parents are unconsciouly know what will happen in the future or not, it is harmful to the children who are at school-age.
The parents ignore the potential risk of this action, however, they can use other  ways to encourage and award their kids who they love the most.
Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate amon people: In order to succeed, whether it is better to be like others rather than different from everybody else?
Some claim that being like others can help people make more friends and friends can help people succeed.
However, contrary to their view comes to my perspective that it is better to be different from every body else in order to succeed.
To begin with, being different from everybody else gives people more opportunities.
To be more specific, people always notice those who are different from others.
If some one is different from others, it means that he will give others an impressive first imprssion.
When people have some good idea or opportunity, they will first remember the one who is different from others.
On the contrary, if you just act like others, then nobody will remember you since you are normal and nothing special.
For example, my uncle Wang always work late and he was the last one left the office.
He did not like others who just stay away from office after 5 p.m. Becase he was so different, his boss noticed him and gave him a lot of chance to accumulate experience.
And sooner, my uncle became the charge of his department.
To be followed, being different from everybody else makes people more creative.
To illustrate, is is not so easy to be different from everbody else.
People have to learn a lot or create something new to show the difference.
In this case, those who are different from everbody else must be creative and creative people are more likely to succeed.
On the contrary, those who just act like others obviously cannot create something since they never think about different.
For example, Jobs, the founder of  Apple, the richest and most creative man since he change the whole industry of mobile phone.
He was so different from others because he was crazy about perfect and beauty.
He forced the Apple to made to most perfect phone of the world.
It is undoubtedly that he was successful because of his difference.
In conclusion, being different not only gives people more opportunities but also makes them more creative and these factors are also the important factors to succeed.

However, I disagree because there are several factors that will affect students' effeciency when they work together.
To begin with, different opinions may cause arguments, which may waste much time.
Every student is different so when students work together, they may have totally different ideas, which can lead to arguments in the group.
Thus, students may have to spend a lot of time try to talk to each other, and try to find a solution to the conflict.
And this will absolutely waste a lot of time doing nothing about the project.
In other words, students may work less effectively when they work together.
Then, when students do a project together, they may end up playing together.
Many students are not adults yet, so they may not control themselves.
Moreover, it is students' nature to play with others.
Thus, when students have a project for them to work in a group, they may gather together, but gradually forget what they should do and end up playing togerther instead of working on their project.
Take my own experiencce as an example, when I was in primary school, I have a text-based drama to practice with some of my classmates, so we went to one of the students' home.
After several hours, we did almost nothing.
Instead, we were playing PS4 together.
So I don't think students can work more effectively wen they work together.
Last but not the least, I admit that students may have different roles when they work in a group, which means they can work faster than working alone.
However, it also has a chance to cause chaos.
For example, when there are too many people in a group, it may be too noisy that few people can hear what others have said.
Then, they will try to yell, which will make the room more noisy.
Moreover, in this kind of situation, students are easier to make mistakes or can not continue their work.
So maybe working together may have some vantages, but the shortages can not be ignored.
To conclude, although there are vantages, but I think the shortages of students working together outweights the vantages.
So they may not work more effectively when they work together.
Nowadays, everyone give high exectations to themselves and struggles for their life everyday, since only hardwork can takes people success.
However, with the development of society, there is less and less chances for individuals to succeed, since the competition in the market is becoming more fierce.
So In my own view, If someone wants to attain success, he must behave differently, which them more knowledgeable, experienced than others.
Firstly, only can you work harder for knowledge can you gain success.
There are too many people dreaming for success, so you are supposed to be more knowledgeble.
In this way, you can have the capacity to do your work better than others,  such as in your major or in your position in the company.
Accumulating knowlegdge is the ladder to success, whjch means that you should learn to get the hang of important knowledge and make progress everyday.
But if you are not knowledgeable enough, no one will regard you as a potantial successful person, since you can not do many things well and you are just the same as other normal people.
Secondly, I think you are expected to bebetteretting along with others.
Friendship is very significant because friends can help you get out of the trouble and give you help when you need, which is neccessary to your success.

Besides, when you are disappointed or too stressful due to the great pressure from life, friends are able to impel you calm down and get pleasured by communicating or playing some interesting games together.
If you are poor at dealing with others, It is easy for you to lose the enthusiasm towards life, because there is no one you can turn for help or comfort.
Without enthusiasm, success will be out of reach.
So, in a word, if you want to succeed, you are supposed to behave differenty, so you can be distinguished from one's kind.

It is undeniable that younger people nowadays are more likely to be affected by celebrities than before, because they are more exposed to the information about them and opinions of celebrities seem to be made up to attract more people.
As to older people, most of them have already formed their ideas about things and are not as interested as younger people in celebrities.
In that regard, I agree with the statement that opinions of celebrities are more important to younger than older people.
First of all, younger and older people are exposed to different level of pubic opinions, and the former always get more.
To illustrate, take a grandson and a grandfather in a family.
The younger, the grandson, have various access to leading opinions, such as by sufing the Internet, reading a magzine or chatting with friends.
However, the grandfather, likewise the older, might only know a celebrity on TV news or morning newspaper.
In other words, older people just need some news around, while younger require the opinions of celebrities.
Even though the two people are in one family, they could have different exposure of opinions of celebrities.
What I want to emphasize is that the younger one in the family have obviously more ways to know about famous people than the older one do, which means a higher level of influence.

Secondly, because of the eleboration of celebrities' opinions, younger people, who are closer to those ideas, tend to be convinced by them while older people insist their own ideas about life and things.

It is natural for the celebrities to maintain certain images in front of their audience, for instance, a famous actor needs to be though as a gentle man to attract more female fans, or an athlete want to act like more powerful and opimistic than he truly is because in that way he may get more advertising chances.
Thus the opinions of these celebrities must be intentionaly processed.
Moreover, the belief in celebrities' opinions of younger people also calls for more positive information from the celebrities.
Both the two sides indicates the importance of famous celebrities  to younger people.
For the reasons for more exposure and eleboration, I agree that opinions of celebrities are more important to younger than older, and thus those opinions are necessary to be positively leading.

Now, some students and scholars believe that the university needs to give the high salaries to the professors, in order to enhance the quality of the education.
But some people disagree with this opinion, they think this way can't improve the teaching quality for the university education.
From my pespective, I agree with the statement.
I have several reasons to explain why.
Firstly,best people always want to go to the working places where have high salaries, so the best professors also want to go to the university which has high salaries.
For example, there are two universities in a city.
One of them has 100,000 dollars per year, but another has 150,000 dollars per year.
So a lot of best professors want to go to the latter one, and the quality of the education has significant increasing.
During several years, more than 10 students won the Noble prize.
So this university has a excellent reputation on the society, and more and more students want to apply it.
Secondly, a high salaries can cheer the professors up, they will be more hard-working.
Harvard, Yale, the very excellent universities in the world, also pays a high salaries to the professor.
The professors always put all of their energy in working, they always working more than 16 hours in a day, and they cultivate a lot of excellent students.
If the students are excellent, the quality are also be improved.
Finally, if the university uses more money on other things, are also unrelated to the education qualities.
If a university put a lot of money in the teaching facilities, it will looks more nice.
In a short-term, more and more students will be attracted to apply the university.
But the students and teachers are just focus on the best facilities, not on working and studying, the quality of teaching will not be enhanced, even declined.
A university puts 1,000,000 dollars on renew the facilities, students just like the facilities, not on learning.
So the fame for the university are not changed yet.
So the important things is chaning the professors.
The professors are the important leader for university students.
So, on the aspects of the professors living, their working attitude, and the importance for the university students.
I think the university needs to pay high salaries to the professors.

Liang Qichao, the famous Chinese writer has said "if young people are successful, their country will successful, too " which shows the importanec of young people for a country.
Nowadays many people believe that young people have no influence on the decisions which is important for our society.
I do not agree with them.
At first, young people can show thier ideas and suggestions to the grovernment durectly.
Nowadays government is more and more willing to listen to the public's vioce include what young people think.
They will follow a good suggestion no matter who make it up.
For example, the city I lived in was going to build subway in 2008.
And the government asked for advice about where should the stations localed.
The students in Wuhan university made a map to show where most of the people lived in and suggest stations should localed around these place.
The government accept their suggestions and even post thier thank to the students in the newpapers.
So it is much easier for young to show their opinions to government than the past.
Young can make huge influence on the important decosions if their ideas are good enough.
And young people can make influence in the important decisions by changing older people's minds.
It is quite common for parents to chat with their children.
Sometimes, if the children's ideas is reasonable enough, their parents or teachers will agree with them.
For example, we all know the vote in American.
The people over 18 years old had the right to vote for the people they liked.
But that did not means that people younger than 18 had no influence on that.
I once read a  price of news that a ten years old boys make the whole community vote for Trump.
He just went around and told his own ideas to the adults.
And many people thought his ideas was very correct and turned to vote for Trump.
So if young can not make influence in the important decisions directly, they can make people who surunding them to agree their ideas.
And these can make huge influence, too.
So is  not ture that young people have no influence on the decisions which is important for our society.

In such an dog-eat-dog society, everyone is struggling for its own happiness, but there are some ideas suggest that people should not be so aggressive to achieve success.
So a heated debate has been aroused that whether sucess is significant or it is more significant to stay happy and optimistic when you fail.
From my perspective, I hold the view that it is more essential for everyone to keep happy and optimistic.
Here are some examples and reasons supported my viewpoint.
First, it is universally acknowledged that stay an optimistic life can increase our chance to succeed.
Since people have an positive attitude towards life and there failure, people can judge themselves rightly and notice the shortcoming or mistakes they made in their failure.
Therefore, when people try next time, they are more likely to achieve success.
In contrast, if people focus on the result and hold a pessimistic attitude towards failure, they might witness their mistakes and magnify the mistakes.
So they might under great pressure when they try next time, resulting another failure.
For example, when I was an high school student, I often remain happy towards study and optimistic towards my failure in exams.
Even when I cannot pass the math exam with a grade 40, I told myself that others cannot get a good grade as well and I am not good at math.
So next time, I do not have so much pressure and do what I can do in the math exam and finally get an average grade 60.
Second, remaining optimistic can help build lots of relationship and thus easier to success.
Since people have optimistic attitude when communicating with others, they are more likely to share funny things to others.
Therefore, they might make a large number of friends because people love to make humorous friends.
lots of friend can be a key to success for the reason that more friends represent more helpers.
On the contrary, those people who cannot stay a happy attitude might have little friends because they are not confident in themselves.
For instance, I have a friend in high school who is a really humorous people.
Whatever bad things he met he would descride it as an interesting adventure.
Everyone love to be his friends and he benefit a lot from his friends like sharing notes and bringing breakfasts.
To put it into a nutsell, I firmly believe that people should stay happy and optimistic when you fail.

In my college, some teachers may make mistakes when they are teaching.

In this condition, some students may interrupt teacher right away and correct the teacher's mistakes, some students choose to tell the teacher after class, and the rest of the students will say nothing.
As far as I am concerned, I will tell the teacher right away when they make mistakes.
Here are my reasons.
First of all, teliing teachers the mistakes immediately can aviod us forget the mistakes.
If we wait until the class is over, maybe we have forgetten the wrong knowldge that teachers said.
Take my experiment for example, last week when my  math teacher was writing the points on the blackboard, I suddenly found that he write a wrong fomula about the light speed.
But I don't want to interrupt the class, so I decided to wait until the class is over and tell the teather privatly.
But when the class overed, I had already forgotten this mistake and until next day I had remenbered it, which is too late to correct it.
Had I correct the mistake immediately, I had not forgotten the mistake that I need to correct.
Second, only interrupt the teacher and correct the mistake in the class can every students know the right knowledge.
If we wait until the class is over, other students may already leave, so they may learn the incorrect knowledge.
My brother's story can illustrates the point.
He attended a class that the school had just opened.

Use this money, children can buy the thing that they really want, so they may work hard to sutdy, in order to get high grade.
But I don't think this is a smart way.
First the thing children use the money which they got for their hight great in school to buy may not good for their study.
Second chindren use high grade to eran the money, they may use some  another way to get the high grade like chess not work hard in their study.

In my openion, parent should use some oeher thing to attract student to study, to make them intrested in study, no use the way like this.
My friend Jin complained a lot to me couple months ago, he told me his grandparents blamed on him becasue he never help with the community.
However he did not think he did anything wrong.
So do young people nawadays don't give enough time to helping their communities?
Some would say yes becasue they are too busy to help with communities, others may think young people have taken enought time to help with communities by volunteering.
From my point of view, I strongly agree with the statement for some reasons such as they have heavy academic tasts and they need to develop their hobbies.
To begin with, young people do not spend enough time for helping their communities becasue they have heavy academic tasts.
In China, young people like students spend over ten hours in school at least five times a week.
Furthermore, there are a lot of homework need to be done by the second day.
So young people hardly have time to help with their communities.
For instance, my friend Jin was one of the victims.
He studied in Wuhan No1 high school, which is the best school in our city.
He stayed at school six days a week and his situation was even worse becasue he couldn't go outside school.
In addition, he also had a lot of homework to do.
The most important thing was he wanted to help with communities but he didn't have time.
So that's one of the reason that why young people nowadays do not give enough time helping with their communities.
Furthermore, developing own hobbies could also be the crucial reason that why they don't give enough time to helping with communities.
As I said, students spend five or six days a week studying in the school.
They really need to enjoy their weekends, isn't it?
There is nothing wrong if they want to play video games, travel with friends, play a sport or anything else.
Here is an example of my friend Mike.
Mike also live in school for six days a week.
He studied very hard during weekdays.
Also he liked to play basketball.
He spent more than four hours to play basketball on Sunday.
I had to say his parents supported him to play basketball because they thought everybody should have at least one hobby.
The thing I can not imagine is Mike is the captain of the basketball team in his university now.
This is also the reason that why young people nowadays are lack of time helping their communities.

Although some of young people take time to help with the communities by volunteer, I still think they don't have that much time to help with their communities becasue they have heavy academic tasks to do and also their personal hobbies should be developed as well.

Since having a good job seems to be such an important part of our life, the question of whether it is better for children to choose jobs that are similar to ther parents' jobs than to choose different jobs are something that we discussed over and over again through our whole life.

Even though this is something that I do not really think that worth our effort to argue about, since everybody has their own characteristics and interests, it is not up to us to decide what it good for them.
Personally speaking, I do think it is better for children to choose jobs that are similar to their parents' jobs.
There are just so much beneficials if they choose to do the same jobs, and the reasons are as follows.
Firstly, most children growing up with their parents will inevitablly influced by their parents' career.
What their parents been talking during the dinner time, what they have been reading will all have an impact on thh children.

The children will have a sense of idea of what their parents are doing, and it is likely for the children to grow an interest on the similar subjects since the children are hearing or looking at it all day.
Studying all those "second- hand" related information while growing up is a marvelous preperation for the children before they enter the college to study those subjects.
Taking myself as an example, my father is an archaeologist focusing on the ancient Asian Art.
He can talk about the ancient bronzes all day nonestop, and my family have a giant collection of archaeological books.
I grew up reading those books talking about ancient pieces of art, and I developed a deep interest in Art History.
Eventually I choose to study Art History as my major during my college, and with the information my dad had taught me before hand, I do feel myself is better prepared for college academic life.
So choosing a job that is similar to parents' job can help children to develop an early interest and prepare themselves for the higher-level study,

What I have been discussed about earlier is before the children entering the "Adult World" of finding jobs, and the second reason why it is beneficial for children to choose a job that similar to their parents' is that the parents can provide the children more resources and suggestions.
I think most parents want to provide their children the best thing they have, and  things that are really important during work are resources and experiences.

Choosing a similar job means, the children is entering a world that is very familar to the parents, they parents can provide so many priceless suggestions about how to do well in certain place since the parents themselves have so many experience already.
Since the parents have already worked for so long, they also have their own social networking that was build while working.
As we all know, social networing is essential when we are working, and have a strong and free networing that is provided by the parents are just marvelous.
If the children choose a job that is totally different from their parents, those are the benefits that they cannot really enjoy.
Overall, I definitely think it is better for children to choose jobs that are similar to their parents' jobs, because the parents can provide a lot.
I agree that it's a good idea for parents to offer monetary reward to their children when they have good performence in study.
It help improve the students' grades further in two ways.
One is that the students will be highly motivated to study, and the other one is that the students will also gain skills of money management.

If the children are given diffrent amount of money due to their grades, apprehensively the student who get best grades will be likely to get the best reward, which will make the others admire him very much.

The rest of the students will also work harder to improve their academic performance because they've already been promised that they will get as much money as he does as long as they reach the same grade.
Additionally, it will even motivate some of the students who don't really care about thier grades to study for the money.

The students in the class will therefore be more competitive as nearly all the students instead of  only parts of them are longing to be the best student, though a small proportion of students care more about the monetary reward they may be offered but less about the academic performance itself.
Another good point is that children nowadays lask of the ability of managing their money.

A lot of young students have no idea how difficult it is for their parents to make money to support the family, and would buy anything they like with out any slightly hesitation even if they are not born in an affulent family.

Nevertheless, since the money given to reward their academic performance is limited, they will eventually learn that the only way to earn enough money to buy all the things they love is through hardworking, because they must have spend a lot of time and effort to get the satisfying grades.
The next time they see someting attractive, they won't forget to take a glance at the price tag and then decide whether they should purchase it.
This will save the parents even more money than they spend to reward them for their grades.

I want to show my opinion first: It does help on some conditions, but it's not a good idea.
I hold the view that any smart parents won't do such things.
The money that is given to high-grade children may stimulate their willing to pursue high grades, however, this function is temporary.
As children are not mature enough, their opinions about values are not established completely.
As a result, their parents' actions can influence them.

In fact, the idea is common in China, as parents think it is the easiest way to reward their high-grade children.
But I hope that they can have a correct way to educate their children.

Some parents believe in the money would make children's progress, and some parents think in another way.
They both have their benefits of existence.
However, I stand for the option which provides money for the children.
Firstly, this motion would motivate children's ambition towards study.
It's not bad, isn't it?
The benefits of learning is not only the knowledge itself, but also the financial support.
The children would most likely to study harder in order to get that money goal.
As long as they get good grade, they would get the money or even freedom, and they could do whatever they want to.
Secondly, this motion would help them plan their life.
Before getting money, they have probably pay for this money equal value, namely, their grades.
They have to study harder in order to get good grade, and change the good grades into money.
This action also help them previously adapt the society, let the children know the truth that paying first instead of getting.
Thirdly, this motion would develop the relationship between the parents and the children.
It is not easy to understand, but the truth is that it does.
As the parents offer the money, the children would get a feeling of being love by others, truely, this motion brews the harmony upon the relationship.
If the children are insecure that time, losing his orientation, money would indicate a proper way indirectly by parents' purposes.
Thanks to the money, the children would operate the money to what they needs, and let the parents know about what they need.
In this case, the parents could find out what they missed to treat such a wonderful kid, and learn how to offer as well.
In conclusion, I prefer the way to offer the money, so that there could be more benefits that were shown.
I think rewarding school-age children who get a high grade with money is an effective practice.
Reasons are as follows.
Motivation is vital when people struggle to accomplish thier goals in providing them with energy and confidence.
Motivation is usually generated by certian forms of rewards including money.
Apply this theory to the case of the school-age children.

They also need to be motivated in the long run of studying, and money, as a rewarding, can perfectly fulfill the aim of motivating children because they can, in turn, buy whatever they like afterwards.
Second,money is not all bad.
There is a strange belief in our society that things associated with money are not suitable to be exposed to children when they are forming their world values.

however, as far as I am concerned, learning to manage money from an early age can better prepare a child for the futher when they have to step into the society which may seem unreal without the presence of money.
finally, I think this practice will instill in the children the belief that effort pays off.

at an early age when children do not know exactly what academic performance means for an individual's advancement in society, being rewarded with money which they can utilize to buy things they like or simply save for other purposes will give them a sense of achievement and thus will enable them to know that their effort pays off.

and it is paramount and beneficial to bear this truth in mind because there may well be the possibility that a child may do not know how to perform better in school and will do nothing but wait for high grade to come itself.
generally speaking, rewarding school-age children who get a high mark with money is beneficial to children both in thier academic work and in thier ability to manage thier money.
moreover, it can also teach them the philosophy of life.
I agree that parents should let children make mistakes and learn something from mistakes.
In China, when a kid makes mistake, his parents often choose to beat him instead of telling him what he has done.
This is not a valid way to educate kids, quite the reverse, it makes children hate their parents.
As parents, they are responsible to educate their children.
When children make mistakes, it means that they are not good at some aspects, they are not qualified to accomplish the task.
Therefore, they have to learn some experience from mistakes so that they can finish the problem perfectly next time.
This is also a sort of education for children.
In this part,parents play an extremely important role.
Children are young, they sometimes do not understand right or wrong.
Likewise, they are not able to learn and prevent mistakes independently.
In order to help them and lead them to do better next time after a mistake has been made, parents are necessary to teach them.

When I was young, I made a big mistake that I ran to a place without a penny which was really far from my home, my parents knew this from neiborhood and were worried, they looked for me for an afternoon.
After we were home, they did not beat me.
Instead, they talked to me about the danger of running out alone, they asked me to stand in their shoes, which left a great impression in my mind.
I knew I had done something wrong, I had to correct it and learn the danger of getting out of home alone.

In the examplary true experience of mine above, I want to state that it is very necessary for parents to let kids make mistakes because it is efficient and feasible to engrave the experience and what parents want kids to know in their minds.
"Which do you prefer,working together or alone?" when project is assigned, it's a question worth being asked to secure the efficiency.
For me, I prefer working alone.
Here are my three reasons.
First,working alone can avoid useless comminication and save time.
When a group of people work together, there must be a lot useless communication, in other words, conflict involved.
Members will certainly argue for some useless details, which will waste a lot  of time.
If I can work just by myself,it can be prevented.
I can use these saved time to polish the solution, fix the problems, and so on.
In this way I can make the project closer to perfect project.
Second, I can gain more kinds of skills while carrying on the projects.
When people work together,they may distribute works to members and everyone just only focous on his or her owm business.
But if I can work alone,I can learn many kinds of skill, from the start of the project to the end.
Even though I will make some mistake while trying, I can learn a lot at the end of the project.
And it may not happen if I work as a team member.
Thirdly, if a project is only undertaken by myself, I can control the whole project completely.
I can slow down one section in order to wait for other sections, or abandon one sector to deal with unexpected trouble.
It surely will cause many trouble in a team and waste a lot of time to communicate, like I just said above.
But that is Ok if I just work with myshlf.
It obvious that teamwork is useful in some areas,like members can work together and combine their abilities to get a breakthrough,or other many benefits.
But I still am fond of working alone.
Just like an old saying goes,"Being alone leads to success."

At present, there are many old and historic buildings in many cities.
Some people think that the government should build new housing to replace these old buildings.
That is because these historic buildings are useless for people's living.
Others reckon that these old nuildings should be preserved to use on the development of economy.
In my opinion, I support the latter standpoint.
Above all, the government should keep the historic buildings to facilitate the development of economy.
For example, the quadrangle dwellings in Beijing, China ought to be pulled down few years ago.
But some officials insisted that the quadrangle dwellings should be preserved to develop the tourist trade.
So the government gave them 5 years to earn money by using the quadrangle dwellings.
They arranged prople to publicize the quadrangle dwellings and found the department to manage the tourist trade.
Finally, they completed the assignment just 3 years.
And now, the quadrangle dwellings are the one of famous buildings in Beijing.
Therefore, the old and historic buildings are crucial for the economical development.
What' more, the ancient dwellings can be used to advertise the culture of country.
For instance, the Imperial Palace is well-known all around the world.
It presents Chinese historic culture.
Many foreigners are all coming to Beijing to visit the Imperial Palace and know the history of danasty in China.
And most of them are shocked by the Chinese culture.
When they go back to their country, they might tell their families and friends about China.
As a result, more and more people will know the Chinese culture.
So the ancient buildings represents a country's history.
Reserving these buildings is a way to spread the cultural influnce.
Conclusively, it's significant for the government to preserve old and historic dwellings.
If these buildings are replaced by the new housing, the country will be short of the specific culture and one source of economy.

Parents hop to cultivate their children into successful people, but many children are unwilling to study seriously.

Naturally, he did not need to rely on these money to urge hime to study.

Travelling are becoming more and more popular nowadays, because people can learn a lot knowledge and experience different things during a journey.
From my point of view, travlling to foreign countries are more beneficial to people than travelling in people's own country.
First of all, travlling to foreign country can broaden people's horizon.

When people travel to a foreign country, they can experience totally different customs from the customs in their own country while travling in their own country they may find it boring because it may be the same custom from where they come from.
Then, they will get to know some local information about this foreign country, which can not be learnt from the internet.
Last year, I went to Thailand for a trip.
And fortunately, it was Thai new year at that time, so I joined local people to pour water on others, I was also poured.
And the local people told me that the more welcomed you are, the more you will be poured.
In this way, I learned a lot of local customs in Thailand.
And if I hadn't been to Thailand, I would not have been able to know these amazing customs.
Secondly, travelling to another country can make people learn some foreign language.

When people travel to a completely different country where people speak totally different language from the country they come from, people will manage to live there trying to communicate with local people.
During this process, people will gradually get to know a different language.
And after some time, people may be able to speak and understand some of the language.
Whne I was fifteen years old, I travelled to France, and I find that people sometimes will greet others though they don't know each other.
So after greeting with some of the people in the hotel, I learned that people say bonjour to others when they greet.
In this way, during the trip to France, I had the chance to get to know another language.
To conclude, travelling to foreign countries can give people different experience from travlling in their own country, and they will be able to learn more.
Do you like traveling in your own coountry or foreign countries?
My answer will be the latter one.
If we travel abroad, we can learn more culture about other countries and  also experience a brand new journey.
In addition, we can also challenge ourselves in other countries.
The specific reasons are mentioned below.
Traveling abroad can help me inrease my ability of  communicating and making new friends.
Take myself as an example.
Three years ago, I had been to America with my school.
Actually, that was my first time went abroad independently.
Before I went there I was a really shy girl and only have a few friends, but I changed a lot after I traveled there.
I communicated with a bunch of local students.
We shared our own funny experiences and also talked about different cultures between China and America.
I really spent an excellent time with all of them.
And I also taught my friend Sally how to speak chinese.
We had been extremely good friend.
And until today, we have chatted with each other in Wechat.
After It travel in foreign countries, I become more outspoking and outgoing.
And now, I always have the most friends than the peers.
I like travel abroad, because I can challenge myself really and have a big change.
Therefore, traveling to foreign countries can improve my personalities and teach me how to communicate and make friends with others.
In addition, traveling abroad can enrich my experience and expand my horizons.
Indeed, traveling in our own country can also have this founction, but they are different really.

In our own country, we can only learn something about some familiar things, but in the other countries we can learn some absolutely different culture and meet some different people who are not  same racial of us.
My elder sister had been to Britain last year.
She shared many thing with me.
She said the people there are totally different than in China.
The man there are aimed to be gentlemen.
And she learned that the people there will late for their appointment, which is regarded as a polite behavior.
Her view is expanded after she went there and she learnned many their culture which is different in China.
Hence, traveling abroad have more benifit than in our own country.
Choosing the latter one is better.
From my perspective, traveling to foreign countries can really help us a lot than just travel in our country.
We can not only enhance the ability of chatting and making friends, but also can rich our experience.
Currently, many people prefer to stay at home and read books or play on their phones in their beds in their spare time.
They think it is a perfect thing to do for relaxing.
However, I think it is harmful for their health if they stay at home all day long without going out or exercising.
From my perspective, doing physical exercise helps a lot with both our mental health and physical health indeed.
It is absolutely better to do physical exercise for relaxing than watching a movie or reading a book for relaxing.
One's mind and body will get comfortable while doing physical exercise.
When I am annoyed by someone or bored for something, I would like to go out, get some fresh air, and do some physical exercise.
I often feel that I can be reborn from doing exercise, because I feel like everything which is bad and bothers me a lot will all be swept away, and my mind is crystal clear while running.
It also helps people to lose weight and become much healthier by exercising.
Take my friend Lucy for example, she was overweight while in middle school.
In the summer vacation before high school, she was determined to lose weight by exercising.
She spent almost six hours in gym everyday, and she really changed a lot after that summer vacation.
