With the gradual development of society, there are more and more choices for people to select their favourable job, and people start to consider that : what kind of schedual should they take to work?
3 days long- time work or 5 days short-time work?
For my part, I prefer 5 days short-time work and I'd love to illustrate my reasons.
First of all, admittedly, the further seems more attractive because 3 days work means we have more days to rest.
After 3-day long-time work, we are exhausted and we eager for relax.
However, I don't agree that we need 4-day rest a week.
Hypothetically, I worked hard and felt terriblely need to rest.
If I need to relax myself, I will do many things that i love to do, which will make me unreluctent to go back to work anymore because i rest too much.
Thus the work time becomes miserable.
Second, short-time work will create a  relaxing mood to finish the tasks easily.
With the long-time job, we will feel tired and  the pressure originating from the work will reduce the efficiency.
If we can seprate the tasks into several part, we can plan more methods to accomplish them effectively.
For example, my friend Amy decided to write an eassy in one week and she wanted to finish it as soon as possible so she had a schedual of three-days.
She told me she could not tolerant that time anymore with more than 12 hours sitting in the libarary.
Then she changed the plan and she needed to finish that eassy in 5 days.
After that change, she felt more relaxed and happier to write her article.
She got A plus in the end.
Last but not the least, if we choose to work 5days in a week, we have more attention on our work and we will love the time that we can rest ourselves.
People always love those they do not have.
Therefore, the less rest time we have, the more valuable the time is.
After the work, we will figure out more entertaining staffs to make us delighted.
Once, my brother had a long-term vacation after an important exam, he told me he felt boring, then my aunt asked him to participate an extracurriculum.
After taking that class, he valued the time he could rest.
Long-time work make us feel better.

I agree with the satement: Parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
Making mistakes is the most natural way for children to learn and to develop a mature mind.
Firstly, When someone make a misake, he or she will learn quicker from the mistakes.
The mistakes a child made at a young age will be remembered for a longer time.
In my case, my mom always says when she was young nobody told her to keep the manners.
She was being shouted at for not having a good manner.
She still remember the events and said they are beneificial to her life.
However, when she teaches me to keep my manners, I always need to be reminded many times.

Parents should not only let children learn from the mistake itself, but also to learn that faliure occours sometimes, and the best way is to overcome them because nobody can help.

The skill is exceptionally important.
When a child makes a mistake, parents should help them how to avoid such mistakes next time, and so he child can avoid the same kind of mistake.
In conclusion, parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes because that is a most efficient way to teach.

Parents sould not hold on to their children and protect them from the unkown world.

From my perspective, relax by doing physical exercise is as good as relaxing by watching a movie or reading a book.
Which way is better depends on what kind of joy you want to acquire.

However, if you are exhausted after  lots of physical work, doing exercise might not be a good choice to relax.

When we are traped in dilemmas and feeling confused about the future, the biographies of celebrities are able to bring us faith and courage.

Thus, if you want to improve your health condition, you can choose physical exercise.
And if you want to enjoy a spirit tour, you can choose a movie or a book.
They are both able to reduce your stress and help you relax.

In this society, celebrities have high status, and many people take their words seriously.
Many people think that the opinion of celebrities, such as famous and athletes, are more important to younger people than they are to older people.
However, I tend to disagree with this statement for several reasons.
Fisrt, the opinons of celebrities may not right.
The celebrities are not saint so they might say something from their own perspective, which is not good for the teenagers.
For example, Han Han, one of the most famous writer in China, once said that he thinks learning math is useless and it is enough to just take math courses before junior school.

By listening to his opinion, the teenagers who do not like math will comfirm their ideas that math is useless and they are likely not to study hard on math which may cause bad influence on their study.
However, we all know that math is important for building our logic.
In that case, the opinons of celebrities are not right sometimes and thoes opinions may have a bad effect on younger people.
Nevertheless, older people have better discretion, so they will able to diffrentiate truth and fault.
Second, celebrities may be forced to give some opinons by commercials.
The teenager who like  following their icons always believe in what they say.
When the celebrities say that one product is great, they may be paid to say so.
The teenagers may believe in their words and buy the products the celebrities recommend, which might be a waste of money.
Since we all know that the words for advertising are not all real, the opinions from the celebrities might mislead the younger people.
The younger people always quite believe the celebrities while the older people are more objective, therfore they will not take the words of celebrities seriouly.

The opinion varies from person to another.
Some claim that library should be cut down, others hold the view that the police is less imporant than other choice, so that it should be reduce.
However, contrary to their view my comes my perspective that pubic transportation should be reduced.
My reasons are elaborated as follow.
Firstly, the goverment has to distribute various money to make sure the transportaion in the good condition.
Because comparing with the private transporation, such as car, choosing the public transporation is able to save a lot of money and prevents the people from the heavy traffic.
So more and more people prefer to take the public transportation in the daily life, which cause the unavoidable damages and consumption of the public facilities.
In order to repairing the equipments, the goverment has to afford a heavy burden, leading to a unavaliable budget during economic crisis.
For example, in my homwtown, many worker choosed to take a bus to the hill because of the cheeper prise.
After a long time use, the bus was in the bad conditon: some chairs were borken, the glasses was full of dust, and the max speed of the bus apparently slowed down.
So the goverment spends many money to repair and update these buses, which makes the government has no money to build a new city park.
By contast, the library and the police play a vital role in the urban city, espacially during economic crisis.
library could preserve a lot of resourses, which is helpful for peolple to acquire the useful information.

Maybe, at the begining, it can encourage children to study hard.
But, in the long run, I don't think it is a good idea.
Why?
As we all know, knowlege is invaluable .
Just like Bacon said "knowlege is power!"
Yes,knowlege is our tool to change the world.
We can't make the knowlege equal to money.
Tt's too utilitsrian.
At the meantime,this kind of behavior will mislead children.
That's not what we want to see.
What's more!
Money is not everything.
Parents can't set a bad concept.
On the other hand, is a high mark everything?
We all know, good grade not means you have learned a lot of knowlege.
Parents just claim the mark is a wrong decision in essence.
No one can always to be excellent.
Parents just pay attention to source, children will become misunderstanding, or worse, they maybe learn to lie.
This way can briefly generate children's interest to study.
But it will badly affect children's psychology and growth.
Do more harm than good.
Parents want their children to succeed in school.
They konw that doing well in school is good for children in the future.
That's why they decided to do all they could to help their children finish school.
However, in my opinion, giving money to a child for every high grade is the worst thing if parent do.
It may have some short-term consequences, but its devastating impact on children's lives is huge.
To make an activity enjoyable, you should do it for that activity.
This is what most religious and spiritual approaches emphasize.
If you just climb to the top, you won't enjoy the journey.
Climbing is only a means to an end.
In a similar way, if a person does something just for mony, when he feels he has made enough money, he will stop doing it.
Therefore, it is wrong to associate activities such as learning, exercising and healthy eating with money.
To be successful, one needs to continue doing these activities in life.
For example, I used to do well in shcool just to get good grades and make my parents happy.
Although their attention made me happy for a short time, it didn't make me happy when I was studying materials.
However,when I started to enjoy the materials and study for the sake of learning, I was very happy while studying, which meant a lot of time in the day.
On top of that, if parents donate money without knowing what it's for, it can cause serious problems for their children.
If a child needs to buy something, he should ask his parents for money.
In this way, parents not only make sure the child really needs the item, they also check if it's appropriate for the child to have it at this age.
In addition,it can encourage children to indulge in shopping.
When parents give their children money, they send messages to buy things with that money.
Spending money because you have some money in your pocket, rather than thingking about what you really need, will lead to excessive shopping bad havits in the future.
Today, many young people are in debt ceacuse they don't learn to stop shopping when they buy what they need, but shop shopping when they don't have money on their credit card.
Generally speaking, giving money to a child with good grades has a lot of negative effects on his life.

It is also an era when the general living standard has improved greatly, so parents can divert their energy from working to educating their children.

Despite the rapid development of today's society, influence from young people is no more than a commonplace.
Recently, an interesting question has aroused heated discussion: Do young prople influence the duture of society as a whole?
Different people have differential ideas.
Some people thinks the youth today still have a great influence to the society as a whole.
From my perspective, I think the youth have no influence on the important decisions in society as a whole.
My reasons are as follows.
First, young people today are obsessed with entertainment so they do not want to influence the decisions in their society.
With the high development of Internet, the computer games and applications of short video are more attractive.
Young people who are inmature mentally are likey to play computer games, watch the videos and surf on the Internet for a whole day.
Due to being addicted with entertainment in electric devices, adolescents are not willing to study knowledge and paticipate with other young people in some activities to influence the society.
On top of that, nowadays young people are not prone to communicate and cooperate with others because of the change of interpersonal relationship.
With advanced devices like computers, young people now are like to and are able to solve peoblems alone.
Being reluctant to cooperate with others, they cannot affect the important decision of society as a whole.
On the contrary, in the past, young people have to cooperate to solve the problems in society because they knew that the things could not be solved by one person.
Consequently, they tried to influence the decisions of the future of society together.
Admittedly, some young people are still trying to affeect the decisions that determine the future of siciety.
For example, one of my classmates participates in the design of the subway in my city.
However, he is the only young person in the team.
Young people do not influence the future of the society together.
And when consider the two main elements above, the paticipation is only a minor factor.
To put it into a nutshell, I agree with the statement that young people today have no influence on the significent decisions of the future of society as a whole.

Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: whether the ability to maintain friendship with small group of people is more important and decides your happiness, compared with the ability to make new friends easily.
As far as I  am concerned, the ability to maintain friendship is more important.
To begin with, the ability to maintain friendship can consolidate friendship.
To be more specific, friendship just like wine.
As we all know,  the longer the wine is stored, the better it tastes and so is friendship.
The ability to maintain friendship help people consolidate their friendship  and thus they will have more good friends instead of some friends which just know each other.
On the contrary, the ability to make new friends easily cannot provide people good friends since people always make firends but they never consolidate their friendship.
For example, I always meet and play with a small group of my friends.
After a long time we have been spent, we became best friends of each others, and they will always try their best to help me when I was in trouble.
It is no doubt that they are good friends.
However, my brother Jack always make new friends since it is very easy for him to do that and he never consolidate his friendship.
It is ture that he has a lot of friends, but none of them help him when he need money to create his business.
To be folllowed, the ability to maintain friendship can give you more happines than just make new friends.
To illustarate, people will be more happy when they spend their time with their best friends.
Even though they do not prepare for what they do.
On the contrary, make new friends always need to prepare but people may not be happy.
For instance, people always make friends in some social activity and they always need to prepare their face and soem sotries about them to make sure they have enough attractive to others.
It is no doubt that in this case they can make new friends easily but they may not happy since they just force themselves to be a perfect human.
However, spending time with a small group of your firends give you happiness even though you just talk with each other and drink some wine.
You do not need to prepare and you can open your heart.
This is why maintain friendship with a small group of people can give you happiness.
In a conclusion, the ability to maintain friendship with a small group of people can not only consolidate friendship but also give people happiness.

Last, tutors can play a role in supercising students' hard study and it will help students obtain a good-looking grade.
there is no doubt that the three idea above are better than spending money on salaries for professer in order to improve the quality of education.
On the other hand,
All in all, as I mentioned above, Providing professer with money as their salary has potential hazards such as running out of their motivation to teach.
There is no doubt that it will damage to the quality of education.
Nevertheless, there are still some other ways can enhance the quality of  education such as arranging a tutor for every freshman.

It is universially accepted that  parents  should allow their children making mistakes and learning from their errors because it is benefical for children's growth and it provides them an opportunity to learn how to solve problems and take responsibilty during that period.
Nevertheless, some people reject this notion and they believe it is too young for children to learn from their mistakes and partents should guide their children.
As far as I am concerned, I agree with the first idea and I think children should learn from their mistakes as their own rights.

First of all, if parents let children make mistakes and let them learn from it, it will be good for children's mental growth Children learn about responsiblity from that process and they will mind their behaviors in the future by themselves and become more independent compared with others.

Professor Lee did a research last year about weather parents should let children learn from their erros, he found that those who learned from their mistakes when they were young became more successful and independent than those who did not.
Secondly, parents can not manage their children all the time because they will grow up one day and establish their own family.
I think the best way for young children to grow up is to learn from their mistakes at very young age,it is a good way for them to become independent and take responsibity.
Take Madame Cruie for example, when she was very young, her parents allowed her to make mistakes because they believed there is no perfect person in the world and let her learn from her mistakes.

For these speical experiences, Madam Cruie became more independent and knew how to overcome difficults compared with other girls at her age, finally,she made gaint breakthrough in science research, To sum up, I believe that it is parents' duty to let their children learn from their mistakes.
It is fine when you make mistakes, more importantly it is your attitude towards your mistakes.
If children sovle problems by themselves without parents' help, they will become more responsible and independant when he meet difficults and mistakes in the future.

Currently,there exists a phenomenon that some parents offer their school-age children money for each high grade they get in the schoolï¼Œwhich arouses the public's concern and discussion.
Some individuals hold the view that the kids can be encouraged and inspired to learn hard in this way while others argue that high grades can not be connected with money.
From my perspective,I regard it as a unwise way to encourage school-age children by giving money.
Initially,each children who learn in the school have the duty to study hard to get good grades.
They study hard for themselves but not for their parents or the money they will receive.
Having high grades is conducive to their further improvement and their own development in the future.
Therefore,they are respected to study spontaneously and ask for no reward.
Simultaneously,kids receiving money tend to become thirsty for more money when they get higher grades.
Provided that their parents don't offer them adequate money,they will be angry and uncontented with their parents.
For instance,my uncle gave his son a little money when he got 95 in a math test,which his son was satisfied with.
However,at the next time,he required more money when he got 100 in the test.
My uncle didn't agree with his idea,and they had a tough argument and even didn't speak to each other in a long time.
The example illustrates the perspective well that the reward doesn't function as well as we think about.
Last but not least,being exposed to money-related reward too early is not beneficial to them,for the reason that they may relate everything to money.
They may hope that they can get money although they only get a little improvement or do something for others.
When you ask them to concentrate on classes and work hard, they don't listen to your opinions and ask for reward instead,which will definitely bring about negative influnce in his later life.
To draw the conclusion, I don't endorse offering school-age children money for high grade they get in the school.
Recently, the problem of whether it is desirable for kids to select jobs that are similar to their parents' jobs or not has caused a considerable concern.
Some people claim that choosing jobs that are totally different for parents' jobs contributes to boardening children's horizons.
However, I hold the opposite view that it is advisable for kids to select jobs that are similar to their parents' jobs for following reasons.
The first reason to support my standpoint is that choosing jobs that are similar to parents' jobs paves the way for getting promoted in the future.

To be sepcific, when children iniates their jobs, their parents who are fully experienced are able to teach their children with several professional knoledge and useful skills, which enables their children to become more outstanding in the enterprises.
For example, my father used to be a manager in the international company.
He charged the marketing department and accumulated a large amount of experiences.
Afterwards, I selceted the similar jobs and wanted to become better.
Then, my father taught me a considerable of knowledge and information, it leds me to adapt the working atmosphere quickly and did a decent job.
At last, because of my outstanding job, I was promoted to the manager.
Therefore, only in this way can people to get promoted in an efficient way.
Secondly, selecting jobs that are similar to their parents' jobs lays a solid foundation for saving a great deal of time.
precisely, since children encouter various problem, they tend to ask help from their parents, which can solve the working problem efficiently and save time.
For instance, my uncle is one of managers in the company.
Once, he meeted some proble m that his worker had a tendency to work in an low efficiency.
He considered thsi problem for a long period of time, and could solve it.
Afterwards, he obtained helps from his father.
Then, he applied  methods into his employees and it did worked.
At last, he could have more time to allow hsi staff to finish other works.
Therefore, it is choosing similar jobs that is beneficial for children to improve their efficiency and save time.
Admittedly, there are some advantages of choosing jobs that are similar to their parents' jobs.
To be more detailed, because children work in a different area, they tends to boraden their perspective.
However, it is not suitable for a long term growth of career.
To sum up, I believe that it is better for children to choose jobs that are similar to their parents'

In light of the rapid development of the city,the pollution of the environment and the heavy traffic have been cared about more and more by the pubic,for which the country needs to develop its public transportation.
The blke sharing scheme came into being in this situation.
The appearance of the bike sharing scheme does bring convinience to Wuhan people'S life.
When the destination is not so far,it's easier to ride the shareing bike rather than take buses or subway or just walk on foot.
What's more,it's a good service for users to experience at a low prince.
People don't need to buy a blke by thenselves.
Riding for one time just costs about one yuan.
However, there are also many problems need to be solved now.
First,we can see that the firms of sharing bike like Mobike and ofo can't make profits now even three years after their establishment.
Depending on other firms to give money for their development is absolutely an undependable way,and if this industry can work conitnuous waits to be seen.
Second,the impolite behaviours are always seen when riading the sharing bike,such as breaking the bikes,using them as their own ones and change the 2D code to get money illegally.
Third,the government hasn't constructed enough riding and parkig places for bike,and because of the boom of the number of bikes,it's hard to control this just by several volunteers.
Nowadays, parents award their school-aged children money for each high mark they get in school.
This phenomenon has raised great controversy over whether it's a right way to educate inmature children.
In my view, I give this act full support based on the following reasons.
First, this way can encourage children to study hard and keep them on the right track since they are too young to understand what is really important for them.
According to a recent scientific research,it is not until graduation from high school that most of the children get to know that education actually benefits themselves a lot.
Second, it grants parents some precious free time for relaxion.
Imagine one have to teach thier children how to solve the math problems in his child's homeworks after a working day.
How tiring can it be!
Therefore, by awarding children money for high grades, children themselves have to spend more time on studying with less help from their parents.
Third, this method will teach children children an important idea that will benefits them for the rest of their lifes.
And that is hard works will pay off.
Through giving children awards when they achieve a great score, children get to know the importance of hard work.
In addition, the sooner we use this method, the more deeply this idea will rooted in children' minds.
Thus, if they meet some tough situations the future, they will pay more efforts to conquer them by themselves instead of waiting for their parents for assistance.
Last but not least, although this way might not be perfect, it is significantly helpful.
According to my own experience, I used to struggle with my grade in the middle school.
However, after my father introduce this method to me, my grades improved a lot because back then I was a fan of shoes.
Therefore, in order to buy the shoe I've been dreaming of, I have to put in lots of efforts in study.
And my efforts paid off.
In a nut shell, this is a brilliant idea because it can benefit both the children and the parents.
So why not just give it a shot?
Whether to offer school-age children money for hogh mark is a debatable problem.
In my opinion it is absolutly a great idea to offer money for their high grade.
Offering money can give children encouragements to work harder.
When children get paid, they will learn that if they work hard and get grades, their payments can be repaid.
My cousin used to have no interest in study, but when my aunt permitted to offer her extra money,she began to spare no effort to study.
Finally my cousin het more and more progress ,and became more and more interested in studying.
Recently ,in an English test, she got top five in her class.
If she could not get extra money form parents, maybe she will not be so ambitious in getting progress.
Offering money for high mark can teach children a principle that no pains , no gains.
Students can not ger good grades without  hard work.
For example ,my brother , in order to make little progress, stay up very late and get up very early to learn history.
Every time he wants to give up , the prize reminds him that he will not achieve anything if he choose to quit.
At last my brother persisted for six months preparing his final exam.
And the result is convincing he reached his goal and also  got his money for his payment.
Giving money for students' good grades can make students more adaptable to the society.
As compitition becomes more and more intense , students must become more and more  competitive.
No one will pay you money if you make the work a mess or you have no impact on making profit.
Only when you make distirbution in your field, you can get your payback.
My calssmate started to receive moner for good grades at a very young age .
Now when he works in a shop he always  wants to do more work than his colleages , because he knows all his effort will be payed back.
And he becomes the most effective staff in the shop.
So ,from three perspectives ,i firmly believe giving children money for their good mark is benificial to school-age children.

Personally, I agree with that it's of greater importance for government to spend money to improve Internet access than to improve public transportation.
And my reasons are as follows.
First and foremost, the access to Internet is the key to a new world.
It can take you farther than public transportation can do.
It is universally acknowledged that the 21st century is the century of information, and Internet is the key to those numerous information.
With the access to Internet, one can travel all over the world simply with a small screen and even the universe.
What's more, the Internet can answer his questions and help him accumulate knowledge in addition to cultivate his curiosity.
According to a recent data from the government, nearly half of the citizens in my homeland still haven't got  access to Internet so far.
Most of them live in remote places far from the prosperous cities.
If they could get access to the Internet, they could be linked to the larger world outside their small villages in a virtual way.
Moreover, the access could equip them with so many resources that they can learn a lot from them and live a more colorful life, even coming up with some fantastic ideas that benefits the society.
Second,improving Internet access costs less than improving public transportation in addition to brings more benefits.
As mentioned above, half of the population lives in remote places.
It costs more time and money to bring them public transportation .
In comparison, improving Internet access is easier to reach and will be more benificial in a short term.
Therefore, the government should focus more on Internet access  improvement and put the pt in the second place.
As what is mentioned above, it's more important for the government to spend money on Internet access improvement than improving public transportation.
Nowadays, the education is a really essential issue for debates.
One thinks that parents should warn their children and keep children away from the wrong things, another thinks that children should be allowed to make mistake and learn from their own mistakes.
From my perspective, the latter one is better for children to learn and grow.
Firstly, making mistake and learning from it will be more expressional for children.
Children usually do not know whether is right or worong about what they do.
Thus, if their parents tell them about the thing and alarm them do not the worng thing.
indeed, they will keep away from the so-called wrong thing.
However, they cannot understand some bad severe consequence and learn some essenticial experience from the mistakes.
Whereas children have the opportunity to make mistakes, they undoubtly have more importance understanding and new experience from doing so.
Secondly, keeping mistakes away from children will lose their courage to face mistake.
A  large number of children keep away from mistakes or some wrong things is due to their parents's words.
However, children inherently have tendency to do various interesting things whether the result of doing these is good or bad.
It is harmful for children to explore and learn from doing the different things if restricting what them can do.
Restricted what they can do, children will lose interest to explore new experience and courage to face the wrong result they did.
To conclude, children should have the opportunity to make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
In this way, children will experience more new things and keep the courage to face mistakes, and flinally grow to a good audlt.

Recently, an interesting discussion has aroused among public: whether students are supposed to be provided more time to do what they want to do.
Some people claim that children should spend more time on doing homework or joining in activities that are held in school.
However, I think young students should spend more time on whatever they want.
My reasons and examples are shown below.
Primarily, successful people cultivate their hobbies when they were children.
Normally, children's hobbies are not related to staff in school so they have little time to discover or develop their hobbies because they have to go to compus activities after school.
And if children can spend more time on their hobbies they are usually open-minded and have specialists which gives them more options to choose when they grow up.

For example, my little brother likes playing computer games and he begins to interested in making games so he learns programming online and now he is a very successful programmer in Tencent even if he is poor in sports.
Additionally, children who spend time on what they want to do have a good studying condition.
This is because they daily lives are full of what they likes and they have the chance to stay with them which makes them satisfied and cheerful.
Therefore, they have a relaxing condition and they can pay full attention to class.
For instance, when I was a child,I like watching movies and I usually spend 2 hours a day on watching time and I feel my daily lives are relaxing and abuntant so I can be relaxed to take classes.
Granted, children spend most of their time on school activities or sports can may have wonderful school life.
However, those young students usually do not have many spical skills and are really common.
Because they all experience same activities and do the same thing together all the time.

In conclusion, children are supposed to be given more time to do whatever they want which can make them successful in the future and also let them have a good studying condition in class to get a good grade.

Nowadays,more and more parents spent more time on their children's study and it is well acknowledged that chinese parents are willing to use any methods to improve their chindren's academic complements.
Among these methods,offering children money for each high grade they get in school is the most well-known and the most controversial one.
Many say that giving children money for their grades can boost their interest for study.
Others argue that doing this can only led to negative effects.
For my part,I prefer to the latter oppinion.
Took myself for example,when I was in my primary school,my grades was neither the best one in the class nor the bottom among my peers.
However,to get a grade is one thing,to improve my grade is another.
I could barely take a step forward in my academic complement for a long period of time.
Noticing the situation,my father proposed a schedule.
In this schedule,I was strongly encouraged to get a promote in ranks.
In spesific,if I could rank one step higher,I would recieve a special "scholarship" from my family for the amount of about 10 yuan.
This arangement inspired me the moment I was informed.
For the task was not that hard and the rewards were so attractive.
However,after a short time of delighting,I got tired about it swiftly.
I was no longer willing to fight for a few coins and the schdule failed in the end.
From this example from me,we can see that the suduce of money cannot take one's heart forever.
For it is shallow and easy to past away.
By giving school-age children money for their promotion in schoolworks,parrents might think that they have fullfilled their duty to guide their children.
Just in the contrast,acting in this way can only  produce negative effect on thier kin just like the false over-purchasing for money.
More importantly,money cannot really draw chidren's interst to their study which is the cornerstone that any successful educator can not mistaken.

Recently, an interesting topic has aroused a heated debate among public: whether young people today are more willing to invest their time and efforts in improving the world than people do in the past.
The answer varies from person to person.
From my perspective, I believe young people today indeed are more likely to dedicate their time and energy on progressing this world.
To the begin with, young people know more about this world which need to be improved than before.

As we know, along withe the ever-lasting development of technology and media, young people have more access to learn what the world looks like, such as by looking through the Weibo and news reports on the TV.

After knowing that there are countless people in the world still need money and help, it is possible for young people who have much passion and enthusasim to invest their time and efforts to make the world better.
On the contrary, the young people in the past did not have such convinient techonoly to know the world.
Even  if they are passionate they have no access to learn what they should do.
For example, my friend looked through the news accidentially on the TV about the children in the Africa have no money to get education.
She was shocked and decided to help them as a volunteer.
Next year , she participated in a project which aim to help children in Africa.
Furthermore, young people today are more responsible to improve the world than the one in the past.
This is because nowadays people focus on the elite education grandually, which means teenagers are taught that they should do something to the world in order to prove their value.
In this case, these young people tend to invest their time and efforts to change the world.
In the contrast, in the past, young people aim to make more money and improve their own life quality owing to the deficient food resource.
For example, when I was in the primary school, my teacher always told me that we should became a person who can be useful to the society.
Later, once I saw someone in the street who need help, such as lost their way I would gave my hand to them and though I was improvinng the world in my way.
To sum up, young people today are more likely to improve the world by investing time and efforts than people in the past owing to the tech and education.

Although doing similar tasks all day long may make workers be professional and form affection towards a certain thing, in my opinion, workers are more satisfied when they have many different types of tasks to do during workday.
First, if then change their tasks, they may change their mindset of conducting things.
In this way, they can be more concentrate on the work the are doing and also improve their productivity, instead of being distracted.
For instant, it is impossible for us to just study math the whole day, for it is really hard and boring.
However, if we study math for a while, and then turn to English, it's obvious that we can improve our productivity.
Second, changing tasks means that we have the chance to learn to new things.
It's really a fantastic challenge for our life.
When touching something new and going beyond ourselves, we can achieve a sense of fufillment.
Different kinds of skills can also help us be more competitive in our futher life.
We can be suitbale to different jods and won't be limited to the certain thing.
Nevertheless, if workers do similar tasks alll day long, they may be easy to get bored and can't guarantee the quality of their work.
What's worse, because they spend all their time doing the same thing, the may lose the ability in other aspects gradually, which may form a limination to the workers' further development.
And his mind will be confined in a small circle, which is really harmful.
In summary, although focusing on one thing has many benifits, it is not a good choice for the worker in the long-term.
The society is changing all the time, so it's important for workers to learn new things and improve themselves continually to adjust to the changing world.

According to the scientific research,doing physical exercise has the magical effect which could make people happy and energetic.
A common misunderstanding is that doing physical exercise should make myself tired and worse.
Actually,not all the physical exercises are intensive,there's also some gentle one like yoga.
As an office worker or a student,you have to endeavour to the whole day sitting which may do harm to your pysical health.

As far as I am concerned, the practice of giving money to chidren who achieve high grades as a reward has a positive effect on the growth of chidren.
Reasons are as follows.
First of all, money acts as an encouragement to chidren when they perform well in tests.
When educating chidren, especially those who are at such a young age that they are not likey to be interested in the boring studying, the reward means a recognition of all the efforts they make.
Chidren tend to work harder to get the rewards and prase, which makes it easier to form a good habit of learning.

My young brother is naughty and used to be bored with studying, but nowadayshe always get high grades in every test because he can win a toy he want and get the chance to play games if he succeed to be top3 in the exam.
What's more, with money in hand,chidren are required to learn to do their own finacial management.
They can make choice s between spending money right now or saving for future use.
During the practice of using money,chidren keep thinking about the why and how they will use their money,whcih is beneficial to their future life when they grow up as an independent individual.
Take my roommate Luo for example.
Luo is a clever people because he makes some investments in stock market in free time and earns some money.
He was asked to spend his money on his own at a young age so he knows the importance of management and never waste his money nowadays.
I have to admit that using money as rewards do has some drawbacks.
Chidren who do not have a strong mind may use money for too much toys or pay too much attention to money rather than knowledge.
But with the in-time and correct guidance of parents,these circumstances can be avioded effectively.
To summrize,using money as the reward to chidren who get high grades in the exams is adoptive because it encourage them to do better in exams and learn how to use money in right ways.

From my point of view, it is more advisable to relax by doing physical exercise instead of watching a movie or reading a book.
Watching a movie or reading a book can actually help us relax and get us free from the pressure of working and studying, but doing physical exercis will play a much more pleasant role in relaxation.
There are couple of reasons that can support my opinion.
Initially, when doing physical exercise, we can totally get rid of the bothering trouble of working and totally enjoy ourselves doing sports.
Take myself for example.
I enjoy running a lot.
In my sapre time, I will always run around the lake.
When running, I can forget about all my pressure and trouble I meet during working hours, concentrating on running and sweating, which definitely helps me relax myself.
Therefore, doing physical exercise is a great way to release our stress.
To further back up, as is known to us all, doing physical exercise can contribute to our health and strengthen our bodies.
After sitting on our chairs for long hours, what we need to do is to go out to do some physical activities.
Only in this way can we avoid obesity and protect ourselves from deseases.
Doing physical exercise is benefitial to improve our immune system and help us be in a good shape, on account of which should we choose the means of doing sportsto relax ourselves.
Last but not least, during doing exercise, we can meet a lot of people that share the same hobby with us and make friends with them.
To illustrate, my brother likes playing basketball to relax himself.
When he plays basketball, he works in a team who share the happinese of winning the game the together.
As a consequence, he meets a lot of people and makes friends with them.
So I suggest to do physical exercise to relax.
In a word, doing phisical exercise is abetter way better to relax.

There is a way to foster children that more and more wildly used by parents.

Giving children award can stimulate children to learn.

They may just enjoy their life and see study as something useless.
So, if we give them award ,they will be motivated to learn due to the things they want to get.
We will be happy to see they work hard in math to earn their own money to buy the bicycle that they have desired for a few month.

He used to think he don't need to learn bacause his parents will meet his every need only if he put forward it.

The story of my consin, as well as other children's experience like him, give the reason a strong prove.
The other reason for give child money for good grade is that this can cultivate their ability of managing money.
Supposing that a child grow up and earn his money, but he can not use them well, how much will be wasted by him.
If he learn how to use money in his childhood, it will be very beneficial for him.

So I don't think it's a mistake to see money as an award, after all, most of the adult try their best only to earn more money.
According to the two reason, I think parents can offer their children money for good grade.

From my perspective, I disagree with that the ability to relate well to people is of greater importance than studying hard in school for gaining success in a future job.
Nowadays, lots of people advocate the importance of the ability of socialization and think low of studying hard.
As for this statement, I could only feel pity for them for their lack of foresight.
First and foremost, no matter how great the ability to relate to people is, if you don't study hard in school, you will lack a core competitiveness in the future career life.
Let me illustrate this idea with my own major.
As for a student majoring in elctric and electronic engineeing, it's of great essence to equip yourself with various kinds of technological abilities for your future job in projects.
In addition, these kinds of abilities can only accessed by working hard through countless practices.
If you only concentrate on socialization ability in school and neglect the significance of studying, you surely can't get the hang of these techniques.
In the future, when your leader allocate some assignments demanding these techniques on you, your ability to relate well to your boss can do nothing helpful!
To sum up, the abilities acquired by working hard in school serve as core competitiveness for you, and this competitiveness it the basic for your career success.
I'm not saying that socialization ability is not important.
But for the period in school, study is out of question the primary task and responsibilty for students.
Other abilities like the ability to relate well to people, as far as I'm concerned, are secondary.
They will also help a lot when you have trouble communicating with workmates, showing your confidence or making business friends.

But we are talking about the time in school, all of these secondary abilities can be trained and gained throuth our whole life, but it's hard for us to spare a large amount of time to bulid up our core competitiveness after we graduate.
As a result, it's indispensable to study hard in school rather than spend the precious school time concentrating on other less significant things.
And this can best prepare us for the future success in a job!
There's a growing number of parents offering their schooling kids money for each high grade, and it received lots of contradictory opinions.
Of all the opinions, I think it's a good idea to do so for multiple reasons.
First of all, to those don't like studying, money can serve as a stimulant for them to pursue higher grades, and it's nothing wrong to get a good grades.
And to those already have good grades, money will encourage them to keep giong and even get better.
Psychology tells us we all need inspiration and happiness to do laborious works, either physically or mentally.
And in this case, if our kids just study and get nothing encouraging, they will probably lose interest in it.
Many school-age children still don't know how to make a plan, but giving money when getting good grades provides as an good example of how to plan.
Getting money is a target, and to achieve that target, you need to lieten to the teacher carefully in class, do homework carefully and review schoolwork thoroghly.
See, this is a plan--target oriented and process detailed.
Through this, kids will learn how to achieve a goal and make them better plan-makers.
Although, many people will argue that kids will spend money on useless things, I think we might as well take this as a chance.
We all know that managing one's money is very important if one want to be economy-independent.
You have to make a balance between in and out.
And if we give them money before they are eco-independent, this is a chance that they can learn somethng ecomonical in advance.
Besides, there's no need to give real money.
Parents can set a "Mom bank account" for their kids, and give virtual cash to their kids which can be used to "buy" something they want.
To conclude, giving money for getting good grades are benefitial in many ways.
It can encourage kids to study better, teach them how to make plans, or even teach them how to manage their own money.
So why not have a try?
With the development of information circulation, we are exposed to a great flood of what is happening around the world, which may be amusing, ironic and provoking.
However, a recent debate focuses on whether it is vital for everyone to know about what is happening around the world even though the events have not affected our daily life.
From my perspective, I agree that we should concern about what is happening.
Firstly, since human society is a interrelated one, although these events are not directly affeted us, they are bound to impose influence on us in the long run or indirectly.
Everyone has his social circle, which includes relatives, classmates, colleges and so on.
For example, the fact that one of my classmate falls his math examination does not related to me directly, but it may indicates that the teacher who teaches the class makes the tests more tough.
If I know about it and ask my classmate, I am likely to handle the course better in the future.
Moreover, thinking about what is happening can broaden our horizons and help us learn from it.
We cannot learn lessons all by suffering ifrom some experiences.
Therefore, we have to learn from others' experiences and avoid making the same mistakes when we ourselves face the same problem.
For instance, if a friend of mine suffered from copying others' homework and received severe punishment, I will not do that in the future.
Also, some events happen in the fields we are not familiar with, like a breakthrough in the botany.
By learning about the events, we are able to 000 and open up a new world.
Although to know about all the events around us takes time and energy, it is worth to do so.

We have to spend time socializing and relaxing and it costs nothing if we try to concern more about what happens around us and in the other corners in the world when others are playing computer games and drinking in the bar.
Above all, we can safely conclude that knowing more about something which is not related to us is crucial.
Not only can it prepares us for probable events coming to us, but also it can broaden our horizons and give us lessons.

Nowadays, parents gradually have lesser time to accompany their children.
Their busy work and fully schedules often take their time away from stay with the kids.
Thus, it is important to make the best use of the limit time.
I recommend that parents should spent their time to playing sports with their children and following are my reasons.
Firstly speaking, sport is a great activity to increase the familiar affection.
Because the limit time the parents take to spent with their kids, it is possible for the family to gradually grow a boundary.
Sport is a activity that need a sense of cooperation and trust.
Thus, parents and children can fix their relationship by playing games or sports.
My cousin usually play football with his dad after his work.
Compare to the parents that do not play sports with their kids, my consin and his family are really in a good relationship.
Therefore, the exercises like sports can build up a firm relationship for the family.
Secondly, due to the tedious work and hard schedule of the parents, play games or sports can actually help them to relax.
Parents nowadays often have a extrem pungent work and so do the children.
Therefore, a relaxing game or sport after the work can help them to decrease their stress.
In addition, due to the sedentary working habit, lots of people will catch a cold or have other office illness.
Playing games or sports can also help them to keep away from being sick and provide them a healthier family.
Finally, lots of people think that it is crucial for the parents to use their free time to do things such as schoolwork with their children.
They might think this strategy can have a improvement to the grade of the students.
However, we must know that the grade is not everthing.
Many children nowadays are suffering mental diseases due to the hard pressure of the schoolwork.
In China, especiallyï¼Œmany students cannot keep up with their hard classes and due to the careless of their parents, they choose a way to end up their lifes.
Thus, in order to get rid of this kind of tragedies, as a parent, it is more vital to take care of the mental health of their kids instead of their grades.
Playing games and sports with children after work help kids free from their schoolworks and also give a peaceful to the entire family.
All in all, games and sports are not merely activies that are fun to play.
Spending time to play games and sports not only do good to the children, this strategy also has benefit to parents themselves.

These years, a main concern on workers' satisfication about their work has been risen up and disscussed by the public with much enthusiasm.
Some people claims that the workers would gain more satisfication when they deal with mutiple-tasks during the workday rather than do similar tasks repeatly in the same day.
In my perspective, the argument is reasonable and should be accepted by working systems in the enterprises to some degree.
Also, several reasons and examples will be present below to support the point of view.
It should not be ignored that doing similar tasks all day long would more likely to stimulate the negative emotions among the workers.
It tends to be much boring for the workers to do one single task in the whole day.
By contacting a variety of types of tasks, the brains of workers could become more active during the operation.
Some easier tasks could even be regarded as a temporary break for the workers to refreash their mind and adjust themseleves into a sufficient energy to handle the tasks in an more effective approach.
Moreover, it has been considered that different types of tasks provide workers a chance to challenge themslves in the workplaces.

Obsorbing more knowleage and stategies about the works, the workers would gain more practical skills and working experiences from it and even benefit the improvement of their career in the future, For instance, one of my relatives used to be a nomal worker in a factory without high diplomas.
Once he started to learn more types of tasks in the factory, he has stopped work in that factory anymore and started his own business.
Now it has to say he becomes a successful businessman among his peer and recieved respect from others.
Overall, having many different types of tasks to do during the working obviously has more advantges instead of just doing one task.
At present, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among students: whether it's better to communicate in person with colleagues and classmates than by mail to do a project.
Answers vary from one to another.
Some people claim that it's proper to take in person to finish a work task while contrary to their perspective comes my own view that using mail is best way to communicate with partners .
My viewpoint is based on the following reasons.
First, sending email can elevate work efficiency and save time, which is conducive to completion of a project.
To be more specific, people can send mails anytime and anywhere.

If they want to inform their colleagues of somethinf important such as data, date and location, they just need to type the necessary messages briefly on the computers and then click the "send" buttom.
It's really fast!

However, if people choose to talk to their coworkers in person, they need to make an appointment in advance to make sure the collueagues have time for the talk and people also need to find places for the talk.
It's so troublesome and a waste of time.
For example, my uncle Jack who works in a bankoften deals with different projects in his work as a work group leader.
He always asks his fellow workers to use mail as the way of communication.

If the groupmates need some important data which needs to used in the presentation such as the interest rates of the coupons and bonds last year and the yield rates of the finance products, they just send e-mails between each other, which will eliminate the time and then raise the work efficiency of the whole group.
Second, using emails is more accurate than talking in person.
Specifically, messages presented by emails are longlasting and cannot be changed thus  the accuracy is the biggest advantages of sending mails.
However, if people choose to talk to their colleagues, chances are that they make mistakes in remembering some critically important infomation and then tell the wrong messages to their coworks.
In this case, the group will use the mistaken information as the referrence for their work and finnaly cause great loss.
For example, I once worked with my classmates as a team to participate with a mathematic competition.

During the procedure, we needed a precise data for our computer programs and  I thought I remember the concrete value and then I talked to my mates directly by phone calls rather than  searched for the value by computer and send emails.
In fact, I made a huge mistake about the decipher and finally we lost the game.
In conclusion, sending e-mail is better to finish a project for it can not only raise the work efficiency but also keep accurate recards.
Education is certainly the most important thing to chrildren nowadays,and the phenomenon of parents rewarding their children for their high grades in exam still remains a controvertial issue.
In my point of view, I assert that this is a good idea and a efficient way to stimulate children's interest in study, and it can also bring some other benifits.
Initially, offer children extra money as bonus can urge children to study harder.
When they recieve the award they earn themselves,they shall think that all the effort they paid is worthy,therefore, they would study in high mood instead of complaing about the difficulties.
This is a virtuous cycle, good mood help them to recite note efficiently,which in return turn in to good marks and the next bonus.
Secondly,this can boost the relashionship developement between parents and children.
Take myself as an example, my father promised to me that he would give me a large number of money if I could be qualified to my dream junior high school,but he ate his words.
I had an argument with him,let he knew he should complete his promise.
After that,he promised me he would give me 500RMB whenever I get a progress,and this make our relationship steadier.
So , the award would let children feel the honest of their parents,hence they can get closer to each other.
To summarize,offering children money as award to their grade is an essential way to help children get better grades and gather the family together

Group study plays an important role in students' daily life, but whether or not work together will learn much more effitively than those who asked to work alone on projects.
Some people claim that working alone can help improve concerntration and do not disturbed by others.
As far as I am concerned, however, I believe that working together have more effictively and can reap more achievement.
To begin with, group study will get more things down in a short period of time owing to explicit divide th work.
In a team, each people have different part of work, so all of them have a sense of responsibility to work hard in order to acquire a wonderful results.

Moreover, different people will have different opinions which can provide some essential and useful suggestion to this group, and then the group leader will guild the team member to find a beat direction to slove the group assignment.

Take myself as example, copared with those teacher who often make his students study alone, our English teacher usually assign us must work together and we have a excellent consequece about the assignments quality.
Therefore, I believe that work together are much more effictively than work alone.
On top of that, students also can acquire some specific skills during group study, which is the cornerstone to help students become well-rounded.
Working together not only can improve students' study efficienct, but also can help them obtain communication skill, leadership and the ability of teamwork.
As a students, although study is important, he also need to social network in order to adapt the society in advanced.
However, if students just work alone, he does not have more chances like those people who work together to get in touch with different classmate and express his own perspective.
At that time, he will lost the opportunity to exchange opinion with each other, which will decrease the study efficieny.

Judging from these evidences, we may safely arrive at the conclusion that when teachers assign projects on which students must work together, the students learn much more effictively than they are asked to work alone on projects.
The reason is that group study can help students have a big picture in woring decrition, but also promote students become versitle.
As a old saying goes: mistake is the best teacher, which means making mistakes is a necessary part in the process of growing up.
It is common for young people to make mistakes even though it may hurt them.
As far as I am concerned, when upbringing their children, parents should allow their children to make mistakes, which would benefit their lives.
Making a mistake is a unavoidable part of our daily lives, which makes us upset and confusing.
On the other hand, it sometimes teach children how to deal with the problems that they have to solve rather than just turn others for help or copy someone eles.
There are two reasons to comform this opinion.
First of all, making a mistake gives child the ablity and courage to face the problem.
For example, the first time when I learnt how to ride bick, I was too scared to move if my father didn't hold it.
I asked my father for help again and again, thus making no progress on the skill of riding.
As a result, my father told me to ride my own and experence the feelings by myself, even though I may hurt in the process of riding.
After tens of fall down, I finally learned how to ride a bick and how to face with the problems individually.
What is more, making mistakes would help children to gain experences and the courage to face with dilemma.
If a child rely too much on his parents, he would never know how to solve the problem and it is hard to build his confidence, which would give them a lot of trouble after they step to the society.
Taking a real story as an example, a college student pakaged all his dirty clothes to his home just because he don't know how to watch them.
His parents spoiled thier child and never give a chance for him to make mistake, making him to be a people who can not handle everthing.
All in all, the mistake may make children dispirited over a period of time, but it will teach them how to solve the proble and build thier confidence later.

I think it is not a good idea for parents to offer their school-age children money for each high grade that they get in school.
First of all, although what we learn in school is of great significance, but there are many things that are as important as what we learn in school.
Therefore, giving children a reward indicates that only high mark is important, which will mislead their children to study only.
As a result, they will miss many chances of learning extre knowledge and experiencing meaningful activities.
The most terrible consequse of this is that their children may fail to develop important traits such as humor, kindness and so on.
What's more, any person have its own talents.
It is of great possiblity that they don't good at school courses such as maths, languages or physic.
Rather than this subjects, they may have a gift at cooking, sprots or other things.
So, it is important to think carefully about what you children good at and what they liked.
Just focusing on high grade may let them not only lose confidence and lislike learning, but also ignore their talents and value.
Thirdly, such behaviour will encourage dishonesty.
If you children wanted to get more pocket money but were unwilling to study hard, they would cheat in the exam.
Instead, taking part in your children's study and concertrating on developing good behaviors and habits are more effective and beneficial.
The last but not the least, rewarding for high grade may give your children a false impression that they study for money.
In fact, you need to let them know that they not only work for themslves, but also work for the human beings, or our social will become too cold to survive.
In conclusion.
focusing on your children's gifts, habits,traits are more meaningful.
And company and care is more warmful than money.

It is a generally accepted fact that there is no better way to set up the cornerstone for the children's future achievement than giving their children better education.
Obviously, with the society develop, parents nowadays have more intention to involve in their children's education.
In the first place, in order to face the increasingly competition in the society, parents need to attend in their children's education to enable their children become more competing edge.
For instance, as informative period advance, whatever consider any job opportunity, to be mastery of a second foreign language is the neccesarry ingredient of work.
The reason is that only if people have more languge ability, they can attain more coorperation with foreign companies in this international period.
This way, the increasing number of parents take their children to take language courses and accopany them to study.
It is known to all that this phenomenon was impossible in the past.
Therefore, the increasing requrement in this competing society make parents are welling to involve in their children's education.

In the second place, recently parents have more time than the people did in the past owing to phenomenon that parents nowadays have fewer children than the past, which makes parents have more time to accompany their children can help them on education.
My family can successfully illustrate this opinion.

My mother have two brother and two sister; therefore, my grandmother could only distribute little time on each children and she need to earn more money to take care of these children when they were young.
This common phenomenon make parents in the past can not spend lots of time on their children's education.
Nevertheless, I am the only child in my family.
Therefore, my mother have not large budget on family and she have more time to spend attention on my education.
This condition makes her always take me to courses and check my homework of different discipines.
Therefore, the different family condition between current period and past time makes our parents can have more time to involved in children's education.
Furthermore, nowadays people's totally different perspectives from past make parents need to be more involved in their children's education.

In the past, people hold fast to the tradition that children were supposed to follow their parents career, which made parents need not spend much attention on their children's education because their can just teach their children their work experience.
Nevertheless, this tradition is extinct and children nowadays prefer following their own idea.
Therefore, parents need to spend more time to learn their children's opinion and to think about how to help them such as taking the course and attending the labs.
Therefore, totally different tradition betwine current society and past time make parents need to involve their children's education.

Nowadays, as many labor work could be finished by robots other than human, people are pursuing convenience in their own work.
Some would choose to work longer for several days and have more free days while others would consider working less hours per day but more days at work would be better.
There is not a definite anwaer to this question, however, as far as I am concerned, I would say that working more days per week but less working hours per day can have more benefits.
First, working less a day is better for work efficiency.
When talking about a task, people would surely think about its efficiency because efficiency is an crucial representative of the work.
The higher efficiency you have, the more wonderful your result will be.
And here comes to the work problem.

Since there are many researches on how work time affects the work efficiency, it is not hard to find that too much time focusing on one thing would definitely lower the efficiency rather than promote it.
So when people work for hours per day, they may find themselves not than doing anything useful in the extra time comparing to shorter hours per day work schedule.
And I feel that when I study.
I used to think that if I study for 12 hours a day then I can improve my grade quickly.
But the results turned to be irony as my test scores were even lower after several weeks 'assiduous' work.
Then I realized when I spent so much time on one thing, I would feel tired soon and gradually lose my efficiency, which led to my degradation in the test.
So from my own example, it is not a wise choie to work too long per day.
What is more, working more days a week can assist the workers in forming a better work habit.
It is knwon to all that when people do the same thing again and again, they would form a habit, which can improve their performance in turn.
And working is like that, if you spend five out of seven days on working, you would be more accustomed to the work and thus lead to a more proficient work behavior.
This is also very important when talking about work performance.
Still, I can give a example of myself.
When I was doing a part time job in a restaurant last summer.
I first worked for 4 days a week and then 5 days a week.
When I worked for 5 days per week, I found that I can handle the trivial things better than I used to be, even some skills which were newly introduced.
Then I figured it out that it was the extra day made the whole difference.
By working one more day a week, I can get to know more about the work and practice my skills more often in a short period time.
From this view, working more days per week can benefit staffs by improving their proficiency and flunency, or in other words, helps them bulid a familiar pattern of their work.

Admittedly, working 3 days per week has some advantages as it can provides the staffs more free days and they can do some huge activity like go on a long trip with their family or even hold parties with their friends all night long.
However, when taking job performance into consideration, these amusing things should be set apart as people could not lead a happy life unless they accompish their own tasks well.
So if people want to have a more fantastic life in the future, it is better to work more days and try to form a habit of working instead of spending the time for amusement more.

To sum up, working 5 days a week is prior to working 3 days a week as it can boost work efficiency and help the staffs build a more promising road for the future career and life, which is everyone's hope.

In this day and age, a controversial topic has aroused a  heated deabte among people whether people will use less time to cook and preoarung food in twenty years than they  do today.
Opinion vary from person to person.
Some people claim that people will not reduce their time to cook in the future.
However, contrary to these people's opinion is my perspective that  it is in twenty years that people will use less time to cook and  prepare food.
My points will be elaborate as follow.
To begin with, it is lacking of money that makes people to reduce their time to cook and  prepare food.
Because with development of  society, people have more financial pressusre, which needs them to earn more money.
The more time they spend on cooking, the less time they can use to make money.
Take my father as an example.
When was a young boy, he used to cook delicious food for me.
However, after the 2008 financial crisis, he does not have time to cook for me.
Becasue he had to make more money to support our family, like paying my tuition and providing health care.
What is equally worth discussing is that people need more time  to improve themselves ranther than cook and prepare food.
Because  with increasing of competition, people has to learn more  useful skills to facilitate them to get more chances to purchase a better career in the future.
Take myself as an example.
At the begining of working, i cooked every day.
However, two years later, my supervisor told me that i need to learn some computer skills, which is very useful for rencent market.
Gradually, i used more and more time to learn different skills including english, business class and counting.
Finally, i did not cook anymore.
in conclusion i am convinced that people will have less time to cook and prepare food.
Beacuse they need more time to enhance their ability and earn more money.
How would you feel when you get involved in making more and more money and sacrifice your time playing computer games like PUBG with your friends during your spare time?
How would you feel when a bad emotion affects your working efficiency since you haven't seen your children for quite a long time and being fired by the boss in the end?
All above are associated with jobs that require employees to leave their family and friends.
From my perspective, I prefer jobs that allow employees to stay with their family and friends although the salary maybe lower.
For one thing, the goal of high salary is not making more money but ensuring you a happy life that you can enjoy yourself.
It makes no sense to get higher and higher salary without the companion of our family and friends.

For example, if a person who works in a large international company and get well paid often asked by the boss to fly to other countries to trade with merchants there, he can hardly have time to stay with his family and friends all year around.
Although he has a lot of money, he can't get joy out of it for the goal of making money is misled.
Owing to the fact that everyone tends to live a pleasant life, it is much better to choose a job that allow employees to leave with their family and friends regradless of the salary.
For another, being depressed by the emotion of leaving their family and friends for a long time may results in being fired.
Most of people will be greatly affected by seperating from people they care for a long period, they may feel loney and hopleless.
On the contrary, for instance, if a person with a lower salary can stay with their family and friends, he will stay optimistic for he knows that what he is doing is all for his family.
Furthermore, he is going to work harder in his job to ensure his family a greater life.
Gradually, his boss may see his endeavour and raise his salary to inspire him.
Although the salary is low at the beginning, one can do best in his own job and get promoted later, and thus earn high salary as well as get chances to stay with family and friends.

In such a competitive a society, people today face with massive pressure and have less time to relax.

When asked about the schedule of working, some desire longer weeknds with longer working hours in weekdays, on the contrary, others hold the view that despite of shorter weekends, shorter time of working is way more acceptable.
From my perspective, i prefer work only three days a week for more working hours instead of having a job where I work five days a week for shorter  hours.
I am going to support my standpoint with the following reasons.
First and foremost, longer weekends help people relax better and in return work more efficiently.
After a week's heavy work, people must be tired both in physical and mental.
They need more time to release their stress and refresh their mind which could help them perform betterat work in return.
Take the company near my house for example.
people there work on three or four days a week but they could manage to solve everything in time and in order though they might do extra work at night.
And,  in the weekends, they could do anything they like such as hiking or traveling.
Because of enough relaxation they get from longer weekends, the hard work in others' eyes seems not unacceptable and they have more energy to pay to their assignments.
Longer weekends brings more rest and more rest help people do a better performance at work.
On top of that, people could spend more time with their family.
Nowadays, an increasing number of people choose to work away from their parents which miakes it hard for them to visit their parents.
I, myself is a point in case.
I am working in another city far away from the city which my parents live in.
So, I cannot visit them every week.
And what makes the situation worse is that I have to so some extra work now and then.
If I own a longer weekend, this problem could be handled easily.
That is to say, longer weekends could provide a better family atmosphere.

Admittedly, working longerhours everyday does do harm to people's health and may attach more pressure to them, notwithstanding, through the better rest from longer weekends, these troubles could be overcome easily.
Take all the factors I discussed above into account, it is wise to draw the conclusion that the advantages of working longer per day with longer weekends outweigh the disadvantages.
And I strongly believe more and more people would like to live such a lifestyle in the future.

There is a very popular story, a big cup of milk.
One day, there was a very poor boy.
He beg everyday.
Once he came to a girl's house, he asked for a cup of water.
However, the beautiful girl gave him a big cup of milk.
The boy was moved and remembered the girls's name.
Several years later, the girl got a very sever disease.
She had come to many hospital but no one can cure her.
She came to the last hospital in the town desperatly.
Most of docters thought the girl is going to die while only a young doctor insist to help her who is the boy.
The operation was successful and that the girl survived.
Unfortunatly, such a big operation must cost a lot of money that the gial can't afford.
To her surpise, when she look at bill, the onlyis a big cup of milk.
We didn't know what is about to happen.
So help others may help us one day!
In a word, there is no disadtantage in help struggling strangers.
Even it's a really good thing to help them.
So why not?
For these reasons, more and more people are willing to help struggling strangers.
