With the advancement of the society, modern people's life is filled with various kinds of informations andentertainments, life is no longer as simple as the old days.
So, there is no surprise that people turn to be satisfied with many different types of tasks to do during the workday rather than just do one thing all day long.
There are following reasons I want to state to support my point of view.
First of all,doing some different tasks can learn much more knowledge and skills than do the similar task.

Thus, it could prevent some terrorists from the origin by the easiest way----increaing the number of police.

If more and more police were added to the local place, there might be more visitors going there.

Accompanying with the fast development of the society, is the complexity of the modern life.
More and more people are under great pressure that they sometimes do not know how to deal with their's lives even.
Based ton this situation, I totally agree thatit is neccessary for the young generations to learn how to plan and organize.
I will give my reasons in the following paragrahs.
Since modern life is getting more and more complex, we have to deal with things in a short period of time, this requires us to have the ability to plan our own schedule and organize things.
That is the main require we have to get into the society.

Just think about it, one day working in the office and asked to prepare for some important event, if we can not react immediately, how can we performance great, or how can we work at a high efficiency?
We'll need to learn how to plan and organize then.
These abilities help us performance well when we are in the face of different situations so that we can get into the society.
Learning how to plan and organize makes us a better person.
As we become someone who is marvelous at planning and organizing, it means that we are able to take our responsibility to ourselves , individuals around us, and even the wotld.
In this case, we become stronger and more responsible, it is kind of a symbol of grown up.
We will be regarded as people who is capable, who is reliable, then we are going to face more different kinds of stuff,which will difinitely lead us to be the best ourselves.
We have to use these abilities to deal with different situations so we will not get into trouble.
The more complex the modern life is, it means that the world itself are facing a lot of problems created by the increasing population.
These problems are everywhere, they will show up in several patterns, and I can say that they are mostly harmful to the society.

They are destroying our world, and if we can not plan and organize ourselves well, we may be burried into these problems, due to the fact that to solve these problems require that we shoule haventhe capacity of dealing with hard situations, and this kind of capacity is absolutely based on the ability to plan and organize.
To conclude, it is really essential for young people to have the ability to plan and organize, because it plays an neccessary role in our social activities, personal goals and daily situations.
Nowadays many parents would like to have a perfect child.
In order to do that, they may do not whant the child to make any mistakes.
However, there are many people thinks that it is totally wrong and hold the opinion that this kind of action will spoil the child.
From my prespective, I reckon that parents should let children make mistakes and leat them learn from it.
To begin with, it is necessary for children to have the ability of learning from their own mistakes.
The children are going to grow up one day and the parents will leave them.
At that time, no one can protect them.
In the situation, the ability of discovering and concluding form their own mistakes is becoming such an essential thing.
As a good example, my friend, was not a child who did not allow to make mistakes.
In contrast, her parents thought that making mistakes will help her develop the skills of learning.
Consequently, whe she graduated from school, she is able to absorb some experience from her mistakes and the skill is useful for her career.
As the example suggests, the ability of learning from mistakes is indispensible for a person, which can only be praticed from making mistakes.
Secondly, learning from mistakes could leave a deeper memory for the children and let them not make the mistake again.
In contrast, if the parents do not offer the children a chance to make a single mistake, they will forget it quickly.
Next time, the will trapped in the same dilemma.
For example, my classmate is not allowed to make mistakes.
Before he is going to have a mistake his parents would tell him not to do that.
As a consequence, he often forget the mistakes he have made and then do that again.
Had his parents let him to make mistakes, he would not have been the person who often forget the mistake.
There is no denying that parents are not supposed to let their child makes mistakes provides some benifits.
To be more specific, it can HELP THEIR CHILDREN BECOME A PERFECT PERSON which is good for gaining of the confidence.
Nevertheless, the best side can not last long because if the child have a mistake, he or she does not know what to do next because they are not allowed to make mistakes.
As a result, they will become upset and lose confidence, which is a negative effect on the child.

To sum up, parents should let their children to make mistakes cause it is not only optimistic for the ability of learning form their own mistakes but also benificial for the remembering of the mistakes which is capable for the children not to make the mistakes again.

There are many things to consider how to spend the time when parents are not around us.
Different people hold different ideas about that.
Some people think playing games or sports is a perfect way, while others are firmly convinced that doing things related to schoolwork is a better choice.
From my perspective, I think the second way has lots of benefits.
First of all, finishing schoolwork when parents are away can spare more time to spend with them.
A lot of students in China have tons of schoolwork to do, as a result of which, they have little time to play with parents.
However, students can finish their schoolwork as soon as possible in order to have fun with their parents when they get home regardless of the busy work.
For example, if a student have fun playing games when he is alone, he may have to do his schoolwork when his parents get home after a whole day hard work.
He can't spend time with them for he has to submit the work to his teacher or he will be punished by the teacher and his parents.
So this is a perfect way to make full use of time to finish schoolwork as well as spending time with parents.
Secondly, studying more and getting higher grade will definitely make parents happy.
All parents in the world hope their children to have a better future, so they concentrate on their children's performance in school very much.
If a child study very hard everytime his parents are not at home, his grade may rise a lot.
Hearing child perform better at school, his parents will be delighted and may probably buy him a gift he wants for a long time.
This is much better than just playing games or sports when parents are at work.
Last but not least, playing sports alone may result in injury.
It is a quiet dangerous circumstance when playing sports with no one around.
For children are too young to decide what to do after getting hurt.
They may start crying sitting on the ground and the wound may be affected.
It may result in serious healthy problem.
Besides, getting hurt for one time without parents around may cause a physical problem.
He may be scared to go outside without parents,
Recently, a topic has aroused a heated debate: which factor influences you the most when you are making a major purchasing?
Some people think that inforamtion from media leads their selection, other think that salesman in the market plays the most important role on their decisions.
However, I think recommendations from my friends of colleagues are of great significance.
To begin with, it cannot be denied that information from media can help us make choices when buying goods, but it is not the most important.
With the development of the media and commerce, advertisement becomes one of the main approaches to let people know a commodity.
The companies that produce the commodities usually exaggerate their products to attract more consumers in their advertisements, and these advertisements usually cannot convince customers.
For example, I bought a bag of washing powder because I saw its advertise on TV, and I believed that its efficiency of washing dirty clothes is high.
However, when I used it to wash my dirty shirt, I could not clean my shirt even a little, so I became not believe in the information from media since then.
Moreover, the salesmen in the market can sometimes help us make our choices on purchasing goods, yet they might not be convinced always.
Salesmen usually have not used the products they are selling themselves, and they do not know the exact quality of the products.
All they want is usually their bonus after they sell the goods, and they are not responsible for selling a bad-quality commodity.
Nevertheless, recommnedations from friends and colleagues are usually the most helpful for us when it comes to a major purchase.
Friends and colleagues are the persons that we can trust, and they have already used or experienced the products, and their feelings are can lead us to make choices.
For instance, I bought a computer under

From what has been mentioned above, we can draw a conclusion that although information from media and salesman in the market are somtimes attractive, recommendations from friends and colleagues can truely benefit us when we are deciding to make a major purchase.
Whether or not identifying a promising job is easier in the past is an debated topic.

While some people may feel that it's easier for people in the past to identify what type of job could lead to a secure and successful future because the categories of jobs are more complicated today than the past, I don't think it's the case.
I strongly believe that with higher technology and higher education level, it's a piece of cake of today's people to identify what type of job is promising.
Have you ever heard of the notion 'Big Data'?
I believe most of us hear or see it everyday.
With the fast development of technology, data colletion is an increasingly easier job which can help us identify each kind of job with datas.

For example, if the definition of a job's success is the money one can earn, then the agency could collect the money data of large quantities of workers in every career to get the average salary of each kind of job.
By comparison, we will be aware that which kind of job is promising because the data will never cheat us.

Nonetheless, we could never know clearly which job could be more prolific in the past because the only thing we could do is to consult those people around us about their salaries and those could be random, not convincing.
On top of that, education level is also averagely higher today than past, which enables us to know from a young age that success doesn't necessarily mean money.
I still remember a sentence said in the movie 'Kungfu Panda'.
It goes like this' What suits you most is what's best for you.'  which means we should find what we are good at in order to succeed rather than persue those with average higher income blindly.
And this idea is instructed through our education trace, which wasn't the case in the pase.

Family members do play an important role in out life, but if we really need a giant extended family can be controversial.

Although some people may think that living with their hole family members is a good choice, I believe that because of the great changes in working, living enviroment and internet, an extended family is not as important as it is before.
Nowadays friends and bussiness companions become more and more powerful that they making up our social life that familiy members become less important.
For most of the people, in a busy working day, they have to work with their cooporaters for eight hours and talking or playing with their friends for more hours.
They build an adults' most life.
So they do not have time and also do not need to have a giant family to live with.
Deal with that kind of family could cost too much time in some cases.
Living standards improve very fast that one depends less on relatives than he or she did before.
At ancient time the family could be a kind of insurance that if one family members lost job or suffer from a bad ill other members can help he or she to go over it.
But at modern time people can deal with most of the situations by them self.
An research shows that in China citizens became really rich that if they want to decrease their eating standrad, they can afford the hole years' food by one month's salary.
That is not include the money government give to poor people and the medical insurance the government by for most of us.
So an extended family became useless in this way.
Internet, or in another word, the vitual world, has satisfied much need of every ordinary citizen in modern times.
The data of Apple store shows that most of the people install wechat in their phones and over ninty percents of apple smartphone users have at least one message app.
These may us able to find and talk with the one we like or even develop a group for the people interested in the same things.
Now it is the time that interact with people that is interesting become really easy.
And all of us can find resources in the internet to cover the need of entertainment and satisfiction.
So family are not as important as ancient time.

Nowadays,several parents give their school-age kids pocket money for each high grade they get in school.

Some children will think of a lot of methods to earn the money,such as copy or cheat in the exam,it will build a bad habbit and do harm to the development of these children.

Children should be given recognition if they do good at school and get good grades,but they are not suggested to be given money.
Life is always difficult and the hardship appears in different aspects under different backgrounds.
For our grandparents, people had to strive for raising several children with thin income.
Nowdays, we have to keep track with the high pace of the society.
In the past year, the food was inadequate and the salary was low.
In order to cultivate several children, adults had to find additional work to make up thin payment.
The huge pressure from living drove them to eat and wear simply.
I was often told tha  my grandparents merely had rice for dinner without any vegetables, let alone meat.
To reduce the burden of their families, our grandparents went to work earlier, some of them were even immature.
When they received money, they did nothing but to make an informed arrangement on how to spend it.
For example, the daily necessities, the electronic bill, phone bill and the tuition of younger kids were all needed to be taken into acconut.
That is why they seldom bought  themselves new clothes and had some entertainment.
Furthermore, in most families, the younger children had to wear the clothes from their brothers and sisters only because they could not afford the new ones.
At that time, grandparents had no choices but to squeeze the expense every day for the preparation for the new year.
It was their effort that resulted in our relative happier life today.
